4a1(1): / sum cu drug gi rgyas pa rnams kyang mthong // bskal pa sum cu drug tu thams cad mkhyer pa bsnyen bkur spyad pa spyod/ da dung tshul ma khas 'di dag bskal ba grangs phyed sum cu pa drug tu// gang
4a2(1): zag chen po 'ang dag rgyal ba khyu mchog mchod pa byed cing gnas// thams cad du yang phun sum tshul rtog rgyal ba'i mchog la mchod pa byed// rkang gnyis gtso bo mchod de byang chub zhi ba yongs su btsal byas nas/ 
4a3(1): de dag de'i 'og tu dpal sug rkang gnyis dam pa skyes bu mchog/ 'drend pa mthu chen yon tan ldan par gser gyi rgyal mtshan bskal la 'byung // rgyal ba de dag sna tshogs zhing na gnas shing rang rang zhing sbyangs te/ 
4a4(1): sems can dam pa de kun nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dpal zhes bya// de che yon tan ldan pa de dag rnams kyi 'dus pa grangs myed de// de che thub pa re re'i nyan thos 'dus par 'gyur ba de dag ni// 
4a5(1): gal te bskalang pa khrag khrig dag tu stobs bcus nyan thos de ba grangs kyang // legs mdzad rnams kyi nyen thos 'dus pa dag ni/ mapar phyir nga bgrangs myi 'gyur// 'dus pa de dag thams
4a6(1): cad grangs myed 'dus pa de ni ci 'dra ba// de las gnyis 'gyu ra de che byang chub du ni yang dag zhugs par 'gyur// de che rgyal bar/ zhugs kyi rgyal ba thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma yin// de das
4a7(1): thams cad yongs dag zhing du myang nas kun kyang rgyal bar 'gyur/ bde gshegs de dag 'apyod pa gang yin de dag rnams kyi 'ang de nyid 'gyur/ 'jig rten mkhas pa de dag mya ngan 'das par gyur nas ram pa'i chos
4a8(1): de che sras kyis bzung zhing bskal pa bye ba brgyad cur gnas par gyur pa// de dag 'das nas nyond pa'i gsung rab de la byang chub sems bskyed pa// gang ga'i klung gi bye ma bas kyang shind tu mang ba 'byung bar 'gyur// de
4a9(1): dag 'das nas nyo nad pa skyob pa rnams kyi gsung rab de la ni// nyan thos rgya mtsho kun gyi bye snyed dpag yas mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// de ltar 'jig rten don rnams mdzad pa rang 'byung de dag thams cad kyi// banyand pa
4a10(1): yi re re chos dang yongs su legs par ldan gyur cing // yang dag bshad par gyur te re 'i ba nya rad pa rnams kyi chos nyid yin// myi mchog de'i gsung rab de thos 'gro ba ma lus dang gyur nga nas// rkang gnyis dam pa
4b1(1): sas 'jig rten don byed bdag cag 'gyur zhes te// thams cad dga' nas rgyal ba'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal skye bo rab tu dga'/ bde bar gshegs la dka' ba gzhal las bskyed nas chos kyis bsnyen bkur byam
4b2(1): sta bas na dga' bar byos la mgo la 'bar bzhin s+yang khyod de// rtag tu shes rab pha rol du phyi nad dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen banyen byos la// yang dag mthong ba'i spyad pa dge ba 'dil kun tu bster bya ba nye// da
4b3(1): slong khyed cag rkang gnyis gtso bo 'jig rten thugs bacher 'gyur bar gyis// / 'bras bu che ba lung ba ha nad pa'i le'u he/ nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// 
4b4(1): de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis de'i tshe sems can dang / gra tu myed pa byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par rig cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la the tsam myed par gyurd par rig nas tshim zhings su la yid rangs
4b5(1): te/ rab tu dga' zhidi dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcomade ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis so so ma des mngon par 'atong ngo // de la lnga'i bu sbyir ba la mos pas gso
4b6(1): ba// khyod kyis sdug pa'i sras rnams dang // btsun mo dang ri srog phangs btang // rgyal srid btang ba ci smos te// sbyin mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal// sna'i bu tshul khrims la mos
4b7(1): pas gsol pa// khyod kyis tshul khrims rnams sbyangs pa/ rnam pa kun tu snyems myi mnga'// shi nang du bslabs pas mthar phyin pa// khrims mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu bzod
4b8(1): pa la mos pas gsol pa// khyod kyis bzod pa banye nad mdzad pas// yan lag gtub pa'ang bzod par mdzad// zab mo spyad sug ma lags te// bzod mthar phyi nang la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu brtson 'grus
4b9(1): la mos pas gsol pa// brtson pa ma btang brtson 'grus te// stobs cen brtson 'grus ldan gyur da pas// rdzogs pa'i byang chub mchog brnyes pa// brtson mthar phyi nad la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu bsam
4b10(1): gtan la mos pas gsol pa// khyod kyis bsam gtan pa nyen mdzad pa// de la 'jig rten gting mya rnyed// dus gsum mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa// bsam gtan mthar phyi nang phyag kyang 'tshal// sna'i bu gzi ba
7a1(1): dang ma 'gags pa// bar na'ang gnas pa ma mchis pa// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu tong pa nyid la gnas pas gsol ba// gang zag sems can ma mchis pa/ 
7a2(1): mchis pa spangs mchis pa// baha rang ba'i slad du brjod bgyi ba// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu mtshar ma byed pa la gnas pas gsol pa// gang gis pa snang gdagras pa yi// mchungs
7a3(1): de dag ma mchis te// chos kun mtshan ma ma mchis par// rnam par 'drend pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu smon pa myed pa la gnas pas gsol pa// ji ltar mtshan ma hong gyurd cing // smond pa dmyigs
7a4(1): su ma mchis dang // su la smor lam mchis gyur pa// de yang de lta'i tshul du mkhyerang // lha'i bu ting nge 'dzirang la gzhol bas gsom dra ba// rnam pa rang sgrol ba ter bgyis shing // gang 'ag 'gro/ 
7a5(1): 'gyur de ma mchis// de bzhin kun nas nyon mongs pa/ de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu ma spang bas kA/ so lang pa// khyod ni sdig pa kun spangs shing // bsod
7a6(1): rams thams cad bsags gyur da te/ bde gshegs khyod la spod myi yangal// su spong de dag mkhas ma lags/ sgra 'ibu klog gi sprin kyis gsol pa// ji skar klog bcas
7a7(1): kyi tshogs/ cha ra kyis sa chen ngoms par bgyid// de bzhin 'dre rang bas chos char gyis/ 'jig rten rnams mi ngoms par mdzad/ sna'i bu bsam pa don yod kyis gsolang pa// phub khyod gsung // 
7a8(1): don mchis te/ ros kyi mkhor lo rab tu bskod // shinang du brtags te sadzad pas ma// de'i thams cad mkhyed pa'i mtshan/ zhwa'i bu blo phun sum tshogs pas gsol ba// chos rnams bams cad dngos nyid
7a9(1): kyis// ma skyes ma 'gags pa lags te// de dag pade gshegs khyod kyis mkhyer du / gzhan yang de bzhin rtogs par mdza / kwa'i bu seng ge'i nga ros gsol mo// khyod kyis stong pa nyid bshand te/ 
7a10(1): seng ge ling ro bsgrags mdzad pas// mu stegs can kun rab 'jigs pa// seng ges ri rigs phra mo bzhin// sA'i bu ba gsod las kyis gsol ba// bag yod sngon tu btang mdzad de// khyod kyis phyong
7b1(1): sa sapa'adzid pa byud/ ban padag pa ngas par 'gyung //  sa song rag gnas kyis mapo nga/ na ba du
7b2(1): stobs bcu ka' yang sangs rgyal/ sa rgyas kyi khyab rab tu shesang / 'i bu ngan yang skyes kyis gso mangs/ na mong ra// kya phyo so so byed/ 
7b3(1): rang sa mos gyur ngas/ de dag rnams ni 'jig rten 'bres / 'i chubag yo nges par byung gso gapo ladapa/ byang chub sems ca ba da/  nyem
7b4(1): khyod la bslabs pa te/ bag yod par ni nges par byung / shu bag yod gnas pas gsol pa// zag sod yongs su ma btang ba / rnam par 'dren du pa khyod kyi mAm/ 'gro ba 'jim mam
7b5(1): par// thams cad mkhye rang tu nges par byung / skra'i bu deg yod bsrungs kyis gsol pa/ byang chub lam la ste nangadad cing / khyod de ma ga shes bsrus pas na// thugs
7b6(1): rje chen po mams pa yis/ byang chub dam pa brnyes par gyur lha'i bu bag yod bzon gyis gsol pa// bag yod la rab bzor 'ang / mtshan nyid gcig po rtogs bgyis pa/ 
7b7(1): dpa' po chen po khyod kyi sras// yab kyi dkor yang thob par gyur / sna'i bu bag yod mngon par dga' bas gsolang pa// phan pa dpral ba'i 'dud pa rnams// de rag sadas rgyas le zhes kyi
7b8(1): dpa' bo nyon mongs ri 'jig pas/ ngargyal ri yang de bzhin pa zhi med// lha'i bu 'ag yod 'dzi nid kyis gsol pa// sangs rgyas ye shes chol mngang che// khyod ni bag gis bzung bas ma// bskal gabyer
7b9(1): grangs phyed du// khyod kyi thugs ni sbyor ma gyurang// lha'i bu zhi gnas 'azor gyis gsos pa// chos rnams de dan rang bzhin no// de di sangs rgyas myong yul sanapa// byang chub yang dad gang zhugs dang / 
7b10(1): thams cad mkhyend pa der myi 'jigs// lnga'i bu zhi gnas la yang dag par gnas pas gsol pa// sangs rgyas zhig nas bzhugs pa ste/ 'o nad kyang de la chags myi mngal// sems can nyon mongs zhi bar mdza/ 
8a1(1): rdul 'bul ba la char pa bzhin/ lha'i bu'i gnas la rab tu gnas kyis gsol dpa// sangs rgyas zhi la rab tu bzhugs/ sus kyang myi bskyod ri bo bzhin// khyod sa gnod bgyid myi nus te// sems
8a2(1): khyod la phyag kyang 'chas// kwa'i bu zhi gnas dus gyis gsol pa// khyod kyi sras rnams ma smad pa// zhi gnas kyis ni yongs su rus// bdung rnams bye bas myi tshugs te// 'dod rags kyis ri gnod kyi 'gyur/ 
8a3(1): lA'i bu zhi ga nas nges par byung gis gsol pa// zhi ba'i yid mnga' zhi gnas la// dpa' bo chen po sgom mdzad pas/ zil gnas te bsam gtan mdzad// sus kyang khyod kyi tshul ma 'chalang // sA'i bu zhig sa/ 
8a4(1): sngon tu 'gros gsol pa// hond pas sangs rgyas chos rnams kyi// sngon tu zhi ga nas 'gro zhes gsungs// gang gis byang chub 'gru bu 'gyur ba'i// chos gzhan de'i rjes su 'brang // lha'i bu 'i
8a5(1): gnas rjes su 'brang gis gsol pa// 'jig rten sgron ma zhi gnas ni// sems kyi rnyog pa dang bar bgyid// zhi ba'i se/ mas ldan rnams kyi 'ching // de khyod mtha' yas dbang du mdzad// 
8a6(1): sgra'i bu zhi ga nas spyod yul gyis gsol pa// chos rnams ku/ nad kyi spyod yul ni// zhi gnas yin zhes 'drend pas gsungs / de la chags myed spyod pas ni// rnam par 'drend pa sangs
8a7(1): rgyas 'gyur// sna'i bu'i gnas brland kyis gsolang ba// bes ma gtan gyis ni mngon brda rang te/ shes rab kyis ni sems bsgoms pa so// de phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub ba rnyes/ de bzhin skye bo nas
8a8(1): kyang 'dre dang / sna'i bu'i gnas sur send kyis gsoyo pa// sangs rgyas chos rnams gang la yang // lam gzhang bdag gis ma mthong ste/ zhiganas pashes che thob ra// rang byung nyid du nges par 'byung / 
8a9(1): kwa'i bunam sa zang mngon nganasan bzong sa// dam sa meran po ldan ma tho di// chom rnams thams cad gad pa'o// des khyod kyi mas myod cing // rang byung nyi na thob par 'gyur/ kwa'i bu lhag ma sru
8a10(1): gsol pa// shes rab pha rol phyinang gnas shing // rnam par 'drend pa 'byung bar 'gyur// sman pa'i rgyal po so nad pa ste// de bas lhag mthong dge ba lags// lha'i bu lhag mthong rab gnas kyis gsol pa/ 
8b1(1): chos rnams thams cad thams bgyis te// yang dag mi bani ma mthong gyur ra // btan ba rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thom// byang chub nyid la gnas par 'dong //  ldan mthong nges byung nis nam mangs
8b2(1): bag mchog rnams ye shes kyis// shes rab gcig tu nges par byung // rdzogs pa'i byang chub se shes kyis// brnyes pa'i 'dren pa skye myi 'gyur// sna'i chu lpag mthong mtho danas gso'adu/ yang ngas ji dzin
8b3(1): yang dag tu// chos rnams rnam par gzigs pas na// byang chub gzhal yas brnyes gyur te// de bas rnam 'dre nang sangs rgyas lags// lha'i bu lhag ma thong la mngon par bcor bas gsol pa// mkhas pa
8b4(1): ye shes gang brtson zhing // dka' ba mang po spyod bgyid pa/ de dag rgol tshogs thams cad kyis// pham par bgyi bar yong myi nus/ lha'i bu lhag mthong byung gis gsol pa// chos rnams rnam
8b5(1): mabong bgyi sbed cu// rgyal sras gang dag bzhugs pa'i rnaMs// / chos rnams ngo bo nyid 'tshal cing // rang byung nyid ni thob der 'gyur// sA'i bu lhag mthong la bste rang pas gso lang pa// 
8b6(1): rnam 'dren khyod kyis yun ring du/ ye shes la ni brten maH/ da pas// thams cad mkhyend pa brnyes nas ni// srog / gas bye ba grol bar mdzad // lha'i bu khyad par ldan gyis gso/ 
8b7(1): pa// sangs rgyas mkhye nad pas thams cad mkhyenang // 'dren po dam pa mngon par 'phags// srid pa'i rgya mchos khyer ba yi/ jig rten de yis sgrol ba mdza/ lA'i bu lngag mthong gnas rgya
8b8(1): gsol pa// lhag mthong la 'i gnas mdzad cing // chos kun rnam par gzigs pas na// sangs rgyas chos rnams 'phel 'gyur te// sa bzang n+ya grong skyes 'dra// lA'i bu lhag mthong dang ma bral bam g.yonas
8b9(1): // ras par 'dre dad pa khyod kyi zas// ye shes tum na so sa bzung bye// byang chum mchog na thob bgyis zhing // skye ba zang po 'bres pa babyid / kwa'i sregs mthong sa rnam par se man pa po dpa
8b10(1): sangs rgyas ma khye rang la rnam par rol/ chos rnams kun la 'jigs kyi mngal// bum pa ma mchis sdang myi mngal// thub pa 'jig rten thams cad mkhye dang / lha'i bu lhag mthong la yang dag par 'dus
9a1(1): / gsol pa// dpa' bo chen po chos kun ni/ wag ma bong nyid du yang dag 'dra// rang bzhir skyed par rnam mthong // der reng byung byang chub lags/ kwa'i bu phrag mthong snying pom sha pos dpa/ 
9a2(1): sangs rgyas lhag mthong snying po nye// chos rnams kun la 'jigs kyi mngal// 'jig rten sdug bsngal 'di gzigs shing // thugs rje chen po ga ring du skyed/ lha'i bu lhag mthong 'gros gsolang pa// byang chub phyir du
9a3(1): shes 'gro ba'i// 'jig rter mkhas pa nges par byung // de dag byang chub mchog kyang 'phob// grol na skye dgu 'di dag 'grelang / sna'i bu tong pa nyid la se rad kyis gsol dpa// stong pa nyid kyi chos te rang pa'i// 
9a4(1): mkhas pa byang chub 'tshang rgya ste// sems cad bcings las 'gro bgyid cing // 'ching ba thams cad rnam par gcod// lha'i bu hopra nyid la mos kyis gsol pa// stong pa nyid la mos gyurang ba/ 
9a5(1): 'gro ba 'angadi dag srog myed gzigs// dmyigs myed ngo bo nyidamyed pa// de ltar srog chags rnams la stonang // sA'i bu/ stong pa nyid spyod yul gyis gsolang pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi
9a6(1): spyod yul ni// chos rnams rang bzhin stong pa ste// srog chan/ sa rnams la thugs bzebs// dpa' bos de la spyad pa mdzad// sna'i bu stong pa nyid kyi bsam pas gsolang pa// skyon dang / 
9a7(1): bral zhing bcings myed la/ 'jigs skrag thams cad rab tu spangs// chos rnams kun la myi gnas shing // nam mkha'i rlung bzhin myod pa ma dang // lha'i bu stong pa nyid la mngon par dga' bas gsol pa/ 
9a8(1): stong nyid chos la banyen bgyid cing // sangs rgyas pyod yul gang mos pa// de dag nyond pa mchod pa ste// mchod pa de ni bla na myed// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis yang dag par 'phags kyis gsol pa// gang gis 'drer
9a9(1): pa 'phags gyur da pa// de ni yang dag 'phags shes gsungs// tong nyid chos la ste nang bgyid pa// ma smad de dag sangs rgyas 'gyur// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis 'drend kyis gsol pa// dpa' bo chen po chos rnams// 
9a10(1): gang // mya ngan 'das phyin nyon ma mchis// kun kyang mya ngan 'das la 'dren // drang srong chen po byang chub lags// lnga'i bu stong pa nyid kyis yang dag par bshad kyis gsol pa// stong nyid zhil brten nas mi
9b1(1): khyod kyi thob ma yang dag gdang / stong pa nyid pa gang nyerd pa// de dag rim mgro bgyid pa lags/ kwa'i bu song pa nyid la der kyis gsol das// gang rnam sa song ba nyid de rang / pa'as pa re na mo ma
9b2(1): 'gyur// nyon mongs myed cing 'a khyed rnams/ byang chub rdus phyed 'thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu stong pa nyid phun sum tshogs pas gso lang ba// gang rnams song nyid rter bgyi pa// sangs rgyam chos rnams phung / 
9b3(1): sum tshogs// rang byung pham pa myed par 'gyur// 'jig rten ngon kyang bgyid par 'gyur// lnga'i bu tong pa nyid la yang dag par zhugs pas gsol pa// sangs rgyas chos la zhugs gyur te// stong pa nyid la
9b4(1): gang nye nad pa// de la bdud rnams bye ba'i phrag/ hong kas dkrug par myi nus so// lha'i bu mtshan ma myed pa la dga' bas gsol pra// mtshan ma myed la mdzon dbyes te// dngos po thams
9b5(1): rnam pashig nas// sangs rgyas 'jig rten rnams nas byung // mtshan ma rnams la chags myi mnga'// lha'i bu mtshan ma myedadepa la gnas pas gsol pa// mtshar ma myed la pyod brus
9b6(1): cing // zhi ba zhi la pyod pa rnams// mtshan ma rnam par da shig rnams kyi// tshul ni bdud kyis shes myi nus/ lA'i chu/ mtshan ma byed pa'i khyod yul gyis gsolang ba// sangs rgyas
9b7(1): kun gyi spyod yul la/ 'dren pa khyod ni myod mdzad de/ na sa myi mnga' rtogs dka' zhing // zhi pyod khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ sna'i bu mtshan ma byed pas skom gyis gsolang pa// thub pa'i
9b8(1): 'khor 'di sems cad mi// mtshan ma myed pas skom gyur te// yab kyi dkor ni 'chal gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs la bkur ba nyi bgying // lnga'i bu mtshan ma myed pa la myod pas gso yang pa// mtshanas
9b9(1): byed pa nyid ma na// gang shugs chog dpyod pa nga gyu sa kyang // khyod kyi tshus ris 'angayang to// gA'i su ma byed pas rnam par thobargyam gam ya /  dmas mas
9b10(1): bshig cig// dpa' chen 'jig nyid rnor ma myod// ma rnam byed sa gnas pa mang // denas myongs phyag kyang 'aras// lha'i bu ma ram byed pa sa rnam par sems ni ma ladang / chub che dbar 'cher ba byo
10a1(1): ma phyed la rnam par ros pa/ phyi rnams yongs su sbyin yang cing / sangs rgyab pa zhes mchog la bzhugs/ sna'i bu mchan la byed pas yongs su grub kyis gsol dpa// gang gis sacanas 'angs chur
10a2(1): pa// de dag byang chub sgrub pa ste// yab kyi chos kyis brtul shugs can// de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod// sA'i bu mtshan ma myed pa la dga' bas gsol pa// gang gis mtshan ma rnam bshig pa// de dag
10a3(1): rgyab chom la dga'// bla ma'i gnas la gnas pa ste// sems cad kun kyi mchod rten lags/ lha'i bu mtsham ma myed pa la rten pas gsold pa// nim spyod cing rnam grol ba// sangs rgyas 'jig rten tha da byed/ 
10a4(1): 'byung po kun gyi skyabs dang rtend// dpung nyen de bzhin gnas kyang gras// lha'i bu mtshan ma myed pa la mos pas gsol pa// mtshan ma myed la mos gyur cing // 'i ba dgra las rgyal gyur pa// sangs
10a5(1): rgyas rgal ba 'gro sgrol pa// de dag tshad ri ga la mchis// lA bu smon pa myed pa rtogs kyis gsol pa// mgon po gang dgasmon lam ni// rnam pa kun tu myi dmyigs pa// de dag 'dzi/ 
10a6(1): ter bral ba he// sangs rgyas 'jig rten nang nas byung // lA 'aM/ khu smon pa myed pa la he nad pas gsol pa// zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan pa khyod// srid pa rnams su smor myi mdzang // sred pa
10a7(1): yongs su chad pas ra// sangs rgyas 'jig rten mong myi gos// lA bu smon pa myed pas skyes kyis gsol pa// gang gis sred pa yongs pa com pa// de dag gzi mchog mchod pa ste// de dag 'jig rten
10a8(1): mgon po'i sras// rang gi yab la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu smond pa myed pas bskyed kyis gsol pa// khyod kyi sras rnams ma smad pa// sred pas yongs su bcad pas na// srid pa 'jig bgyid srid pa la/ 
10a9(1): de dag smon pa myi bgyid do// lha'i bu smond pa myed pas yongs su grol bas gsol ba// gang dag spong pa phyi bgyir pa// ga'i lngar khyod kyi sras kyi rnams// re ba btang zhing bcings grol ba// de dag yongs su
10a10(1): grol bar 'gyur// lnga'i bu smon pa myed pas byung gis gsol pa// gang gis sred par rab bcom pa// de dag mya ngan dgon pa rgalang// de dag kyi skom zang zing phyed// dpa' chen khyod la de phyag 'tshal// 
10b1(1): bu smon pa myed la nges pas gsol pa// gang gis srid dang sdug bsngal dang // bde ba dngos po myed bsgoms pa// mgor khyod de dag rnams kyi yab// de dag khyod kyi sras kyang lags// lnga'i bu spom
10b2(1): li 'khor da kyis gsol pa// srid pa sdug bsngal sus mthong ba// de dag khyod kyis bas nad la dul// kha lo sgyur zhing srid sel pa// sems dul khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// sna'i bu spo rang ba myed pa
10b3(1): byung gis gsol pa// srid pa'i dgon las byung ba'i rnams// bde ba thob cing zhi gnas te// nyon mongs dgra rnams pham mdzad pa// 'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal// lA'i bu smond pa myed pas la
10b4(1): mtshan du gyur pas gsol pa// g.yul las rgyal bar gyur da pa sre// khyod ni rnam rgyal pham myi mnga'// bdud kyi dpung rnams pham mdzad cing // srid pa kun tu spor myi mdzad// lha'i bu spo rang ba myed
10b5(1): pa stobs ldan gyis gsol pa// tha rad pa'i chos la stobs ldan pas/ bdud kyi zhags pa yongs bcad cing // khyod kyi sras rnams bdud dag la// bskyang po'i 'du shes myi bgyid
10b6(1): do// lha'i bu lus rnam par brtags kyis gsol pa// lus myed 'chi ba myed tshul du// lus 'di gang gis mthong gyur/ da pa// de dag sangs rgyas spyod yul dgal// 'dren
10b7(1): pa khyod kyis rjes su zhugs// lha'i bu lus nges par sems pa sa gsol pa// mya ge tsang rul pa'i rnag zag pa// lus 'di myi tha zad nges bsams te// yang dag ji bzhin 'tshal gyur nas// 
10b8(1): rnam 'drer khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus rtogs kyis gsol pa// lus la myi gtsang brtag bgyis te// lus la dran pa rnam dpyad cing // lus kyi sdug bsngal rnam grol nas// nges pa khyod la phyag
10b9(1): kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus yongs su gtong gis gsol pa// sbrul gyi pags pa rnying bzhin du// rnag can lus 'di spangs nas ni// de bzhin gshegs po'i sku bo che// sku myi mnga' la phyag kyang 'tshal/ 
10b10(1): lha'i bu lus la spod pas gsol pa// myi gtsang dri nga nag zag cing // rul pa'i lus la rnam spang de// myi gtsang gang ba rnas spangs nas// 'drend pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus kyi sa yong su skyo
11a1(1): gabosang pa// gang dag rus pa'i lus spyo 'ang // rgyal sras gtsang dag 'tshal ba rnams// chos kyis rab tu bskyed pa'i sras// de dag sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal 'gyur// kwa'i bu sus kyis smas pas gsos dang / 
11a2(1): 'byung ba chen po sbrul gdug 'dra// gang gis sha nad tu rtogs gyur da pa// de dag lus las 'das pa ste// rkang gnyis gtso la phyag kyang 'tshal/ sA'i bu lus kyis sbyor mthong bas gsold pa// lus kyi sbyor la
11a3(1): mchong sum she/ ye zhes gzigs pa'i spyan mnga' bas// sangs rgyas mkhyend pas mkhas pa dag/ srid gsum thams cad yongs su gzigs/ lnga'i bu lus la 'dod chags dang bral bas gsosod pa// lus kyi 'du shes
11a4(1): 'dod chags bras/ chos kyi 'du shes myoganas pas / ku bya kun pas 'das pa nye// nam 'grem sangs rgyas phyag kyang 'chas/ sku'i bu srid pa'i dgra bro gros kyis gso yang pa// srid par sring
11a5(1): 'jom mdzad pa// khyod kyis dgra'i 'du shes mkhyend// khyod kyi de sras rnams bsgom bgyid cing // mkhas pa byang chub mngon 'chargya// lha'i bu srid pa sel dpas gsol ba// srid pa nas
11a6(1): kyi nyis myig mthong // mya ngan 'das pa 'jigs myed mthong // rgya da kyi sras rnams 'gro bar phyir/ byang chub myang pa myong pa dbya da// lha'i bu srid pa rnam par spangs kyis gsolang pa// gang
11a7(1): gis srid pa nam spangs shing // 'jig la mngon par myi dga' ba/ bral bar gyurd cing sems dag pa// mkhas khyod zhabs la phyag kyang tshol // lha'i bu srid pa bas mad kyis gsolang pa// s+ya'i des
11a8(1): pa khyod kyi sras// srid par khrid pa rab bab yang te// khyod kyi bsrab sa bslabs pa dag/ hong sus 'dir rnam par mdzes// lA'i bu srid pa las rga lang bas gsold pa// srid pa'i mtsho las rgas pa yi// 'jig
11a9(1): ten mgon mchog skyob rnams la// gang gis rgyud du bgrang ba'i// grangs ni 'jig rten 'di ni myed// lha'i bu srid pa 'jos gyis gsol pa// srid pa thams cad yongs bcom ste// gang dag rtag tu dran phyong pa
11a10(1): de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod// srog chags rnams ma chos kyang ho rang // lha'i bu srid thams rab tu gros zas gso mad pa// srid pa'i rgyun las rab tu grol// rnam par 'dren pa srid pa nasang // sri pa ma
11b1(1): 'byir nga sangs rgyas te// srid pa sel la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu srid pa rab tu zhi byed kyis gsol pa/ srid par khrid pa rab 'i zhing / srid pa pham par mdzad nas gshegs// brtan bsrid pa ma'
11b2(1): pa// khyod la ngo zla ma mchis so// lha'i bu srid pa'i mabar 'gro bas gsol pa// srid pa'i mthar 'byi nga rab zhi // mgor po khyod kyi srid pa'i mthal// srid pa phyir 'byirang thams cad sakhye rang // sangs rgya
11b3(1): 'jig rten rtogs par mdzang // sA'i bu sring sdos ma'i lus 'dzi red kyis gsolang pa// srid pa'i rgyu ri rnam spangs nas// srid pa pa ma 'jirang mdzad pa// gang gis sbrid pa le rang gyurang pa'i// khyod kyi kun tu sbyor ma mdzod/ 
11b4(1): swa'i bu srid pa rab tu zhi ba thob kyis gso lang pa// khyod kyi srid pa stong ma khyer te/ srid pa'i rgyu sang de bzhin no// kum dang rab tu zhum gyi mngal// mnyam nyid gyu rang la phyag kyang 'tshal// sA'i bu srong ba'i
11b5(1): rol tu 'gro bas gsol pa// srid pa'i pha rol rga la pa te// srid par khrid pa yang dag bsaHlang// rnam par 'dren pa thugs bze bas// skye bo gzhan ni sgrol ba mdzad// 
11b6(1): tshor bas mnar gyis gsol pa// tshor ba bdag tu bgyim masems pa ma mchis grol ma mchis// bsam gtan ma ngad pa khyod kyis// tshor bcu buras bur ma khyenang// yA'i bu ro
11b7(1): ho nad pas gsol da pa// ngo bo nyid kyis dngos myed par// tshor ba khyod kyis rab tu mkhyend// rmi lam sdu gu'i dga' 'dra ba// de la so so'i skye bo chags// lha'i bu tshor ba la yongs su rtog pas gsol pa// 
11b8(1): shes rab bcas pas yongs brtags na// tshor ba 'gro bar ma song zhing // 'ong ba myed la dngos myed par// de ni thub ce na khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu tshor ba dang bral bas gsol pa// tshor ba dang ni tshor ba po
11b9(1): rang bzhin myed pa khyod kyis gzigs// zab mo blta dka'i tshig de yang // khyod kyis sems can rnams la baha nad// lha'i bu tshor ba'i rgyud la nges pas gsol pa// tshor ba de ni kun rdzob tsam// don dam
12a1(1): / du phyi dbyigs te/ khyod kyis sems can der btul pas/ 'gro ba be com ma mchis 'gyur/ lha'i bu tshor ba la mkhas pas gsol ba// tshor ba'i phung po mkhas pab// mkha' la rlung gi dkyil 'thor
12a2(1): ba'idi/ byos ba'i blo can mongs bgyid pa// de khyod kyis yang dag gzigs/ sna'i bu tshor ba mngon bar shes pas gsol dang / tshor ba'i phung po mdor mkhyen pa// rig cing rig pa'i bar byor dpa// ma'ab
12a3(1): rnams kyi mchog khyod kyis// tshor ba bdag myed rab tu gzigs// lha'i bu tshor ba las rgal bas gsol pa// rkang gnyis gtso ba dam pa khyod// brgal dka' tshor ba'i mtsho las rgal// 'dam las rga lad cing sdig myed pa// 
12a4(1): byang chub mchog 'di sangs rgyas kyurang // lha'i bu tshor ba las 'bru gis gsol pa// rnam par 'dren pas 'jig rten Ta/ tshor ba rnams ni 'thung ma khye rang nas// nor ba'i phung po rab rga lang te/ 
12a5(1): sangs rgyas 'jig rten chags myi mnga'// lha'i bu tshor ba rig pas// gsol pa// mya rnams ngag la gang 'ching ba'i// tshor ba/ thams cad khyod kyis mkhyend// nyon mongs zhags pas 'ching // 
12a6(1): 'gyur ba// de'i rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu seMs/ la mkhas pas gsol pa// khyod kyis sems kyi nyon mongs/ pham/ bdud rnams kyang ni spa bkong ste// sems de rang
12a7(1): bzhin ma mchis par// thub pa chen po khyed kyis gzigs// lha'i bu sems yongs su shes pas gsol pa// ji ltar sgyu ma'i mkhan tha yis/ sgyu ma sna tshogs srul pa ba'ini// sems ni bde gshes
12a8(1): khyod kyis mkhyen // de phyir khyod la 'jig rten mchod// lha'i bu sems la yang dag par rtogs pas gsol pa// sgyu ma'i mkhan nam slob ma bzhin// gang gis 'gro ba 'di bcings pa'i// sems de khyod kyis yang
12a9(1): ngag brtags// de ni khyod kyis ci bzhin mkhye rang // sna'i bu sems kyi khyod yul la pyod pas gsol pa// sems kyi spyod yul khyod kyis mkhyenang // rnam par 'dre rang pa myilam na// ji ltar tshogs kyi grangs pa'ing/ 
12a10(1): du// byis pa'i sems rmongs bgyid par gzigs// lha'i bu sems kyi dbang phyug gis gsol pa// dul gyur nga las su rung ba'i// sems kyi rang bzhin rtog myed pa// gang la 'jig rten gting myi rnyed// mtshan
12b1(1): brtan pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu sems la dpa' bas gsol pa// gang gis sems la sems myed shes// mkhas pa sgyid yug myi 'gyur zhing // bdud sde rab tu 'dul bgying ba// de dag 'dir ris
12b2(1): zhes bgyi// lha'i bu sems kyis yang dag 'phags kyis gsol pa// gang dag sems la sems myed shes// de dag sangs rgyas sras lags te/ dpa' chen sangs rgyas chos rnams la// skyes bu de dag pa
12b3(1): dag 'phags// lha'i bu zhi ba'i sems kyis gsol pa// gang gis sems la dbang bgyis pa// sems can de dag ni rab zhi// bdud kyi zhags las rab grol bas// de dag bdud kyi dbang phyi mchi// sA'i/ 
12b4(1): bu sems mnyen pas gsosad pa// myi rnams gang dag sems mnyen zhing // bsnyend par dka' dang dpa' ba dang // khyod kyi banyam la gang mos pa// de dag 'dod par zhum myi 'gyur// lnga'i bu sems dag pa
12b5(1): gsol pa// sems dag las rnams gtsang gyurd cing / yang dag rtogs pas pyod bgyid pa// de dag rgyal ba'i bstan dpos ma// zab mo'i rnams la zhum myi 'gyur// lha'i bu
12b6(1): chos nyid la gnas pas gsol pa// gang gi yid ni chos// nyid la// rab tu dga' zhing thogs myed pa// de dag myi dang / nga sras po ste// zhi ba'i sar ni phyind pa lags// 
12b7(1): 'ibu chos la sems pas gsol pa// chos rnams thams cad chos dbyings su// 'drend pa de la bslabs pa rnams/ nyid la ni gang sems pa// de dag spyod yul ma yin myed/ 
12b8(1): lnga'i bu chos kyi dbyings la nges par byung gis gsol pa// myi mchog khyod kyi sras kyi rnams// chos kyi dbyings la nges byung ste/ 'drend pa khyod kyi sras de dag/ mtshan nyid gcig gis nges byung lags/ 
12b9(1): lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa// chos rnams kun gyi khyod yul ni// chos kyi dbyings shes rgyal bas gsungs// dpa' bo khyod na gang spyod pa'i// ye shes de ni bsam myi byang// lha'i bu chos
12b10(1): kyi dbyings la zhugs pas gsolang pa// chos kyi dbyings la gang zhugs pa// de dag ye zhes zas ma yas te// sangs rgyas chos la the tsom byed// sems cad bsams de dag mkhas// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings pa
13a1(1): bab kyis gsol pa// gang dag chos kyi mtshan nyid gcig/ chos kyi dbyings la bab pa rnams// de dag spobs pa'i stobs bskyed pa// bsam gyis myi khyab thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings
13a2(1): la 'jigs pa myed pas gsol pa// gang la de dag gnas pa'i// 'jigs pa myed pa thob myed pas// de dag rnams kyi spobs dang stobs// de la mtshungs pa myed pa 'byung // lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la mkhas
13a3(1): pas gsol pa// khyod ni chos dbyings mkhas pa ste// chos rnams kun la shi nad tu mkhas// lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin// chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par stond// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la gnas pas
13a4(1): gsol pa// chos rnams rang bzhin myed gzigs pas// khyod ni chos kyi dbyings la bzhugs// myi gnas zhum pa ma mchis te/ gzung ba ma mchis btang ma mchis// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la
13a5(1): spyod pas gsol pa// sangs rgyas spyod yul gang lags pa'i // chos kyi dbyings la khyod spyod de// bar snang mkha' dang 'dra ba'i'o// 'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal// lnga'i bu chos kyi
13a6(1): dbyings la rton pas gsol pa// gang dang gang gi sgo dag nas// skyes bu dam pa nyond mdzad pa// de'i sgo nas chos dbyingasahonang // de phyir rtags dang gzugs ma mchis// lha'i bu
13a7(1): chos kyi dbyings la bzon pas gsol pa// mngon par brtson sa chos kyi dbyings// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis mkhyerang // brtson sa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// ye shes pha rol phyir dpa
13a8(1): gyur// lha'i bu chos kyis tshim gyis gsol pa// dpa' bo khyod kyis skye bo 'di// chos kyi rab tu tshim par mdzad// chos kyi dbyings ni rnam mkhyend pas// 'drend pa byang chub mchog la bzhugs// lha'i bu
13a9(1): chos nyid chos kyi gting rnyed pas gsol ba// gting rnyed gyur pa'i 'gro ba kun// 'dren pa khyod kyi zhal cu sa// chos dbyings rnam par mkhyend pa'i// 'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ sna'i bu gnas shes
13a10(1): pa la rab tu gnas pas gsol pa// myi mchog 'drend pa sangs rgyas kyi// ye shes gnas 'ang chos dbyings te// rnam par 'drend pa stobs bcu po// gapal pyod pa de lags so// lha'i bu gnas la gnas
13b1(1): pas gsol pa// chos kyi dbyings ri gnas cen te// thams cad mkhye rang pa bzhud ba'i lam// de ni chos rnams thams cad kyang // mtshan nyid gcig par shes pa lags// lA'i bu gnas mngon par shes
13b2(1): gsol pa// khyod ni chos dbyings mngon bar mkhye nga // mtshan nyid gcig la mkhas pa ste// sems can kun gyi bsam pa yang // rkang gnyis gtso bo khyed kyis mkhye dang // lha'i bu gnas nas nges par byung ban
13b3(1): gsol pa// rnam par 'drend pa khyod kyi sras// gnas su bya ba chos dbyings shes// gsal bar 'tshal pa'i mkhas pa rnams// rang byung nyid du nges par byung // lha'i bu gnas la bslabs pas gsol pa// 
13b4(1): chos kyi dbyings la gang bslabs pa'i// skyes bu de dag byang chub zhugs// rang byung nyid du gnas rnyed pas// de dag rkang gnyis mchog tu 'gyur// lha'i bu gnas myed pa la mkhas pas gsol pa// gnas myed pa
13b5(1): ni gang 'tshal pa// de dag bde gshegs dgongs la mos// bdud rnams bye ba stong gis kyang // de dag rmongs par yong mya nus / lha'i bu gnas myed pa mngon par shes pas gsol pa/ 
13b6(1): gnas myed gang gis rig gyur pa// de dag thams cad bdud/ kye tshogs// bye bas byang chub myi bskyod ces// mkhas pa/ de dag sha nang tu dga'// lnga'i bu gnas myed pa'i dgongs pa
13b7(1): la mkhas pas gsol pa// gnas myed 'du shes mkhas pa ni// chos nyid la ni rab gnas te// sdig can bdud rnams bshal ba ni// ji ltar rta yis shing rta bzhin// lha'i bu gnas byed
13b8(1): pa la mkhas pas gsol pa// mtshan nyid gcig la mkhas pa po// chos kyi dbyings la bgegs bgyid pa'i// bdud kyi las ni gnas myed de// gnas myed do zhes rgyal bas gsungs// lha'i bu gnas dang
13b9(1): gnas ma yin pa'i rtogs pas gsol pa// gnas dang de bzhin gnas myin pa// byis pa'i blo can rnams la bas nad// rang gis de ni thugs chung nas// sems can rnams la khyod kyis bganang // sna'i bu sbyin
13b10(1): ba la mkhas pas gsol pa// sngon cad rgyu ni gang dag dang // las 'dra 'byung ba ma 'chal dpa'i// rgyu de khyod kyis thugs su chud // las kyi gnas kyang rab tu mkhyerang // lnga'i bu las la mkhas pas gsol / 
14a1(1): chags dang zhe sdang gti mug ni// las kyi rgyu zhes khyod kyis mkhyenang // gang gi rgyu yis bgyid de yang // gang zag mchog gis thugs su chung // lha'i bu ma 'ongs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ 
14a2(1): ma 'ongs pa'i dus dag na// myi rnams las gang bgyid 'gyur ba// de'i rgyu dang le nad pa dang // gnas dang las kyang khyod kyis mkhyen da// lha'i bu da ltar byung ba la lta bas gsol pa// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rte/ 
14a3(1): 'di dag gi// sems can rnams dang rmu dpa las// gnas dang las kyi lend pa rnams// kun kyang 'dre rad pa khyod kyis mkhyedang // lha'i bu stobs kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa// myi dbang khyod kyis pa
14a4(1): gzigs pa'i// las dang rgyu dag ma mchis te/ gnas dang skye ba 'ang ma mchis so// de bas khyod ni gang zag mchog/ 'i bu stobs la mngon par dga' bas gsol pa// las dang
14a5(1): rgyu dang de bzhin gnas// dus la rnam sbyin rnam gsum dang // ji ltar de'i le nang pa yang / khyod kyis mkhyen pas de srad demachod// lha'i bu stobs kyi blo gros kyis gsolang pa/ 
14a6(1): rgyu dang las dang lend pa dang // rnam par smind dang rkyen dang ga/ nas// rang bzhin bral bar khyod kyis mkhyend// de phyir/ rgyal ba mnyam pa myed// lha'i bu stobs kyis byung gis
14a7(1): gsol pa// rgyu dang las dang lend pa dang // gnas dang rkyen dang rgyu rnams dang // rnam sbyin so so yang dag rig/ thams cad nga par rab tu mkhyerang // lnga'i bu stobs la dga' bas gsol
14a8(1): pa// rgyu dang las dang le nad pa dang // gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud kyi rnams// khyod nyid rang gis mngon mkhyen te// rang bzhin myed par baha nang pa mdzad// sna'i bu stobs kyis rnam par che bas gsol ma/ 
14a9(1): rgyu dang las dang le rad pa dang // gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud kyi rnams// 'pho myed dbang phyug myed pa ste// rte na cing 'byung bar khyod kyis mkhyen // lha'i bu stobs kyis 'phags kyis gsolang ma// rgyu dang rkyen dang las/ 
14a10(1): rnams dang / rnam par smind pa stend pa rnams// de kun rang bzhin stong po zhes// seng ge ror khyod kyis gsungs// lha'i bu rkobs kyi rjes su 'brang bas gsol pa// 'jig rten las mi gang zhig gis/ 
14b1(1): khams ni gang zhig spel gyur pa// de dag rkang gnyis gtse bas mkhyerang // de bas khyod ni do zla byed/ lnga'i bu nyobs dang ldan kyis gsol pa/ khams gang la ni banyer bgyis shing // gang gis mdzo
14b2(1): las bgyis dang // de'i rnam sbyin ci 'dra ba// de kun spyan dang ldan pas mkhyen pa// lha'i bu stobs yang dag 'phags kyis gsol pa// khams gang la ni banyer bgyis shing // ji 'dra'i rang bzhin gyur pa'i
14b3(1): sems can thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen // phyag gi sor mo lnga dang 'dra// lha'i bu stobs la pyod pas gsol pa// khams gang la ni bste rang bgyis shing // bshes nyen ci 'dra rnyed gyur nas// 'du 'a
14b4(1): ci 'dra bgyid gyur da pa// de kun bla na myed pas mkhyen // lha'i bu stobs kyis byin kyis brlabs pas gsol pa// stobs kyi byin kyi rlabs mkhyend cing // 'drend pa de ni khams dang ni// 'du
14b5(1): 'jibashes gnyen tshogs kyi rnams// de dag myi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen // lha'i bu khams nges pas gsol pa// rnams de dang ni de le na dang // bshes gnyen de dang de 'grogs
14b6(1): pa// de la khyod kyis mkhyend pa nges// de phyir the tsom yod// mya mnga'// lha'i bu khams la rtend pas gsol pa// sems can gang na gnas gnas pa'i// 'khor ba de dnga'is
14b7(1): de dang // spyod dang skad dang 'gro ba rnams// myi mchog khyod kyi sa rab tu mkhyenang // lha'i bu khams la mkhas pas gsol pa/ ye shes gang gis khams de ni// 'drend pas mngon par mkhyen
14b8(1): pa'i// mkhyen de mkhyend pas tong ngo zhes// blo mchog mnga' bas yang dag baha nad // lha'i bu khams nas nges par 'byung gis gsol pa// khams gang la ni sten bgyis na// 'dus byas dag la ji srid
14b9(1): gnas// de ni khyod kyis ji bzhin mkhyen da// khyod la do zla ma mchis so// lha'i bu khams kyi rjes su song bas gsol pa// khams gang la ni bsnyen bgyis pas// yon tan ci snyed bskyed pa dang // rnam
14b10(1): par smin dang 'bras bu dag/ de dag ma lus khyod kyis mkhyend// lha'i bu khams la yang dag par zhugs pas gsol pa// khams gang la ri banye nad bgyid cing // 'gro ba ci 'dra 'dod bgyid pa// de yang khyod
15a1(1): / kyis thogs myed mkhyenang // de phyir khyod ni mkhas pas mchod// lha'i bu lam mngon par shes pas gsol pa/ khams gang la ni ba nyer bgyis pas/ 'gro ba ci 'drar mchi yi// sems cad ras
15a2(1): kyi lam dag kyang // ye shes mkhas pa khyod kyis mkhyenang // lha'i bu lam la myi 'jigs pas gsol pa// sems can log pa nyid nges shing // mya ngan 'das 'gro skal skyed pa// phung po gsum po de dag la/ 
15a3(1): khyod kyi ye shes nges par 'jug/ sna'i bu lam gyis nges par byung gas gsolang pa// sems can yang dag nyid nges te// ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i skal myed pa// de la 'jig rten sgron ma khyod// rtogs pa sogs pa myed
15a4(1): bar 'jug/ lha'i bu lam la mos pas gsol pa// ma nges phung por gyur pa la// gang zag gang rnams gnas pa rnams// de la ngan song ngan 'gro dang // mya ngan 'das pa 'ang khyod kyis bas dang // lnga'i bu
15a5(1): stobs kyi brdas gsol pa// sangs rgyas brda tsam nyid lagasate// de bzhin stobs dang ye shes dang // myi 'jigs bzhi dang / de bzhin du// kun rdzob ces ni thub pas gsungs// sA
15a6(1): bu yang dag mthong bas gsolang pa// sangs rgyas sangs rgyasachos rnams byed// ye shes gnas pa gzhan yang byed// don ngam nyid chu ba nya nang to zhes// de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis
15a7(1): mkhye dang / lha'i bu gobs la gnas kyis gsomad pa// sangs rgyas chos la tobs gnas pas// des na de la 'jigs myed de/ rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs kyi sras// ji ser 'dod dkur rnam sa
15a8(1): 'phrul// lha'i bu chos la 'jigs myed kyis gsol pa// kun rdzob dang ni don dam dang // de dag rab tu baha nad mchis kyang // kun rdzob dang ni don dam dang // brda yang dmyigs su ma mchis so// lha'i chu
15a9(1): bzhes sur men kyis gapos sa// brjod pa thams cad rnams ka'am// chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa ka'ang/ mtshan nyid ma mchis brjod ma mchis/ khyod rgyam mas kyim can 'drug cigs
15a10(1): semams sem na po yong pa// ngem par gyur nga pa'i sems sar rnams// gzhan kyi rgyang mchi'i gnas pa ma chim// log par nges rnams kun tu 'gror// drang srong chen po khyod kyis gzishes// ga'i dum pa
15b1(1): stobs kyis gsol pa// khams gang la ni bsnyen bgyis te// gang rnams ci 'drar mos 'gyur zhing // 'dod chags khams la sdug bsngal ba// de dag thub cer khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu myi sdug pa la nges
15b2(1): par byung gis gsol pa// ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na// 'dod chags khams ni rab tu byung // de la mos pa nges byung ba// de dag khyod kyis ci bzhin gzigs// lha'i bu byams pas nges par byung nis
15b3(1): gsol pa// ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na// zhe sdang khams ni rab tu 'byung // de la mos pa nges 'byung ba// de dag khyod kyis ci bzhin gzigs// sna'i bu rkyen 'dis nges par byung gis gsol pa// 
15b4(1): ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na// gti mug khams ni rab tu byung // de la mos pa nges 'byung ba// de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs/ lnga'i bu gtong bas nges par byung gis gsolang pa// 'tsho myed
15b5(1): 'jigs pa rnyed pa dag/ ser sna mngon par 'phel gyur te/ de la mos pa nges 'byung ba// de dag thub ce na khyod kyis gzigs// / lha'i bu dge ba'i bshes nyen gyis nges par byung gis gsol/ 
15b6(1): pa/ sdig pa'i grogs dang 'grogs pas na// 'thun pa'i khams ni rab tu 'byung // de la mos pa thob 'gyur ba// de dag 'dre nad pas rab tu mkhyen da/ lha'i bu rnam par shes pa'i
15b7(1): snying por 'dzind pas gsol pa// 'khor ba ra ni 'khor rnaMs kyis// ci 'dra'i khams la bste nad pa dang // mos pa de mthar phyin da pa dag/ khyod kyis ma lus rab tu mkhyen // sna'i bu nan/ 
15b8(1): tan snying por byed pas gsol pa// 'khor ba na ni 'khor rnams kyis// gang gi rgyu byung nan tan dang // mos pa de las gyurang pa yang // smad pa myed pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu dbang po la mos pas gson
15b9(1): // sems can gang kis khams gang la/ banyen maci ltar gyu rang gi// chu de khyod kyis rab tu mkhyenang // des na khyod ni dga' bar mdzad // lnga'i bu dbang po la myong pas gsol pa// sbyor ba gang gis / 
15b10(1): ba dang // gang gis rgya cher skye ba dang // dmyigs pa dang mi zhing rnams dang // dbang po khyod kyis rab tu mkhyenang // sna'i bu dbang po nges par byung gis gsol pa// 'dod pa'i sdug bsngal gnod gyur dang // sred pa
16a1(1): mngon par 'jug pa dang // sred pazhi bar bgyi ba'i don// de dag smra ba'i mchog gis mkhyen // lha'i bu dbang po'i pyod yul gyis gsol pa// dbang po nyam chung rnams dag ni// gzugs kyi
16a2(1): 'dod chags dben par 'tshal // sred pa rnam par gzhig pa yang // rkang gnyis dam pas bas nad pa mdzad// lha'i bu dbang po rnam par rgyal bas gsol pa// dbang po rtul po dur khrod brtenang // rang gi 'dod
16a3(1): chags 'bar bgyid// rkang gnyis gtso bo zhal mabong nas/ sred dang bcas pas khyod la sa/ lha'i bu dbang po rtogs kyis gsol pa// 'dod chags can dang 'dod chags dang // 'ding shes dang byi zhes dang / 
16a4(1): srid pa'i deng dbang po rnams// rnam par gzigs na sngon ma dmyig/ sra// lha'i bu dbang po la gnas pas gsol pa// zhe sdang gnyen por gyur pa'i// gnod sems myed dang dben pa dag/ dbang
16a5(1): po rtulang po nye nad pa'i che// khyod kyis 'gro ba'i bsam pa gzugs// lha'i bu dbang po la brtson pas gsol pa// zhe sdang gnyen po byams par gsung // sems can shes pa rjes
16a6(1): su skye// zhe sdang khams ni zhi bar bgyid// de dag myi mchog khyod kyis mkhyenang // lnga'i bu dbang po tshol bas gsol pa// gnod sems myed dang byams pa dang // zhib ngo bo nyid ma gag/ 
16a7(1): ngag dang nyon mongs ma dmyigs te// des na 'jig rten khyad par 'phags// lha'i bu dbang po rjes su 'brang gis gsol pa// me ga par rnam par rtog pa dang // log par nye bar rtond pa yang / 
16a8(1): nyon mongs dam phyir kun sbyor te// bzlog pas tha rad par 'gyur bar gzigs// lha'i bu ye shes yang dag sha rad kyis gsol pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // dngos la 'dzind pa mun pa ste// bzlog
16a9(1): pas snang ba chen por 'gyur// de ni grags cer khyod kyis mkhye rang // lnga'i bu ye shes 'dod chags chad pas gsol pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // mu nad pa snang ba dngos po rnams// rang bzhin nyid
16a10(1): kyis ma mchis te// de ni rkang gnyis gtso bos gzigs// lha'i bu snang ba 'dzind kyis gsol pa// sems can gang gi shes pa gang // ci tsam yongs su bsgrub bgyis dang // snod du gang rung ci snyed pa// de
16b1(1): myi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen da// lha'i bu dbang po dang zhe 'gras pas gsol pa// nyon mongs spang phyir shes gang gis// shes pa de la rtog bgyid pa// de yang nyond pa khyod kyis mkhyen // de bas khyod la mngon
16b2(1): bar dga'// lha'i bu dbang po la dga' bas gsol pa// yul dang dus dang gnas dag dang // pyod pa rnam par bsgom pa dang // nyon mongs ston mongs nas dag pa// thub pa khyod kyis stong par gzigs/ 
16b3(1): skra'i bu ye shes rgyal ma char gyis gsol pa// dbang po ni tshul 'bring dag dang // gang zag dag gi bsam pa dang // bcings dang ba rang dang bang dang shes// g.yo bskyed par khyod kyis mkhye nang / lha'i bu dbang po rje/ 
16b4(1): rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa// dbang po rab 'bring rtul ba dang / nyon mongs ye shes tshor ba dang // gdul dang 'dul bar bgyid pa dag/ khyod kyis mtshan nyid myed par gsungs// lha'i bu dbang po rnam par
16b5(1): brtags kyis gsol pa// sems can rnams kyi bsam / tan dang // rnam pa rang kun nas nyon mongs dang // snyoms 'jug ting 'dzi red ldang ba dang // rnam byang chub pa khyod kyis mkhyen
16b6(1): lha'i bu stobs kyi shugs kyis gsol pa// zhi ba ting nge'/ rang brten te// chos kur ngo bo nyid kyis mi// rang bzhin myed/ par khyod kyis mkhyerang // des na thams cad mkhye rad ces bgyi// 
16b7(1): lha'i bu stobs kyi go chas gsol pa// chos rnams gang dang ra bzhin gang // chos gang gis mi brjod bgyis pa// yang dag jiHzhin thugs su chung // des ma dus gsum chags myi mngal/ 
16b8(1): lha'i bu stobs 'dod kyis gsol pa// log par brtags pas kun nyon mongs// rnam pa bzhi ni skye bar 'gyur// las las skyes par de dag mkhyen // des na khyod la do zla myed// lha'i bu stobs shes kyis
16b9(1): gsol pa// nyon mongs rnams dang las rnams kyi// gnyen po rnam par byang ba dang // bstand pa'ang khyod kyis rab tu mkhyenang // des na khyod la do zla myed// lha'i bu stobs kyi 'od kyis gsol pa// @sa
16b10(1): gtan rnam tha rad ldang ba dang // snyoms par 'jug dang ting 'dzind dang // kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang dag/ mying tsam mo zhes khyod kyis bstand// lha'i bu stobs las byung gis gsol pa// bas gtan
17a1(1): rnam parang rnam byang dang // snyoms par 'dug dang ting nge 'dzin // bag yod pa las byung ba ste// de la khyod kyi ye shes 'jug/ lha'i bu stobs rnam par speld kyis gsol pa// dpa' bo rkyod
17a2(1): kyis mkhyen pa ni// bsam gtan la batshogs de dag dang // ldang dang rnam par byang la 'jug/ de ni rlung ltar chags pa myed// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la mkhas pas gsol pa// bskal pa bye ba grangs myed
17a3(1): du// srid pa de na sngon bzhugs che// srid pa'i skyon dang yong ma 'dres// des na khyod la do zla myed// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la gnas pas gsol pa// bskal pa bye ba grangs myed du// byang chub gzhal
17a4(1): yas chol mdzad cing // 'drend pas yongs su dpyang bas na/ des na khyod ni dpa' bo lags/ lnga'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la rtog pas gsol pa// sngon mkha' sbyin pa sna tshogs dag/ zo mcho// 
17a5(1): gsung tshe gsol pas na// spobs pa sna tshogs rab mnga'/ bar// rnam par 'drend pa des nges byung // lha'i bu sngon kyi mtha' la byang bas gsol pa// sngon chad 'khor bar/ 
17a6(1): spyod pa'i che// tshul rnams la ni tshul mkhas pa// 'jig rten sgron rnams khyod kyis gzigs// des na khyod ni tshul la mkhas// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' char phyi nad pas gsol
17a7(1): pa// sngon mthar chos rgyal mang po la// dpa' bos sngon chad spyod mdzad pas// thams cad mkhyenang du nges par byung // sems can mkhas la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul phun
17a8(1): sum tshogs pas gsol pa// byang chub mchog ni btsal ba'i phyir// bskul pa bye ba grangs myed du// sangs rgyas bye ba mtha' yas pa// de la khyod kyis sa bor btab// lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul la nges pas gso
17a9(1): pa// bskal pa bye ba brtag mdzad pas// chos kun sems can myed pa zhes// chos rnams thams cad nges par mkhyenang // 'du 'phro tsam du rgyal ba gsung // lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la sems pas gsolang
17a10(1): // bskald pa bye ba grangs myed du// gnas dang gnas myin rab mkhyend par// rnam par 'drend pa pyod mdzad pas// des na 'jig rten rmongs myi mngal// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la dpyod pas gsol / 
17b1(1): gnas dang gnas myin brten bgyis nas// las dang rgyu rnams dpyad pas na// khams dang dbang po mos pa dang // bsam gtan sngon gyi mtha' yang mkhyen nga // sna'i bu sngon gyi mtha' las yongs su rtog pas gsol
17b2(1): pa// khyod kyis sngon mtha' yongs btags pas/ stobs kyi ye shes nam bcu po// dpa' bo chen po rnam par spe lang // nges mi 'jig rten 'di sa gzigs// sA'i bu sngor gyim pa'i khyod yul gyis gsolang
17b3(1): pa// dpa' bos sems can thams cad kyi// sngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa dang // dge dang myi dge'i rgyu ba rnams// mkhye nad pas 'jig rten g.yo ba mdzad// lnga'i bu sngon gyimatha'i pyod pa la so sor rtog pas gsolang
17b4(1): pa// thub pas sngon gyi sems can gyi// sngon ma pa'i spyod pa rab mkhyerd cing // khams dang mos pa mkhyend pas na// de phyir sems can gso'al ba mdzad// lnga'i bu mos pa'i stobs can gyis gso/ 
17b5(1): ba// bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas su// sngon gyi maba'abartag bkyis kyang // khyod kyi dgongs pa chags myi mnga'/ des na mgon la bdag mos lags// lA'i bu ye shes la
17b6(1): mos pas gsol dpa// bskal pa bye ba grangs myed du/ sngon ma pa'i srid pa bsam bgyis kyang // rkang gnyis gtso bo'i sor tar gyi/ ma rol phyi nang nus 'ga' ma mchis/ 
17b7(1): lnga'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' la mkhas las gsos das// phyogabacu'i 'jig rten 'di dag gi// skye sa sna tshogs las ldanaH/ 'pho skye bar 'thung ba ngan// khyod kyis sangs rgyas byar / 
17b8(1): gzigs// lha'i buM phyi ma'i ma ba' las nges par byung gis gso lang ba// chu gang las ni las kA zhin/ bgyis shing rgyud drug pa rir gyur pa// de dag thams cad rgyal tham sa kye dang // des na thams ca sa
17b9(1): ces bgyi// sA'i bu shi 'pho dang skye ba mngon par shes pas gsol dpa/ khams gang gis ni sems can gang // bsgom par gyur cing las bgyid ba'i// bag chags las dang sems can dag/ khyod kyis
17b10(1): g.yo ba myed par mkhye rang // lha'i bu shi 'pho dang skye ba rig pas gsol pa// bshes nyes ci 'dra te rang bgyis shing // las gang mngon par 'dus bgyis pas// 'gro ba gang du mchi 'gyur ba// thub pa khyod kyis
18a1(1): / de sangs kye rang / lba'i bu dgos pa la sakhas pas gsol pa// las de'i ni bkyi ba kang / dgos pa khyod kyis rab tu sa kyerang // gang gi srung su las bgyis pa// de sangs sus rab tu ma byed/ 
18a2(1): lnga'i bu dngos po sa mkhas pas gsol pa// dngos po gang dag dmyigs pa dang // las gang mngor par 'dus bgyis pa// thams cad ma khyend pas de ma khyer nga te// de ni sangs rgyas khyod sul lags// na
18a3(1): su dngos po rig pas gsolang pa// sems cad rnams kyi bsam mkhas pa// dngos de ci ltar gnas pa dang // de ni ji snyer grub pa'i// las de khyod kyis mngor bar mkhyerang // lnga'i bu shes pa la mkhas pas
18a4(1): gsol pa// shes pa gang gis dngos po de// brtags par gyurd pa rab tu mkhyerang // de la ji ltar chags gyurd pa'ang // thub pa khyod kyis sha reng tu mkhye nang // lha'i bu mngon par 'du byed pa la sal
18a5(1): kyis gsol pa// chags pa gang gis las de rnams/ denyon mongs gang gis 'du bgyis pa'i// nyon mongs de dag yade dag mkhye rang // de bas khyod ni bdag gi mgon// lnga'i
18a6(1): bu 'gro ba la mkhas pas gsol pa/ 'gro ba gang tu las gang gis// mchis shing sgrib pa gang rnyed nas/ 'bras bu/ khob par myi 'gyur ba// de kun phyan ldan khyod kyis mkhyerd// 
18a7(1): lha'i bu dbyigs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa// 'gro ba de ga tu skyes rnams kyi// gang gis las rnams sbyin 'gyur ba'i/ dmyigs pa khyod kyis rab mkhyend te// de la khyod kyi blo gros
18a8(1): 'jug/ lha'i bu bag chags la mkhas kyis gsol pa// 'gro dang 'gro bar mya rnams kyis// sngan chad bgyis pa'i sdig las dang // de bzhin dge ba'i las rnams kyi// bag chags khyod kyis rab tu
18a9(1): mkhye dang // sna'i bu las la mkhas kyis gsol pa// 'gro bar 'byung po thams cad kyi// rnying dang gsar rang spang ba dang // las rnams gsum po khyod kyis mkhye rang // del so so'i skye bo 'bruyang / 
18a10(1): lha'i bu rnam par sbyin pa la mkhas kyis gsol pa// chung zhing rnam sbyin che ba dang // che zhing nas spyi nang chung ba dang // chung ngam che 'am mnyam pa 'ang rung // de la mu stegs can rnams mongs// lha'i bu las
18b1(1): mkhas kyis gsol pa// tshe 'di las rnams gang lags dang // skyes pa'i las rnams gang lags dang // lan grangs gzhan gyi gang lags pa// de dag phyan ldan khyod kyis mkhye nang // lha'i bu tshe 'di la myong
18b2(1): bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa// tshe 'di la ni gang bgyis pa'i// las kyi rnam sbyin myi gang dag/ myong bar 'gyur ba gang dag la// so so'i skye bo rmongs pa mkhyenang // lA'i bu skyes nas myong bar
18b3(1): 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa// gang gis las gang bsags gyur te// skyes nas rnam par sbyin 'gyur ba// gang la 'jig rten gting myi rnyed // shes rab chen pos de yang mkhyerang // lha'i bu lan
18b4(1): grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ las gang bskal pa bye ba'i// phyi dus rnam par spyi rang 'gyur zhing / dus gzhan dag na yang 'byung ba// de dag yang dag nyid du mkhyedang // 
18b5(1): lha'i bu yongs su ma sbyind pa myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa// las rnams gang zhig bgyis gyur pa// yo nas su sbyi nang par ma gyur ngan// re srid 'bras bu myi 'byi na da// 
18b6(1): rkang gnyis mchog gos de yang mkhyen nga // lha'i bu yongs su ma sbyind pa myong bar 'gyur ba la rtogs pas gsol pa// sa gang dang ni ldan pas ra// sems can 'di ni skyer 'gyur ba// 
18b7(1): pham pa myed pas de mkhye na te// yongs su brtags nas ra tu mkhye rang // sna'i bu yongs su spyi rad pa myong bar 'gyur ba la ma'apas gsol ba// las mi ji skar longs sbyi ra// 'bras/ 
18b8(1): bu dkar bar 'gyur ba mkhye nang // de la khyod kyi ye shes 'jug/ de dag stong par rnam par mkhyenang // lha'i bu yongs su smyind pa myong bar 'gyur ba la nges pas gsol ba// thams cad mkhye nad pas las kyi
18b9(1): rnams// kyi ring yang ba rab tu mkhye nang// sems parla bsam bzugs su chud// de srang bcom ldan bdag kan+da/ dzA'i bu lI yang la mkhas kyis gso lang ba// las gang gis ni sems cad rnamapa/ 
18b10(1): ngan song mchi bar 'gyur ba dang / sri ba dpani yeng ba gzigs// re shes ma khyen pas rab tu mkhye dang // sna'i bu sems can gyi pyod pa la mkhas kyis gsol ba// sems can pyod pa nyer bzung zhing/ 
19a1(1): las kyi sa dang yang ba dag// dpa' bo khyod kyis rab tum khyedang // mu shegs car rams del rmongs/ sna'i bu sems cad tu pyod pa la dpyod pas gsos nga// sems par myod pa kyang yang cing
19a2(1): las kyi rnam par spyi ring pa bsta nang // phor bu'i chu dang gang ka'i chu// yan nas rnam par bas rang pa bzhin// lha'i bu las la mkhas kyis gsolang pa// slob dang kyi slob rnam par sbyinang // rkang gnyis dam / 
19a3(1): go rang mdzad cing // kun nas nyon mongs las myong nas// las ni zad par 'gyur ba bas rang // lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la reg par byed pas gsol pa// sangs rgyas sbyar gyis 'ams gsum na// @
19a4(1): kyi 'bras bu rte nad pa'i// byis pa dag dang mkhas pa gzigs/ phra gzigs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lha'i bu las zad par byed pas gsol pa/ 'jig rten dag na rnam 'dren khyod// sems
19a5(1): can rnams kyi shi 'pho dang // skye ba kun la ye shes 'dug/ mkhye rang pas 'jigs byed phyag kyang 'tshal// lnga'i bu dbyigades pa myed pa la spyod pas gsolang pa// 'chi 'pho ba dang skye/ 
19a6(1): dpalas// 'gro dang de bzhin sems can dang // rnam sbyin rmyi lam 'drar bas nad pa// 'dre nad pa rkang gnyis mchog gis/ mkhyenang // lha'i bu nyon mongs pa la rtog pas gsol pa// 
19a7(1): ji skar myi la ma skom pa zhig/ shi nang tu bsil ba'i chu 'thungs pazhin// rkang gnyis mchog khyod 'dod chags dang // zhe sdang ga ti mug/ rnams kyang zang // lA'i bu yongs su rtog pa dang bral bas gso
19a8(1): pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// yongs su rtog las skyes pa ste// rmyi lam dga' ba rtse ba bzhin// smra mchog khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu yongs su rtog pa zhi bar byed pas gsol pa/ 
19a9(1): yongs su rtog pa rab zhibs// nyor mongs pad pas rab bas rang te// rmyi la ma la di srin myed ltar// myi mchog khyod kyis rab tu mkhye dang // lnga'i bu zag pa la rtog pas gsol pa// rmyi lam char chen 'bab pa
19a10(1): skar// de bzhin zag pa rnams 'byung bar// zag pa 'byung ba mkhas pa po// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bsta nang // lha'i bu rmyi lam rtog gis gsol da pa// rmyi lam char chen 'bab pa ltar// de bzhin zag pa
19b1(1): rnams 'thung ste// nor pa rnams la zag 'byung bar// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bas nang // lha'i bu ri sa pa bzhin du rtogs pas gsolang ba// ji skar bu mo myi la ma na// bu zhig thung la shi 'phos ma// 
19b2(1): dang sdug bsngal ror 'gyur ba// de bzhin 'gro ba khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu rmyil ma rtog pas gsol pa// rmyil ma dag na mgo bcang bzhin// khyod kyis bag bzang pa gzigs// de ni mkhas pa rnams la na
19b3(1): thams cad gzigs la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu blo gros nges par brtags kyis gsol pa// chos kun mkhyen pa khyod kyis ni// ji skar rmyi la ma mdza' phreng dang // bral ba yang dag ma mchis gzigs// 
19b4(1): bci bzhin tshim par mdzang // lha'i bu ye shes yid kyis gsol pa// khyod kyis dam pa'i chos stong pa// zos ma yid ni dgar gyur te/ rmyilam dgar myibs rang bzhin// de ltar rgyal bas bsanang pa
19b5(1): mdzad// lha'i bu yongs su dag pa'i yid kyis gsol ba/ dme long gzugs brnyanar snang ba bzhin// 'gro ba mtha' dag gaH/ gas pas ni// bsam gtan mnga' 'khyod la mi// 8
19b6(1): bcas 'jig rten yid kyang dga'// lha'i bu blo gros nges pas gsol pa// thub pa pi bang sgra 'dra ba'i// khyod kyi dam chog khos gyur ngam// lA bu rnams kyang be tsom por// rgyal ba
19b7(1): mchog la phyag kyang 'tshal// swa'i dri snrums tshim gyis gsol dpa// sbrum mkhan pos sprum dag/ byis pa rmongs byed yongs baha na na// phyi ma khas de la rmongs par 'gyur// spras
19b8(1): bzhin du khyod kyis pa ha rang / lha'i bu srul pa la sems pas gsol pa/ dzaM ltar myi lam sbru mthong ba// de ltar khyod kyis 'gro ba gzigs// mgon po bas nad pa de thos na// bdag cag the com ma mchi
19b9(1): //  rgyas pa byung ga pa po //  po rgya sus snyam sa ma pa padu// des mongs par 'gyur / de di kyang
19b10(1): lha'i bu rtog pa'i rjes su rtog pas gsoso pa// bi sam mthon bas myos ma ma// sangs rgyas sku gzugs btags pa bzhin// de ltar rtog pas 'jig rten bskyed// rnam par 'dre rang pa khyod kyis gzigs/ 
20a1(1): lha'i bu kun tu rtog pa 'jom gyis gsol pa// kun rtog 'dod chags rgyu lags te// 'dod chags dngos pos bskyed ma lags// rtog pa ngan pas 'dod chags byung // de ni rnam 'dren khyod kyis
20a2(1): gzigs// lha'i bu yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas gsol pa// ri sul dag nas sgra byung ba// brag cha sems can sgra ma lags// de bzhin 'jig rten khyod kyis gzigs// de skad 'jig rten chags myi mnga'// / 
20a3(1): lha'i bu stond pa la mkhas pas gsol pa// sgra ni gang yang ma mchis te// sgra ni brag cha 'dra ba lags// 'o rad kyang myi dbang khyod kyis ba ha nang // byis pa mang po rab tu bcud// lha'i bu nan tan la mkhas pas
20a4(1): gsol pa// chos rnams don ni gzhan lags kyang // byis parnams kyis gzhan du brtags// ran tan chos las shes par bgyi/ de la bdag ni the tsom chad// lha'i bu don gyi rjes su 'brang bas gso/ 
20a5(1): pa// chos don yang dag gang lags pa// de ni sus kyang ma rtogs shing // sus kyang ma 'bastan 'tshal ma 'gyur// de/ skad thub pa'i mchog gis gsungs// lha'i bu chos kyi brda'
20a6(1): rtogs pas gsol pa// zag dang dri ma nyon mongs dang // @\u0f7f/ chags dang ni rnyog dang rtog/ kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag pa// thub pa brda'i tshig kyang lags// lha'i bu kun tu rtog pa la
20a7(1): mkhas pas gsolang pa// kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag dang / zag pa dag dang nyon mongs dang // gang dang bshad dang nye ru dang // na pa 'di kun bying tsam lags// lha'i bu myi gnas pa'i TI gas
20a8(1): kyis gsol pa// khams gsum rnams la ma chags te// nam mkha' 'dra ba'i thugs mnga' ba/ bral bar gyurd cing sbyin pa'i gnas// zhi ba'i sems la phyag kyang 'tshal// lnga'i bu ma gos pas sam
20a9(1): pa// thub pa khyod kyi thugs yid ni// gzugs dang gzugs myed myi gnas shing // 'dod dang mya ngan 'das pa la// gnas pa ma mchis par snang 'dra// lha'i bu re ba myed pas gsold pa// 'don pa'i
20a10(1): la re ba spangs// gzugs dang gzugs myed gnyi gar phyin// 'du 'ji dag dang bral gyur ba// sred zad khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu sred pa byung bas gsold pa// 'thung ba dag dang 'jig pa la/ 
20b1(1): khyod kyi sred pa yang dag chad// khams gsum kun la chags myi mang la// rnam par 'dren la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu sred pas zild kyis mnand kyis gsol pa// 'jig rten 'di dag zil ma nang nas/ 
20b2(1): khyu mchog dam pa khyod mdzad cing // sems can 'jig rten sgrol mdzad pa// thugs bze khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu sred pa dang bral bas gso mad pa// kun tu sbyor dang bral ba te// yang sred pas
20b3(1): pas zhir gyur da pa// dag pa'i bdag nyid dag pa'i sems// dus dang bral la phyag 'tshal lo// lha'i bu ji lta ba bzhin du rig pas gsol ba// chos rnams thams cad dngos byed pa// ji bzhin dpa' bo khyod
20b4(1): kyis mkhyend// bcings pa ma mchis grol ma mchis// yang dag gzigs la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu 'das las rgal pas gsol pa/ 'dod pa'i 'das las rgalang pa ste// srid pa'i 'dam las de
20b5(1): bzhin rkalang// gzigs pa myi mnga' len myi mngal/ yang srid zang la phyag kyang 'tshal// lnga'i bu zang zing spangs kyis gsolang ba// yang 'di spangs shing drim spangs// re Ta
20b6(1): spangs shing sdig pa'ang spangs// sangs rgyas sgrib pa namangs pa// don rtogs khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// sA'i dru re ba spangs pas gsol pa// don dang don ma lags pa
20b7(1): spangs// chags pa myi mnga' nges rtogs pa// bdud kyi zhe gas las rnam 'das pa// le nad myed khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ lnga'i bu phan par 'dod pas gsol pa// bdag nyid dang rigs
20b8(1): rnams kyi// las kang nyon mongs rims myed pa// sgrib pa myed par gzigs pa po// dpa' cher khyod kyis de yang gzigs// sA'i bu grags pa thob pas gsol pa// 'drend pa 'jig rten rnam grags pa/ 
20b9(1): @khyod kyi mkhyenang la bzon pa rnams// ci skad paha rang bzhin rab rtog na// nyon mongs rnams ni nub par 'gyur// lA'i mu 'jigs pa myed pas gsolas pa// chos rnams kun la nges pas ma// sngo ba gang yang
20b10(1): yod ma gzigs// ye shes rgya mtsho mya bsnyengs par// seng ge'i sgra ni sgrog pa mdzad// lha'i bu gang nas kyang 'jigs pa myed pas gsol pa// 'jigs pa kun las yang dag rgalang // zug du thams cad su
22a1(1): pa// nyon mongs thams cad zhir gyur pa nas// bag chags ma lus yongs su bsaHla da/ bsnyengs pa myi mnga' rgyal sras dang // cis kyang myi bsnyengs spyod pa mdzad// lha'i bu zad pa la rtog pas
22a2(1): gsol pa// thub pa thams cad mkhyend pa khyod// nyon mongs bag chags bcas par bas// 'jig rten sgron ma khyod la ni// mtshungs pa gang yang myi dmyigs so// lha'i bu bag la nyal phyung gis gsol
22a3(1): pa// khyod kyis bag chags ma lus bsaHla // khyod la skyon dri yong ma mchis// de slad sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyend// lha rnams kun gyi thub pa'i thub// lha'i bu mtha' na gnas pas gsol pa// 
22a4(1): zag pa rnams ni spangs pas na// skye ba'ang skye ba ma lags te/ thub pa khyod skye tha ma pa// des na mgon po bsnyengs myi mnga'// lha'i bu tshad srung gis gsol pa// dpa' bo khyod kyis sa bo
22a5(1): spangs// sdug bsngal myu gu tshig par 'gyur// mya ngan khri shing rnam par bskams// gdung ba myed la phyag kyang 'cha/ la// lnga'i bu shing rtags bton gyis gsol pa// phub
22a6(1): pa thams cad mkhye pa khyod// ma rig shing rtags rnams kyang bsaHyang // sangs rgyas pyod pa rnam par sbyangs// de khas nyo nad pa bsnyengs myi mnga'// lha'i bu srid pa'i pha
22a7(1): rol tu song bas gsol pa// srid pa'i mtsholas yang dag rga lang // rnam par 'dren pa bya ba byas// khyod kyi snang ba yang dag phyung // 'jigs myed khyod ni don kyang grub// lha'i bu mya ngan/ 
22a8(1): las 'da' bar 'gro bas gsol pa// thams cad mkhyend pa zhir gyur pa// nyon mongs thams cad rab tu bshig/ bag chags rdul tsam yong mya mnga'// mgon po khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i
22a9(1): chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa// khyod kyis chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng // nga rgyal rgyal mtshar rab tu bsnyal// chos kyi lam srang mtha' yas pa// dpa' bo chen po khyed kyis baha rang // lha'i bu chos kyi
22a10(1): 'byung gnas kyis gsol pa// sangs rgyas chos kyi 'byung gnas po// thub pa chos rnams kun mkhyend pa// sems can kun gyi dge bshes gnyen// ye shes mchol phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu chos
22b1(1): gos can gyis gsol pa// khyod kyi sras po 'jigs myed pa// seng ge'ing ro nam sgrog kyang // rgyal sras de dag chog myed cing // sangs rgyas chos kyi don kyis skom// lha'i bu chos ngo rang tu gnyer bas gsong
22b2(1): pa// sangs rgyas chos rnams don gnyer bar// khyod kyi sras rnams sems bskyed cing // khyod kyi myi 'jigs thos gyurang nas// mkhas pa de dag byang chub chol// lha'i bu chos kyis skom gyis gsos pa/ 
22b3(1): khyod kyi myo 'jigs thos gyur nas// sangs rgyas chos rnams btsal ba'i phyir// srog chags bye ba skom gyur te// batshon 'grus brtan par rab tu chom// 
22b4(1): kyis 'phags kyis gsolang pa// sangs rgyas chos kyisadon 'phags shing // 'jigs pa myed par 'dul mdzad pa'i na/ degasung ba'i mchog grurang khyod mthong nas// brtul zhugs
22b5(1): mchog cen byang chub tshol// lha'i bu chos 'dzind kyis gas lang ba// thub pa zab cing blta dka' ba'i// chos ni khyod sa rab bstand pa// khyod kyi sras kyis zos gyur nas/ 
22b6(1): de dag za phyed byang chub tshol// lU'i bu lwa ba myed pas gsol pa// khyod kyi seng ge'i gsung thos nas// khyod kyi sras po dpanges pa// sus dang srog la myi lta bar// byang chub don chus / 
22b7(1): ba bgyid// lha'i bu gzhan du myi sems pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa// thub pa bsnyengs pa mya mnga' ba// khyod kyi dam chos 'dir thos nas// gzhan du sems pa ma mchis par// brtul zhugs mchog can
22b8(1): byang chub tshol// lha'i bu gzhan du myi 'gro bas gsol pa// myi dbang khyod kyi gsung thos nas// theg pa gnyis po spang ba gyis shing // lam gzhan du ni myi mchi bar// bla na myed pa'i byang chub tshol// lA'i
22b9(1): bu nye bar gnas kyis gsol pa// seng geling ro 'di bsgrags pa// rgyal ba'i sras kyis thos gyur pa na/ byang chub mchog la nyer gyurd cing // de dag rkang gnyis dam par 'gyur// lha'i bu spobs pa nye ba/ 
23a1(1): gyur pas gsol pa// grags cer khyod kyis gsung brjod pa'i// spobs de ni thos gyu rang ras// sangs rgyas chos la khyod kyi sras// ku nad kyang dga' ba rab tu skyed// sA'i bu spobs pa tho pa sa
23a2(1): gsolang pa// 'jigs myed khyod kyis gsung bsgrags pa// ma smang bras kyis thos gyur par// de dag spobs pa ram bu yang // sangs rgyas nyid las phyir mya ldog/ lnga'i bu rtag tu rab dgas gsomang pa/ 
23a3(1): 'jigs myed khyod kyis gsung bsgrags pas/ hobs cer khyod kyi sras kyi rnams// rtag tu rab tu dgar gyur cing // ma spang de dag byang chub tshol// lha'i bu yid zhum pa skyed pas gsol pa// khyod kyis gsu
23a4(1): bsgrags pos gyur nas// rkang gnyis dam pa khyod kyi sras// 'ga' zhing gus pa la mchis par// byang chub mchog ni tshol bar bgyid// lha'i bu logs skyed yid kyis gso yad pa// khyod kyi gsung bsgrags thos las na/ sems rangs gyur cing ying dga' te// de dag ni
23a5(1): ni nas du yang // byang chub nyid du thogs ma mchis// lha'i bu chos la bar chad myed pa mkhas pas gsol pa// chos rnaMs gang la banyend bgyis kyang // dkar po'i phyogasadag myi 'grib cing // de'i bar chad myi 'gyur ba'i// gan ni grub pa khyod kyis ma khyer// lha'i bu
23a6(1): chos sa par brtan pa sa mkhas pas gso'adag/ dkar po'i phyogs la dpyod pa la/ bar chad 'byung bar myi 'gyur zhing // gnas kyang myed par grub pas mkhyenang // des na stond pa bsnyengs myi mngal/ 
23a7(1): lha'i bu chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas pas gsol pa// dge la kun nas nyon mongs pa// nag po'i phyogs kyi rang bzhin te// khyod kyi thugs na des myi gos// gnas kyang myed par thub pas mkhyen // lA
23a8(1): bu rigs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa// nag po'i chos ni nam du yang // dkar ba'i chos dang myi 'grogs par// rigs par bcom ldan khyod kyis gsungs// des na bcom ldan bdag gi blo/ lnga'i bu dge ba dang kyi
23a9(1): dge pa rig pas gsolang ba// chos rnams thams cad la 'dres par/ dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis mkhye rang // kun nas nyor mongs brtags pas ma// dkar po'i phyogs las 'grib par 'gyur// lha'i busam sa
23a10(1): mkhas pas ga mo yong pa// kun nas nyon mongs pyod pa la// dkar po'i phyogs 'i myo 'byung ste// de ltar 'cha yang bar ma gyurang la// bar chad du 'i 'gyur bar gsungs// lha'i bu ba rang pa 'dod kyis gsol dang / 
23b1(1): nag po'i phyogs la ter bgyid pa// ba rang par 'dod pa mang po'i// bar du gcod par 'gyur zhes gsungs// des na rgyal khyod thams cad mkhyerang // lha'i bu dag pa'i sems kyis gsolang ba// sems grol
23b2(1): bgyi bar gang 'tshal bas// kun nas nyon mongs shes bya zhes// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis gsungs// des khyod 'jig rten mchod rten lags// lha'i bu nyon mongs mthong gis gsol pa// kun nas nyon
23b3(1): mongs spyod bgyid cing // kun nas nyon mongs ma 'tshal da na// dam pa'i chos na shes myi nus// de skad bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// lha'i bu sdig mthong gis gsol pa// sdig pa rnams la bsnyen
23b4(1): byas kyang // dge ba myi 'grib gang smra ba// de ni ze rang chos skal myed ces// rkang gnyis dam pa khyod kyis gsungs// lha'i bu dul bar bya bas gsol pa// chags pa gdul bar gang 'dod dang // zhe sdang
23b5(1): gti mug 'dul 'dod pas// thub pa'i spobs pa ci 'dra ba/ de lta bur minan tan bgyi// lA'i bu kun nas nyon mongs pa dag/ debs gso yod pa// ngag dang kun ras nyor mongs pa/ 
23b6(1): mkhas gang rnams mya shes pa// de dag nyond pa sangs rgyas myin// de skad drang srong mchog gis gsungs// lha'i bu \u0f7f/ rang pa la brtson pas gsol pa// nyon mongs 'grib par
23b7(1): 'gyur ba'i chos// rgyal ba yis ni gang bsta nad pa// de bsnyen nyon mongs myi zad ces// khyod la rgol ba song ma mchis// lnga'i bu tha rad pa la mngon par phyogs pas gsol pa// chos gang nyon
23b8(1): mongs gang gi rnams// zad 'gyur thub pas ba ha nad pa la// yang dag brtson pa myi zad ces// rgol ba 'di ni yong myi dmyigs// lha'i bu rnal 'byor de la brtson pas gsol pa// rgyal khyod kyis nyan thos la/ 
23b9(1): gang gi don tu chos bsta nad pa// de batshor bgyis pas mya 'thob ces// 'di ni khyod la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu myi 'jigs dpal gyis gsol pa// 'dod chags spang phyir myi sdug pa// bsam la yang dag 'tho
23b10(1): bgyis na/ 'dod chags zad par myi 'gyur zhes// khyod la rgol ba yong ma mchis// lha'i bu 'gro ba myed pa rab tu shes kyis gsol pa// shi nad tu bsnyengs pa myi mnga' ba// zhe sdang spang phyir byams gsungs pa
24a1(1): de bsgrubs mesad par myi 'gyur zhes/ dgra 'jom pa khyod la rgos ma mchis/ sA'i bu myig rnam par dag gis gsol pa// shes rab gti sug spang ba'i phyir// gsungs pa de la banyed bgyis kyang / 
24a2(1): gti mug 'phelang par myi 'gyur zhes/ 'di ni khyod la rgol ma mchis// lnga'i bu rnam par rtog pa 'jom gyis gsol pa// rnam par rtog pa'i gnyer por ni// dbugs 'byung rngub pa dran gsungs pa// de la bzo
24a3(1): bgyis myi zhi zhes// 'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu mtshan ma myed pa lhur le nad pas gsol pa// nga'o snyam pa spangs slad du// stong nyid khyod kyis bka' saHlang te// des ni des zhi myi 'gyur zhes// 'di/

24a5(1): 'di ni khyod la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu sems rgyun rnam paradag pas gsol pa// lhag pa'i bsam pas dag pa yi// nyon mongs thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// des ni nyon mo
24a6(1): myi zad ces// 'dir khyod la rgol ma mchis// lnga'i bu 'du shes rnam par bshig gis gsol pa// phyogs dang gnyer po'i rnam pa dang // nyor mongs lam dngapa lam 'jug pa// 'jig
24a7(1): paskyed par rgol ba ni// thub pa chen po ma mthong ngo // lnga'i bu ma spyad shi ring tu shes pas gsol pa// bcom ldan phyogs dang phyogs sbyin dang // zad dang ma zad ba snyad tsam// 'jigs pa ma mchis rgos/ 
24a8(1): bgyid pa// thub pa de ni myong tsam mo// lha'i bu lus kyi las dul bas gsol pa// mkhyend pas yongs su mkhyend gyur da nas// khyod kyi sku'i phrin las 'jug/ thams cad ma lus mkhyend pas na// des na 'dres/ 
24a9(1): pa thams cad mkhyenang// lha'i bu lus kyi las yongs shes pas gsold pa// sems can rnams la thugs brtse bas// dpa' khyod sku'i phrin las ni// mtha' dag shi nad tu nges pa lags// 'jig rten mgon la phya/ 
24a10(1): kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus kyi las shi nad tu nges pas gsol pa// sku'i phrin las rab nges par// lus can kun la sman slad du// 'jig rten sgron ma khyod mdzad de// des na khyod ni gang zag mchog/ lha'i bu
24b1(1): lus kyi las kyi mtha' shi nid tu mthong bas gsolang pa// sems can kur la sman srad du// 'dre nang pa thams cad mkhye rang pa ni// sku'i phrin las dag pa dang // legs par yongs su brtags dang sngam/ lnga'i bu lu
24b2(1): kyi las kyi mtha' shi ring tu mnyam par bzhag pas gsolang pa// shi ning tu mnyam par ba'ag sku dang // sku'i phri las nam ngag dang / ldan par sems cad bde don tu// gang zag mchog gi spyod pa ma dzang / lha'i rdu
24b3(1): grub kyis gsolang pa// snyan cing yon tan ldan pa dang / rtsub pa yongs su spangs pa'i gsung // mkhye nad pas shi rang tu songs brtags shing // margar po khyo gsung ba mdzad // lA'i bu dus su smrams gso nga/ 
24b4(1): pa// dus su don dang ldan pa dang // don byed yongs su spangs pa'i gsung // gzung bar 'os dang blang 'os pa// 'dre rang ba khyod ni gsung ba mdzad// lA'i bu bskums byed tho gros kyis na po meng pa// dbyer

24b7(1): 'gro ba thams cad kyang // sangs rgyas chos rnams btsal slad du / thub pa'i gsung la sdod pa ni// yang dag gsungs pa'i rgyu 'dzun lags// lha'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha' las nges par byung gis
