69a4(1): mu khyud de'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling du phyind nas snying rje chen po dang ldan zhing thabs mkhas pa la shi nang tu bslabs pas sems can bye ba dpag tu myed pa dag sangs rgyas kyi bas rang ba la btul bar gyur to// 
69a5(1): rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba byung / ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du the tsom 'am nem nur za na rgyal po khyod kyis de ltar mya blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po
69a6(1): chen po nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po mu khyud ces bya bar gyur pa to// rgyal po chen po 'di ltar rgyal po mu khyud lha'i dbang po brgya byi/ na gyi han phyed la dga' ba myed pas mu khyud kyi bag yod pa'i
69a7(1): stobs bskyed pa la ltos/ rgyal po chen po de lta bas na/ khyod kyis bag yod par sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bzor bar bya'o// rgyal po cher po sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ rgyal po che
69a8(1): po ches thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so// de skad ces bka' saHlad pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du gal te chos thams cad sa
69a9(1): rgyas kyi chos lags na/ de lta na ni sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlang pa/ rgyal po chen po gang dag phyin ci me log pa de dag na sangs rgyas so// rgyal po chen po
69a10(1): sangs rgyas shes bya ba de ni de kho na mthong ba'i tshig bla dgas so// de kho na mthong ba zhes bya ba de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' tshig bla dgas so// yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba de ni chos kyi dbyangs kyi tshig bla dgas so// rgyal po chen po
69b1(1): chos kyi dbyings shes bya ba de 'i gzhan cun mying tsam 'am/ brda tsam 'am/ bsnyad tsam 'am/ kun rdzob tsam 'am/ brjod pa cam la/ gdags pa tsam ma gtogs par bta rang bar myi nus so// rgyal po chen po ra ra
69b2(1): cad skye ba myed pa 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la ni chos thams cad myi g.yo mya'i gul zhing rlom sems myed pas de'i phyir de ni gzungs kyi sgo'o// rgyal po chen po chos thams cad 'gag pa myed pade
69b3(1): gzungs kyi sgo ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la chos thams cad myi g.yo myi 'gul zhing rlom sems myed pas de'i phyir de ni gzungs kyi sgo'o// de bzhin du chos thams cad mtshan nyid myed pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / ma
69b4(1): skyes pa dang / rang bzhin myed pa dang / rnam par rig pa myed pa dang / ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang / 'ong ba myed pa dang / 'gro ba myed pa dang / sems can myed pa dang / srog myed pa dang / 
69b5(1): gso ba myed pa dang / gang zag myed pa dang / spros pa myed pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / rtags myed pa dang / kun nas dkris pa skye// dad pa dang / bag la nyal myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs par
69b6(1): gyurd pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa dang / rjes su chags pa myed pa dang / khong khro ba myed pa dang / bcings pa myed pa dang / la ba myed pa dang / 'gro ba myed pa dang / rgyug pa myed pa dang / ldog
69b7(1): pa myed pa dang / dma' ba myed pa dang / gnas pa myed pa dang / 'dun po myed pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa myed pa dang / ro rang pa myed pa dang / sa pa po myed pa dang / rnam par zhes pa po myed pa dang / mthong ba sa
69b8(1): myed pa dang / myi mthong ba myed pa dang / tshul khrims myed pa dang / tshul khrims ma yin pa myed pa dang / 'gyod pa myed pa dang / myi 'gyod pa myed pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba myed pa dang / mchog tu myi dga' ba myed pa dang / dag
69b9(1): ba myed pa dang / myi dga' ba myed pa dang / sha nang tu sbyangs pa myed pa dang / sha nang tu ma sbyangs pa myed pa dang / bde ba myed pa dang / myi bde ba myed pa dang / ting nge 'dzid myed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ma yin pa myed pa dang / yang
69b10(1): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin myed pa dang / log pa myed pa dang / yid byung ba myed pa dang / yid ma byung ba myed pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba myed pa dang / 'dod chags dang ma bral ba myed pa dang / lta ba myed pa dang / lta ba ma yin
70a1(1): myed pa dang / rnam par grol ba myed pa dang / rnam par ma grol ba myed pa dang / shes pa myed pa dang / myi shes pa myed pa dang / mthong ba myed pa dang / ma mthong ba myed pa dang / las myed pa dang / rnam par smir
70a2(1): pamyed pa dang / tshul bzhir byed pa dang / tshul bzhini ma yin pa myed pa dang / rnam pa'i sgo bdun cu po de dag gis rgyal po chen po chos thams cad la 'jug par bya'o// rgyal po chen po gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ma byung
70a3(1): 'thung ba ltar yang skyed do// rgyal po chen po de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par zhes pa'i rang bzhi ma ri ma byung myi 'thung / da ltar yang myed do// rgyal po snyin po 'di sa nyed dper sa / 
70a4(1): kyi rang bzhin ni sa byung mya 'byung da ltar yang myed do// rgyal po rje po de bzhin du gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang ba zhin yang ma byung myi 'byung ba ltar yang myed do// rgyal po chen
70a5(1): po 'di lta ste dper na brag cha'i sgra'i rang bzhin yang ma byung myi 'byung da ltar yang myed do// de bzhin du gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 2du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yang
70a6(1): ma byung myi 'byung da ltar yang myed do// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ smyi ga rgyu'i chu'i rang bzhin ni ma byung myi 'byung nga ltar yang myed do// de bzhin du gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes
70a7(1): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yang ma byung myi 'byung da ltar yang myed do// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ sku ba rdos pa ni snying po myed de ma byung myi 'byung da ltar yang myed do// 
70a8(1): de bzhin du gzugs kyi ring bzhi nanas rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi bar du ma thung myi 'thung nga ltar yang byed do// rgyal po chen po 'di sa se dper ma/ myilas kyi sul gyi bzang mo ni mi byung gyi 'byung ba gar yang byed do// 
70a9(1): de bzhin du gzugs kyi rang bzhimanas rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi bar du ma byung myi 'byung ba ltar yang myed do// rgyal po chen po 'di sa ste dper ra myi lam phyi mos kyi bu'i skye ba'i ma byung gyi 'thung ba skang yar byed do/ 
70a10(1): de bzhin cu gzugs kyi rang bzhin nas rnam par zhes pa'i rang bzhin gyi bar du ma zung gyi 'thung ba sams myed ngo // rgyal po chen po 'di ga ste dper na nam mkha' la gnas myed do// de bzhin du gzugs ras rnam pa
70b1(1): shes pa'i bar du gnas byed do// rgyam pa chen po gzugs pa ni skye ba byed do// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du skye ba byed do// rgyam po chen po gzugs la ni 'gag pa myed do// de ba'i mdunam par shes pa'i
70b2(1): pa myed do// rgyal po chen po 'di lta te dper na/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la skye ba 'am 'gag pa myed do// de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la skye ba 'am 'gag pa myed // rgyam ze cher po / 
70b3(1): sta he dper na/ chos kyi dbyings la skye ba 'am 'gag pa myed do// de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la skye ba 'am 'gag pa myed do// rgyal po chen po chos 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul te/ 
70b4(1): bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i pyod yul lo// byis pa so so'i skye bo bsra cang dang thun mong ma yin ba'i myod yul te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang bur mong ma yin/ phri ba ma yin/ bsnga rang
70b5(1): ma yin/ thob pa ma yin/ ho rad pa ma yin/ mngon par rdzog sa par sangs rgyas pa ma yin/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa ma yin/ mngon par ma
70b6(1): shes pa ma yin/ yongs su shes pa ma yin/ yongs su ma shes pa ma yin/ spangs pa ma yin/ ma spangs pa ma yin/ bsgoms pa ma yin/ ma bsgoms pa ma yin/ mngon du byas pa ma yin// 
70b7(1): mngon du ma byas pa ma yin/ bsta nad pa ma yin/ sa bstan ma yin/ rab tu banyand pa ma yin/ rab tu ma ba ha nang pa ma yin/ sprugs pa ma yin/ ma bsgrags pa ma yin/ thos par byas pa
70b8(1): yin/ thos par ma byas pa ma yin/ thos pa ma yin/ ma thos pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po gang bsna nang par bya ba 'am dbri bar bya ba'i chos de myi dmyigs te/ rgyal po chen po chos thams cad
70b9(1): ni rang bzhidi myed pa yin gyis rgyal po chen po 'di la yang yongs su dga' bar bya zhing gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog par bya'o// dengs rgyal po bas gtsang ma 'di snye du sems te/ 'di la ro gang rtogs pas sangs rgyas shes bya
70b10(1): ba'i chos de gang yang mya dmyigs mod kyi 'on kyang dmyigs su myed pa'i chos rnams la de bzhin gshegs pas gdags pa bas nad to snyam nas de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma las btsogs pa zhag kya bdun khri myi skye ba'i chos la bzod
71a1(1): skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam bzugs su chung nas 'dum pa mdzad do// 'dini sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ gang gi mi 'jum ba
71a2(1): pa de'i tshe 'od gzer kha dog sna tshogs can kha dog du ma dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas byung te 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu myed pa dag snang bas rgyas par bkang nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar
71a3(1): du mngon par 'phags te phyir log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dra bu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul han las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te
71a4(1): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas pra com ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de zhus pa// 'jig rten rnam par 'drend pa po// dpa' chen khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad pa// 'jig rten
71a5(1): snang ba mdzad pa po// 'dzum pa'i 'dzum rgyu bka' saHlang kA/ sol // thams cad mkhyend pa 'drend pa po// rgyu gang gis ni 'dzum baha nad pa// khyod kyis 'gro ba rnams la ston// 
71a6(1): bdag ga the tsom myur du zhum/ shag kya'i tshogs kyi don swa/ da ru// 'go'u ta mas ni 'dzum pa mdzad// dpa' bo 'a/ gro ba dga' mdzad pa// 'gro ba'i the tsom pasaHlang du gsol// 
71a7(1): bsam gta chen po khyod kyi gsung // zos nas 'gro ba'i hrIHma 'chang // mchog tu dga' ba'i yid gyur te// kun kyang sbyin kyis bas nad pa thor// rgyal ba'i 'dum gyi phrin las 'di/ 
71a8(1): khyod kyi sras rnams 'tshal gyur na// nan tan gyis ni rab nges shing // shes pas rjes su mchi bar 'gyur// rgyal ba khru mchog khyod kyis ni// 'gro ba'i the tsam 'di bsal gsol// 'jig rten the rtsa
71a9(1): chad gyur na// bde ba rgya chen thob par 'gyur// de skad ces gsold pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' saHlad pa// ngas ni 'dzum zhi gang mdzad pa/ 
71a10(1): yulang de ni nga las nyon// shag kya rnams kyi blo nges pa// yang dag ji bzhin lung bas nad to// chos rnams dmyigs su myed par ni// shog kya rnams kyis yang dag shes// de phyir sangs rgyas chos rnas
71b1(1): la/ 'di dag yid ni nges par bzhag/ dmyigs su myed la brtem nas ni// shag kya grags pa chen po pa/ chos rnams kun la nges gyurang ras// za skyed byang chub thob par 'gyur// gag kya
71b2(1): pa 'di dag ni// myi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas// bde ba can kyi 'jig rten du/ 'od dpag myed kyi drung du 'gro// byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs myed pa/ bde ba cam gnas pa'i che// sangs rgya
71b3(1): bye ba grangs myed la// phyogs bcu dag tu mchod byed 'gyur// mkhas pa rnams ni khams gcig na// sangs rgyas bzhugs rnams bsnyen bkur byed// sems can kun la phan tshol zhing // byang chub
71b4(1): mchog tu smon lam 'debs// de bzhin gshegs rnams mchod byed cing // zhing nas zhing du rnam par rgyu// gang tu sangs rgyas 'byung bar yung // rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'dong bar 'gyur// bskal
71b5(1): pa bye ba grangs myed du// me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod nas// de'i 'og tu 'dre/ nad par 'gyur// de che sangs rgyas re re zhing // sems
71b6(1): can khrag khrig mang po dag/ byang chub phyir ni sangs rgyasakyis// sangs rgyas dgongs la 'gro ba 'dul// sangs rgyas kun kyi 'di rnams na// byang chub sems dpa' rnams
71b7(1): la stond// de nas sangs rgyas gang yang ni// nyan thos 'dul bar yong myi 'gyur// sangs rgyas de dag re re zhing // de na che tshad 'gyur ba ni// bye ba grangs myed po rnams su// chos
71b8(1): nyo nad pa dag gnas par 'gyur// de dag mya ngan yongs 'das nas// byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs myed pa// rgyal ba'i sras dag lo grangs ni// bye ba hong du dam chos 'dzin // mya dbang sras po
71b9(1): de dag kyang // tong pa nyid kyi chos nyond pas// sems can bye ba bsam yas dag/ byang chub la na 'dul bar 'gyur// bag yod pa'i myi rnams ni// ngag yod pa la gnas bcas te// stong pa nyid/ 
71b10(1): kyi chos bstend nas// thams cad mkhye nang du nges par 'byung // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis shag kya'i// bu'i 'gro bas rang 'di thos nas// skar bcas 'jig rteran dga' gyur te// byang chub phyir mi
72a1(1): kyang btang // / shag kya lung ba ha nad pa'i le'u he nyi shu drug pa'o// 
72a2(1): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la bka' saHlad pa/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzind de kho na nges par baha nad pa 'ang byang chub sems dpa' mthar phyin pa rnams la bsgrag par bya'o// 
72a3(1): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin 'di na gang zag myed pa nyi/ de la de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang yang ma dmyigs so// gang ma dmyigs pa de ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so// gang mngon par rdzogs
72a4(1): par sangs ma rgyas pa de ni ma baha nad pa'o// gang ma baha nad pa de ni ma shes pa'o// gang ma shes pa de ni 'das pa dang / ma byo nad pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi baha nad pa
72a5(1): he/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi rnga chen po yan/ gyis ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzind de kho na ngesapar baha nad pa 'di gzung ba dang / klag pa dang / gzhan dag la yang
72a6(1): rgya cher yang dag par baha rad par bya bar 'di sha ri'i bu khyod la yo sa su gtang ngo // sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i reg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dang
72a7(1): gis bskas dpa bcu'i bar du pha rol tu phyin pa swa zhes rab pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral bar byang ba bas sha ri'i bu gang gis byang chu ba sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzi nad de 'on nyis pa ngag nad pa 'di sa
72a8(1): thos par gyur kyang de nyid re bas bsod rnams ches mang du 'phem mo// sha ri'i bu gang gis ban lang pa bcu'i bar dumanyand pa nas gang gis sems pan gcig la 'di bsta nang na de nyid yang rnams ches sa
72a9(1): mamatho pa 'bras pa cu ma sa'adus dzinas mi gos ma sa nom pa 'i de nyid de tho sa pas du mams/ #
72a10(1): chu sems pa'i yi 'o di 'ongs byang chub sems dpa rnamasasan tanathams cad kyis gangams par rgyam/  bo'i phyir sem/ ga ro'i du byang chub sems pa
72b1(1): mnges par brgya rang pa 'di bsgoms pas ni myur du myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ sha ri'i bu gang bra ra myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ngas lung ba ha rang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i chog pa
72b2(1): ngag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzind de kho na nges par baha nad pa 'di la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' saHla nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang / ge
72b3(1): slong de dag dang / rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa 'a 'khorang de dang / lha dang / mya dang / lA ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig
72b4(1): rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon bur stong ngo //

72b6(1): baha nad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu drug pa rdzogs sto/ 
72b7(1): / rgya kar gyi mkhan po shini ler dra bo de dang / 'dzir myi dri dang / gi la dang / zhu cer gyi lo tsab bam de ye shes ldes bsgyur cing/ 
72b8(1): zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa
72b9(1): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u hong brgyal ba las/ le'u bco'i brgyad pa me/ yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa// bam po dang po// 
72b10(1): / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya rA s+yA pA la/ pa ri bring can ma ma da yA na sU tra/ bod skad du// 'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'o// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
73a1(1): 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong thams cad kyang spobs pa thogs pa myed pa/ bzod pa thob pa/ bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la shin tu nye bar gyur nga ba/ skye ba gcig gis thogs
73a2(1): pa/ gzungs thob pa/ ting nge 'dzind thob pa/ spobs pa mtha' yas pa thob pa/ myi 'jigs pa thogs pa myed pa thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang / dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa nas/ yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad zad kyi
73a3(1): shes pa sha stag la/ 'di lta he/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'u chen po kun tu bzang po dang / kun tu myig dang / kun tu sta dang / kun tu 'od gzer dang / kun tu 'ong dang / blo gros mchog dang / blo gros 'phel dang / 
73a4(1): blo gros mtha' yas dang / blo gros rgya chen dang / blo gros myi zad pa dang / sa 'dzi nad dang / 'gro ba 'dzi nad dang / rgyal ba'i blo gros dang / khyad bar blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
73a5(1): gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang / 'jam dpal la sosogs pa/ sems dpa' dpe' myed pa drug cu dang / bzang skyong las btogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang / myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / 
73a6(1): lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / lha'i bu ma na bzangs dang / lha'i bu blo gros legs gnas dang / lha'i dbang po bam sa cad dang / klu'i dbang po dang / myi 'am ci'i dbang po dang / dri za'i
73a7(1): dbang po dang / gnod tu kyi dbang po dang / lA ma yin gyi dbang po dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'khor brgyal song du ma yod pa thams cad dpa'akhor de nyid du 'dus te 'khod pa rnams dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom
73a8(1): ldan 'das das kyi stong po'i seng ge'i khris bzugs te/  so nga 'ad kyi kyis co thathams cad las ni mngon par 'bags/ khyim sar 'jig rten thams cad pa di sdang / zla bsar 'tho bams cad pa snang ba medas/ 
73a9(1): tshangs pa la rab tu zhi bar ni bzhugs/ brgya byin star sku ni bsnyen par dkal/ 'khor los sgyur ba ltar byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po che bdun dang ni ldan/ seng ge ltar chos thams cad bdag myed pa dang / hong par ni sgrogs/ 
73b1(1): / kye'i phung po chen po kar 'gro 'a thams cad la sdang ba'i sku pa di wAn/ skathams cad sdang ba'i nor bu rin po che kun nas 'grus pa'i dor bu rin po 'i'i rgyal po gar bzi 'arjid kyipa'i shing tu 'bar ring / gong gsum gyin cher po'i 'dzi
73b2(1): rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas khyab par mang nas/ don shi nang tu rnam par nges pa chos thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu byon da pa/ 'khor kyi rang na bzhugs shing/ tshangs pa'i sgra byangs bsgrags pa/ sems cad thams cad
73b3(1): go bar byed pa dang ldan pa'i dbyangs kyis chos nyond te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ 'og mar dgel ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge' ba/ don bzang po// tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su
73b4(1): byang ba yang dag par rab tu stonang to// de nas byang chub sems da 'u sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid su 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i
73b5(1): khri la bzhugs pa/ nyi ma hong las lhag pa'i 'od kyis 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad zil tu rlag par mdzad nas/ shin tu lgang / der bzhugs pa mthong ste/ dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / dad pas
73b6(1): 'dun pa'i sems kyis stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te/ com ldan 'das la tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di gis mngon par bstod do// lnga tshogs lA ma yin dang myi 'am
73b7(1): // klu dang nyan thos dag dang sangs rgyas sras// 'gro ba 'di dag rgyal bas gzi yangs kyis// zil man nad khyod ni gser gyi ri ltar gsal / rgya mtsho'i dbus na gnas kyang rnam mdzes pa// lhun po sgra'i
73b8(1): tshogs kyi gnas lta bur// thugs rje'i rgya mtsho dbus su de bzhugs te// 'od gzer tong phrag brkyang dag 'gyed par mdzang // tshangs pa'i gnas la gnas pa'i tshangs pa de// tshangs pa'i mdun na gnas te mngon mdzes
73b9(1): sbyar// bsam gtan nam pard ting nge 'dzidang bzhugs pa// / sems can dam pa'i 'gro ba kun lags pa// brgya byid sum bcu rtsa gsum sna dang du// gnas nas gzi' brjid yangs pas mdzes pa snar // mtshar
73b10(1): kyis smras pa ye shes yon tan phyag/ thub pa'i rgyal po 'gro ba bum sags la// sring ba'i'i sgo'i bdas po sdang lda pa// 'jig nyen 'di la son pa yangs pa dang// 'phags pa'i lam du 'dud pa rang yang dacing / 
74a1(1): dri byed zla ba nas kyi phung gsal ltar// gi nang tu nam dag 'gro ba kun la gams// rgyal ba'i zhas ras zla ba nya ba 'dra// kun 'od ci yid kyis mnan nas rnam par mdzes// ji ltar ri lo'i rlom la phye 'bar ba// mtshan po phyi nyas ca/ 
74a2(1): makun rlung nga // gti mug sun pas sus bcos ras ni// drang sro ba chen par bgro pa 'od kyang gsus// seng ge 'a sus btan pa'i sa zlog cing // sa su ri dgas chogs rnapas skrag kying dang // kyi dbang stos da
74a3(1): gsung blag cing // pa ro bang su legs can rnams grag pa ya dang / rong bu'i rgyas po parang po ga'i 'dzid 'bar/ ror bu thams cad kyis ma lam ze dang // rgyas 'di sa dge zer gyis po 'dag/ yo brad
74a4(1): @mnan nas lam mer bzhugs// 'jig rten gapan 'ang khyod dang ma tshungs ma mchis// lhag pa'i sems can mchis par ga la 'gyur// bsod nams ye shes brtson 'grus thabs rnams dang // yon tan
74a5(1): kun gyis khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis// myi'i dbang po 'gro la lam me pa// mgon po yon tan rgya mtsho bdag gis mthong // chu/ sa pa skyes shing dga' ba rnam par 'phel// rgyal ba'i zhabs kyi
74a6(1): mthil la bdag gis gdugs// yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas 'jig rten smyon// grags pa ram pa rgya cen thugs mnga' la// bdag gis bsgod de bsod nams 'dir thob des// 'gro ba thams cad byang chub mtshon/ 
74a7(1): reg shog/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par btod nas/ thal mo sbyar te myig gnyis kyi 'dzums par de bzhin gshes
74a8(1): pa'i sku la ni sta// chos kyi dbyings nyid la ni rnam par dpyod// zab pa dang gting dpag dka' ba dang / mthong bar dka' ba dang / khong du chud par dka' ba dang / brtag kyi nus pa dang / rtog ge'i spyod pa ma yin pa dang / zhi bar dang / 
74a9(1): phra ba la ni 'jug/ sangs rgyas kyi khyod yul bsas kyis myi khyab pa la ni me yun yang pyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chos kyi dbyings thams cad du zhugs pa la ni rjes su rnam par sems/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mnyam pa
74b1(1): mnyam pas ni sang ngas par sa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i babs kyi sus kyi khyod yul thams kyis kyi khyam pa la ni 'jug/ sangs rgyas bcos du 'das rnams kyiras kyi dbyings gcig gi chus kyangs nyid pa 'dug pa rtson/ man
74b2(1): / bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gnas myed pa/ nam ma kha'i khyod yul du ni yang dag par lta/ chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha' mtha' ma yin pa'i rang bzhin la 'jug pa la ni mos/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par b.rad pa smis pa myed pas rjo/ 
74b3(1): mngon par 'dod/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku rtag pa dang / zhi ba dang / ther zug pa la ni 'jug/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhing rab 'byam thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang / sems can thams cad ma mngon tu phyogs
74b4(1): pa la ni 'jug/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan phyi mu'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur yang thug pa myed pa ni rjes su dran par byed/ chos kyi dbyings nyid la ni rnam par dpyod cing / byang chub sems dpa'
74b5(1): sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po cang myi smra b.ra'adug par gyur te/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong mnyan yod/ du dbyar zla ba gsum gnas par dam bcas te/ de zla ba gsum
74b6(1): 'das nas chos gos byas te/ chos gos zin nas de lhung bzed na/ pa/ chos gos thogs te dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / gsar bu las dang po pa rab tu zung nas ring por ma lon pa dag dang / lhan gcis
74b7(1): tu mthar kyis yul rgyu ba rgyu zhing rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga ya ba dang / bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la der song ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan yul 'khor skyong bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ 
74b8(1): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis thal mo sbyar te/ 
74b9(1): / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// myi mchog 'od mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba yid gnyis gcod la phyag 'tshal lo// 
74b10(1): srid gsum mthar sbyor thub la phyag 'tshal lo// zhing rnams bye ba rab 'byam kun tu yang // 'drend pa dag ni khyod kyi bsngags pa gsung // rgyal ba'i sras kyis thos nas rab dga' zhing // yon tan rgya mtsho thub pa mchod du
75a1(1): pamachog ni chol par// khyod kyi thugs ni skyo ba kyi mnga' bar// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas su// sems can rnams kyi cheng du pyod pa byed// 'dren pa khyod kyis sbyin dang tshul khrims kyang // bzod dang 'phor 'grun/ 
75a2(1): dang ri bsam gtan bslabs// shes rab thabs dang dbang gi pha rol gshegs// des na rnam 'dren che la phyag 'tshal lo// rdzu 'phrul rkang dang mngon shes mchog la mkhas// dbang po bstobs dang rnam par tha rad pa bslabs// sems
75a3(1): can kun gyi spyod pa thugs chud rtogs// mnyam myed ye shes mchol phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba rnams kyi sems rgyud rab tu mkhyend// myod pa gang dang ji ltar las 'byung dang // tshul sgo gang gis rnam par grol 'gyur/ 
75a4(1): ba// de ni bcom ldan myi'i mchog gis mkhyenang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug 'byung ba spong // gang gis sems can ngan so gsum 'chi dang // gang gis bde 'gror 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i las/ 
75a5(1): 'gro bas legs pa bgyis dang nongs bgyis mkhyend// 'gro baphan mdzad gang dag 'das rnams dang // da ltar lnga dang myi yis mchod rnams dang // gang dag ma byon yon tan mchog mthar phyi nang / 
75a6(1): bde gshegs de dag thams cad rab tu mkhye dang // dag pa'i zhing dang phun sum tshogs 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang nyan thos dang / drang sro pa chen po rnams kyi sku che'i chang // rnam pa kun tum lus nas/ 
75a7(1): rababyed du/ mya ngan 'das nas ros gnas kyi 'dra dang // rgyal pa'i grel mazod pa'i 'dra dang // de na chom mngod 'dzin pa'i 'drag// de dgas sus rgya'i dam pas mkhye dang // dus gsus rnams su
75a8(1): stobs bcu yi// ye shes mkhyend pa sgrib pa myi mnga' 'jug/ chos rnams kun la thugs ni chags kyi mngar// phyag 'aras rgyal ba ye shes mtsho khyod la// khyod dang mtshungs mnyam ma mchis kA la lkug/ swAng+yas sa
75b1(1): rangs pa brgya byin 'og phyir lha'i rnams// khyod kyis spyan sngar de dag mdzes ma lags/ khyod ni gser gyi ri ltar dri myi mnga'// dbu sdum 'jam zhing g.yas su 'khyimang par gnas// spun po rgyal po ga bur gyi gtsug 'bad
75b2(1): bsod nams rgya chen 'bar ba lam mer bzhugs// 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig rab 'gyed cing // khyod kyi sbyin ya'i mtshams kyi mdzod su mdzes// 'gro la thugs rje dgongs pas gang gzigs pa// spyad ni ud pas 'dra'izhing yid du
75b3(1): mchi// thA nya dri myed mkha' la ji lta bar// rnam 'dred khyod kyi zhal ni lam me he// lta ba'i skye bo ngoms par myi 'gyur ba// zhal bzangs kyi'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// ngang pa ma bya ri dgas rgyal gyi stabs// glang po dregs pa
75b4(1): gyis mchi stabs kyis// sa rnams g.yo bar mdzad cing rab gshegs pra/ stobs bcu brtul zhugs brtan la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag gi sor mo ring zhing zlum la mdzes// sen mo zangs mdog dag cing dra bas spras
75b5(1): bzhengs kyang pus mo'i lha dar reg cing slebs// sku mdog kase ra mdog 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor lo 'dra bas khyab pa'i zhwa rnabs 'dor bas// sa he ri mor mngad cing rab tu gshegs/ 
75b6(1): 'bas bya 'od gzer gyis ni longs spyodan pa'i/ phyi rnams du mdas lnga'i 'jig rten mchi// chos kyi rgyal po nor bdud spyir bar / chos kyi phyid bdag dus pa'i thugs sa nga'ang // chos kyi do/ 
75b7(1): pas 'gro ba rjes ston pa// 'dren pa chos kyi rje la phyag 'tshal lo// byams pa'i go ma dran ba'i ral gyi mchog/ tshul khrims ga'u dang zhes rab thabs kyi mnga'// re yis skye 'chi phreng phred 'phel bgyid pa/ 
75b8(1): nyon mongs ragra dag rnam par bcom par gyur // rgal nas sems can khrag khrig rnams kyang sgrol// grol nas 'ching ba las ni 'gro ba 'grel / bde gshegs kang gis zhi ba'i gnas mchi ba// bde ba rims nad ma ma
75b9(1): lam yang nyonang // gan skye dpa 'chi ba ma mchis shing // 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung bar gyi 'gyur ba// gnas mchog zhi ba 'dus su bgyid pa de// thugs rje brnyes ras khyod kyis panyand pa mdzad// chos kun da
75b10(1): ki pha rol phyi nad pa rgyal// thub pa chen po 'jig rten mchog bstod la/ bdag gis 'dir ni bsod nams gang bsags des// 'gro ba byang chub mngon par 'chang rgya shog/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong
76a1(1): / gis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ thal lo sbyar da te tan las langs nas/ tha gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar bdas/ pus mo gams pa'i lnga sa btsugs te/ bcom 'du
76a2(1): 'a'adas ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar pa btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas khu ba lung ba tand pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gne/ 
76a3(1): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so// de skad ces gsol da pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' saHla da to// yul
76a4(1): 'khor skyong khyod ci dang mi 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bsta nad pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces pa ka'i saHla pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis bcom ldan
76a5(1): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang / chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na/ chos thams cad kyi yon tan gyi khyang bar thob par 'gyur/ gzhan la rags
76a6(1): lam pa'i shes pa yob/ skur ba'i shes rab 'thob/ spobs pa rnamapar nges pa 'thob/ snang ba 'thob/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / 
76a7(1): yid gnyis spong ba dang / som gnyi spong ba dang / thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du rnam par nges pa 'thob// sems can 'jud pa la mkhas pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid pa dang / ldem po ngag yang dag pa
76a8(1): dang / sems can gyi khams la mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'thob pa dang / zhu ba thams cad zhu ba dang / chos thams cad 'dzind pa dang / myur du thams cad mkhyend pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa/ 
76a9(1): yul 'khor skyong gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab nges pa// yang dag nyid du ji ltar de 'byung dang // ye shes rgya mtsho'i bka' mchid rnam nges pa// myi mchog rgyal
76a10(1): bas bdag la bshad du gsol// shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi gzugs lnga ru// sems can dam pa bsod nams mchog bsags pa// khyod ni skyabs dang gnas dang dpung gnyen lags// byang chub myod mchog dri skye
76b1(1): pa chen po de dag gis ni rtag tu thob// nam yang chung bar myi 'gyur phyir zhing blo gros rab tu 'phel// de dag ye shes chags pa myed cing chos kun pha rol du phyinang / byang chub yan lag 'phel bar byed pa'i dgel ba'i bshes gnye da
76b2(1): de dag 'drend pa rnams ni gang nas bzhud pa'i lam mchog stonang // de dag sdig pa'i grogs po dag la te te nad pa ma yin te// tshigs byed bdag nyid mye ltar de dag ring du rnam par spong // dpa' bo stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i zab mo
76b3(1): chos thos nas// de dag bdag dang sems can srog tu lta ba kun myi 'byung // de dag tshul khrims skyon myed dul zhing zhi ba'i yid dang ldan// sangs rgyas tshul khrims tha ra phyed la sems cad rnams kyang sbyor// yul 'khor skyong ban sa
76b4(1): 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor lan 'khod pa'i rnams dag bur byed pa'i chos yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong sangs rgyas ma dra ra/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor bar 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed
76b5(1): pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong rjes su mthun pa'i chos thos pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor bar 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa/ de'i chos dang / yul 'khor spyong 'dog pa thams cad yongs su gdongs
76b6(1): bya chub sems dpa' 'khor la na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed/ pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong dmyigs su myed pa'i chos la bzod pa byang chub sems dpa' 'khor bar 'khod ba rnams dka' bar byed
76b7(1): ma tshab yin te/ sus la cu ma pa de dag ni/ dpa' 'khor 'ad 'bod pa rnams dga' bar byed mamamam 'o// 'di mam nyid yin te/ de sa 'din ces 'o// mchi
76b8(1): 'jig rten thams cad kun nas snang ba dang ba'i// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mchog che rabs kun tu de dag mthong // byang chub dam pa mchog chos chen sems can dgrol ba'i phyir// dga' zhing gus par gnas nas de ltar myi dpa
76b9(1): yang dathos la ma nyid kyi bye// me'i 'dog sa thams cad mongs gto cag tu kun 'dzin byed/ spong banye bar 'ongs pa mtho na sems ni rab tu dga'// grong dang yul 'khor sa dang srog dang du dbacung sa dang / mams
78a1(1): cang gtong zhi de'i sems ni gang tus ngag po 'byed/ yus 'amar skyong byang chub sems dpam chos pa'i la 'ag par gyi bya ste/  pazhi gang zhe na/ sul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas kyis kyi garnams mas sa
78a2(1): dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas rab tu byung nas rnyed pa dang / bkur hil blta bar spyi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas khyim sa 'dris par bya ba la bus par myi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub mo
78a3(1): dpas lus dang srog la blta bar myi bya ba / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas chos bzhi po de dag la blta bar myi bya'o// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// skyor gyi gzings pa mtha' yas ldan pa'i
78a4(1): khyim spangs rtag tu nor myi blta// yon tan ldan pa nges pa de dag dgond par dka' zhing dbang po rul// de dag gang tu yang bud myed rnams drang skyes pa dag dang 'dris myi byed// bse' ltar gcig pu gnas shing
78a5(1): bsam pa dri myed dag la dri ma bral// de dag rnyed pa rnams kyis ra// ga' bar myi 'gyur mtho ba yid zhum byed// 'dod pa chung ste ngan do// sman tsam la dga' zhing spu dang tshul 'chos spangs// sems can don/ 
78a6(1): phyir brtson 'grus yid ldan spyir dang rul la rab tu gnas// ngas rgyas ye shes don gnyer bsam gtan brtson 'grus yon tan pha rol du phyinang // lus dang de bzhin srog la myi blta sdug pa'i/ 
78a7(1): cha laka rnams spangs te// bsam pa rdo rje lta bur rab brtan rtag tu byang chub lam la sbyor// lus ni dum bu dum bur bcad kyang de dag sems la gso ba myed// thams cad mkhyen nyid re ba phyir zhing yor 'grus shin tu
78a8(1): brtan 'dir thoms// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba myed par byed pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor spyo tshul khrims spyor myed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba myed
78a9(1): par byed pa'i ros dang / yul 'khor skyong dgonang pa la gnas pa phyi 'dod pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung du phyed par byed pa'i 'os dang / sul 'khor khyong 'phags pa'i rigs pa'i dang 'dun par byed pa/ byang chu sem
78a10(1): rapa' rnams kyi gdung ba myed par byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong yang du thos pa 'thob par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba skyed par byed pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong ban po de dag mi byang chub sems pas
78b1(1): rnams kyi gdung ba skyed par byed pa'i chos so// 'di la 'di'i chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// sangs rgyas tshul khrims dam pa 'di la 'dod byed cing // tshul khrims dri sreng nor bu rin cer 'dra ba srung // re dag pa'i ji
78b2(1): ldan legs sdom yin gyi sems// tshul khrims de nyid la ni rtag tu sems can sbyor// de dag stong pa dgon par rtag tu gnas par byed// de dag bdag gi 'du shes srog gi 'du shes myed// gzugs kun ma rang zhing dang mig pa
78b3(1): bar mthong // 'di la skyes pa bud myed bdag gi myed par mthong // 'phags rigs bzhi la dga' zhing g.yo'i myed tshul 'chos myed// bag yod de dag bsam pa thag pas rab tu sbyor// zos dang yon tan rnams la rtag tu bzor
78b4(1): bar byed// bdel bar gshegs pa'i yon tan mthu chen don tu gnyeraskye rga 'chi bas bcom zhing nad gzi da pa// 'gro ba mgor myed srid pra'i btson ra 'dir bltas nas// zhi bdam pa mchog gi chos kyi rtsa
78b5(1): sbyar da te// srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i chu las skye bo sgrol bar byed// 'dus byas gyur da par 'jig rten 'khyam pas skyabs 'gon dang // dpung nyen byed pa gzhan ni gang yang yod myin gyis// bdag gis
78b6(1): sems can 'di dag thams cad yongs dgrol zhes// de phyir bya/ ngachub mchog tu bdag gis smon lam btab// yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas bzhi po 'di dag ni cang shes kyi 'gros
78b7(1): su shes par bya te/ bzhi gang zhen bde 'gro 'thob te/ de yang sa sa rgyas 'byung ba dpa' phrad pa dang / bla ma la sri zhu byed de/ de yang za zing myed pa'i sems kyis bsnyend pa dang / bas mtha'i gnas
78b8(1): la mngon par dga' ste/ de yang rnyed pa dang bkur sti la myi blta ba dang / spobs pa thob ste/ de yang zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas bzhi po de dag ni cang shes kyi 'gros su shes par bya'o// 
78b9(1): 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te de la 'di skad ces bya'o// brtan pa nags dang sul na rtag tu gnas par byed// de dag rtag tu khor mor rnyed pa don gnyer myin// chags myed blo can rtag tu yobs dang ldan pa yin// zab mo'i chos sa
79a1(1): rgyas yon tan thos nas de dag dka' 'gyur te// de dag ring por myi thogs pa dang nye bar 'gyur// de dag byang chub rdul bral dam pa sangs rgyas nas// sems can khrag khrig sdug bsngal mtha' yas rnams sapa 'gresang // sum
79a2(1): 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na khong khro ba myed pa'i sems byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang / thob kyis 'jal
79a3(1): ba yongs su spangs te dgon par gnas pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing rnam par smin pa la re ba myed pa dang / nyin mtshan du chos 'dod cing chos smra ba rnams la 'khrul pa myi tshol ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub
79a4(1): sa dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba'i tshe sa so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' sraHlad to// bla na myed pa'i byang chub 'dod pa na// tha ba dri ma myed cing khro
79a5(1): sems myed// de ni su la yang skyon tshol byed ma yin// gso'i lce/ nga tshul 'chos myed cing spro sems myed// khyim gyi blo gros yang mya ngan/ rnam// skye bo ngan 'grogs tshul bzhin ring 'gyur ba// spangs te de
79a6(1): la gyi lha rab zung nas// tha rang pa 'dod pa ri khrod gnas par byed/ dgonang pa bas mtha' rnam pa ce rang pa ra// shes le 'thob pa kun la s+yai tir 'ang // lus dang srog la 'ang la bar myi byed la// seng
79a7(1): ke lta bur gnas shing dga' las rgyal// byang chub lam phyir ye shes tshol ba no// ngan ngon tsam gyis chog par 'dzin byed cing // rtag tu bya ltar gsogs pa spangs nas ni// 'jig rten kun la gnas pa ma yin no// dper na
79a8(1): bse ltar gcig pu gnas byed cing // seng ge ga bur 'jigs pa yod ma yin// ri dgas la bur sar 'jigs sid kyi ton// de ni mchod pas khengs par 'gyur ba myed// g.yang sar srung ba'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas// rab tu
79a9(1): bar par bya phyir 'drad par byed// gas te nag song nges pa'i tho ba myong // bdag kyang 'gro ba 'di'i dbung gnyen 'thur// phyi mchog spyod pa 'di dag 'dod pa na// 'dum pa'i bzhin kyis rang san cig lngazhig// susku
79a10(1): kyi 'ug dag tu rnog sems kyang // rlung dang 'dra ba mags pa byed par sanam// sgom pa nyid dngas can ma byed la mos// 'dus byas kun la sus gzung rog/ sangs pa tho ba 'i dang dus la dgapa/ 'di nas
79b1(1): tu bdud rtsi'i ro'i sa mgu// minas byang chub las ni sbub byed cing // de ni rtag tu bsam pa yongs su sbyong // gzungs dang spobs pa rol bar byed pa ra// yon tan 'dod pa sdug bsngal brkya ngag bzod// byang chub sems pa
79b2(1): myong pa 'di bltas nas// gang nis don tu gnyer ba de dgar 'gyur// gang zhig byang chub 'di la ya mos pa// blo chung de ni nyes pa brgyal yang skyed// yul 'khor myong za'i po 'di dag ri byang chub sems dpa'i gsangs te// mi gang
79b3(1): yul 'khor skyong ma gus pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang / yul 'khor skyong byas pa myi gzo' zhing g.yo la he nad pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang / yul 'khor skyong rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la chags pa byang chub
79b4(1): sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang / yul 'khor spyod tshul 'chos pa drang / kha gsag gis rnyed pa dang / bkur sti sgrub pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems pa
79b5(1): rnams kyi g.yang sa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe che gas su bcad pa 'di dag bka' saHla to// 'phags pa bla ma naH/ des dang pha ma sa// de dag rtag tu gus pa myed pa yin// de dag byas
79b6(1): pa myi gzo g.yon can te// rtag tu kun tu ma bsdams pyor cing rmod sa// rnyed pa rtag tu chags zhing zhe nad pa nye// de dag tshul 'chos pa dang gso sbyong dga'// kha cig tshul khrims rdul zhugs ji ltas
79b7(1): kyang // 'din bdag dang mtshungs pa skyed ces smra// de dag par rum snang bar sems pa te// grags tshos pa la rtag tubartson pa yin// re na zhing gi las dang song la dga'// de dag dge skyong son tan shin tu
79b8(1): phyi ma'i dus na 'di skar ma bsdams pa'i// dge slong nus khrims yon tan rab ring ba// re dgas rang 'dru ba dang 'thab pa dang // phrag dog dbang gis chos 'di rug par byed// byang chub lam las rtag par shin tu re// 'phag
79b9(1): sa nongs pa de dag shin kyang / sa bya'o rnam par ma ma 'i// de dan 'grosas pa'i 'gyums par 'gyur// sum 'khor myo nan pa 'di ngag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chubs bshesas bye
79b10(1): chol te/ digang med/ sus pa' thuzab po byang chub sems pa sa rnams kyi kyang chubs bshegs kyi mamatshas dang / chub 'thor myongs dang sa byang chub sems dpa' dasapa kyi byang chubs bzhes pa byed nga macos dang / rus pa
80a1(1): / spong brgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyo la rosad kyi mchod pa la phrag ngos dang / se sA'i sems dang ldan pa byang chub sems pa' sa bgegs byed pa'i chos te du
80a2(1): 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i mtshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' sa yang to// ma dang le lo rtag tu mongs pa'i sems// re ngan
80a3(1): mngon pa'i bcan rtag tu khro// bzod ldan rtag brtson dge slong mthong nas ni// gtsug lag khang nas 'gro che dbyug pas rdeg/ pha rol mchod phyir 'dir ni phra rog skye// de dag sems ni gnas pa yod ma yin// glags pa khyed cing 'dun
80a4(1): ba chol ba can// su la 'khrul yod gang la gleng bya snyam// de dag pa bus nad pa 'di las ring // de dag yon tan snga bzhi pa ngan song gzhol// re drag rgyal ba'i bstan pa bor nas ni// ngan song shin tu myi bzad 'bar
80a5(1): bar 'gro// de dag rnams kyi sdig pa'i spyod pa dang // chos myi/ na ldan 'gro rab sdig 'dir thos nas// rtag tu khor mor byang chub la ma la sbyor// ngan 'gror skyes shing gdung bar gyur da ta re// sangs
80a6(1): rgyas 'jig rten phan pa drang srong che// bskal pa bye ba mang ba brgya lam 'byung bar 'gyur// da ltar ral ba dam pa rnyed pa la// kal d+ha/ bar 'dod bag myed spang bar gyis// yul 'khor skyong gang zag
80a7(1): bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas bsnyend par myi bya te/ bzhi ga nga zhe na yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas sdig pa'i bshes gnyen gyi gang zag bstend par myi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas rgyas
80a8(1): par ka bcad gyi gang zag bsten par myi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas dam pa'i chos spong ba'i gang zag bse da par myi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas pa shings brkos pa'i gang zag pa nye dang pa
80a9(1): nam so zhing // gang dag dege 'i shes rkyen chen byed pa// de dan rtag su byang chum sems sems// dper na mkha' ma zla pa sar ngo bzhin// dbyigs par lta la rtag tu nad pa dang // bdag dang srog dang ga po 'a
80b1(1): pa dag/ de dag dug phyis bzhin du rtag tu spang // gang dag sangs rgyas ye shes don myi gnyer// gang dag myi mchog rnams kyi'i ba'i chos// 'dod chags bral ba bdud mi 'thun spong ba// de dag dper na ngan sprug pa rdzab nga
80b2(1): spong // gang zhig byang chub dam pa 'chang rgya 'dod// zang zing dag dang chos gos lhung bzed chags// rtag tu khyim la 'dris pa byed brtson pa// de dag rnams dang 'dris par myi bya // de dag mye'i 'obs bzhin spang bar bya// ga ba'in
80b3(1): bdud ni gdul bar bya ba dang // 'khor lo dam pa bla myed bskor ba dang // de ltar sems can don yangs byed 'dod pa// des ni sdig pa'i bshes gnyen spang bar bya// gang zhig byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgya 'dod// de yis rnyed dang sdug
80b4(1): dang myi sdug dang // grags dang mtshang 'du phrag dog pa spangs te// sangs rgyas ye shes rtag tu btsal bar bya// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos te/ 
80b5(1): bzhi gang zhen yul 'khor skyong shes pas mngon par rlom sems su byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam pade sbyin pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor spyong phrag ngo'o/ ser sna dang ldan
80b6(1): ba'i sems byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par/ sbyin pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong ma mos pa byang chub sems dang / pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par sbyin pa'i chos dang / yul 'jo
80b7(1): skyong yongs su ma dag pa'i shes pa dang / bzod pa'i longs spyod ngas su tshol ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems
80b8(1): dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smind pa'i chos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' saHla to// gang dag sa la chos ni 'dzind 'gyur zhing // 'gro ba thams cad kyis
80b9(1): kyang mchod 'gyur ba// de la myi shes pas ni brnyas byed na// des de ni sdug bsngal mtha' yas rnyed// yang bas ni gang zhig longs spyod tshol// shes pa ma dag rtag tu 'dund cing 'dod// gang zhig rtag tu nga rgyal
80b10(1): khengs gyur da la// bla ma 'phags pa'i skye bo mya 'dud cing // sangs rgyas la yang mos pa yod myin pa// chos dang tshogs la de ni mos pa myed// bslab dang sbyangs pa rnams la de myi mos// sdig pa'i blo can ngan song
81a1(1): / gsum phyogs pa// de 'i phyin pa 'di nas shi 'phos nas// las kyi dbang gis myi mkhas rnam par rmongs// dmyal ba 'am 'or te dung 'gro'i 'gro rnams sam// yi dgas 'gro ba rnams su sdug bsngal rnyed// ma
81a2(1): zhig 'jig rten smon 'gyur blo ldan zhing // myi'i dpa' bo sdug bsngal mthar phyi nad pa// de yis ngan song lam rnams rab spangs te/ byang chub lam ni rtag tu bdend par bya// 
81a3(1): bam po gnyis pa// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na pha rol la brnyas pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams
81a4(1): kyi 'ching ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i thabs kyis sgom pa la sbyor ba dang / ma tshan ma'i 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang / kun 'dzind pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / ye shes dang bral ba dang / bag myed pa la nyen
81a5(1): pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang / phyir 'brang ba'i ye/ mas kyis khyim la 'dris par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi/ 'ching ba / yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems
81a6(1): dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' saHla to// rtag tu gzhan ngag la ni brnyas byed cing // rtag tu 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan
81a7(1): spos// lha gyu rang de dag gis mde bcings te// glang po lus ring 'dam du song ba ba'ir/ khyim la 'dris byed 'ching dang ldang ba dang // gang zhig bge myed rtag tu kun 'dzin sems// se shes sangs shing blo zab chog
81a8(1): gyu ra pa// myi rigs pyod pa 'di dag rnams kyis bcings// gang zhig sdug bsngal 'jigs pa 'di dag dang // skye na 'chil sortogs pa grol 'dod pa// brnyas par byed dang rlom sems bor nas ni// byang chub las
81a9(1): la rtag tu bzon par 'gyur// sdug bsngal la lus mtha' yas bzod bya'o// bde ba kun la chags pa myed gyur da nas// sug dang kyi sdug gnyen pa ma lus btang // brtan padag ni sdig bral sangs rgyas 'gyur/ 
81a10(1): ro phyi rgyag pa dang son tan dang // hobs dang dbang po dag rang shesas sbyong// son tan thun dang / ga tu ldan gyur danas// rga ba'i dra ba grol pa'i sangs rgyas 'grub// brga sa pa khams kyi khyab par phyed kyang de/ 
81b1(1): sems can phan phyir byang chub mchog don tu// sbyin dang dul dang nges la rtag tu myang // gnyen pa spangs nas bde bar gnas par gyur pa// bas mtha' nags su rtag par nga dga' te/ byang chub ched du bsam pa rnam par sbyangs// brgya lam
81b2(1): na yang brtson 'grus nyams ma gyurang // skyes chen rnams kyi ye shes de 'dra'o// srid pa'i btson rang 'gro ba lnga 'khyam pas// sems can 'khyam pa'i 'gro ba mthong nas ni// sngon chad 'dir ni snying rje rgya chen skyed// 'gro ba'i don du byang chub
81b3(1): dam pa bsgrubs// bskal ba mang por byang chub mchog tshol zhing // rang gi bu pho bu mo chu ngas sdug/ phangs pa'i srog rang shi nang tu 'byor da sa dang // grong khyer nor dang 'bru rnams mang po btang // mye tog 'bras bu mu 'byor da nyams
81b4(1): dka' ba'o// nags su thub pa ni bzod dgar gyurang // su mtshan rgyal pos lag pa/ rkang pa bcang // re che ba'i sdang ba'i yid ma gyurang / nags dang sul ni sngo bsangs zhes bya ba'i// thub pas tha ma rnas
81b5(1): gsol bar// myi'i dbang pos sra ba'i mangs bsnun kyang // de ni yongs su gnod par sems ma gyurang // legs par gsungs dpa'i ched du g.yangs nas// lus la ya bltas rab tu mchongs pa/ 
81b6(1): gyur // da ni byang chub mchog gi rgyu'i phyir// sus dang srog la/ ltas par ma gyurd to// rtag mo gu dang bcas po srog gi phyir/ lus btang nas ni stag mo tshim par byas// nam mkha' las ni
81b7(1): lha'i tshogs rnams kyis// skyes chen brtson 'grus brtan pa legs zhes bsgrags// gang che sngon chad srid par spyod pa na// sbyinas rab dge' bram ze khye'u gyur da che// rin cen ched du rgya mtsho bskams nas ni/ 
81b8(1): nor bu rnyed nas sems can bdel bar byas// rgyal po zla ba'i bu zhes bya gyur te// brjod pa grags shing pa ni pyod pa'i tshe// nga yis bden pa'i tshul gyis rgyal po brgyal// gsad par byas pa myur du ba rad par byas// dngul
81b9(1): 'a sdug bsngal ba'i myi mthong das// nga yis sangs pa'i lus ni btang byas te// pa si sa nor rnyed de ni phrug por byas// de ched ni kun sbyin rgyal por gyurang // nga 'dir myi'i rgyal por gyu rang pa'i tshe// skyabs su 'ongs pa'i du
81b10(1): ron mthong nas ni// rang gi lus las shas pabacad byas te// rang lus ngas btab 'jigs pas phongs ma btang // rgyal po ras pa can zhes sngor gyur che// sman pa mchog gis nga'i ched du mi// mtshungs myed sman rnams
82a1(1): ma lus sbyar sa yang / thos bad ngas ni de dag ka' byed// 'gro ba'i don phyir sngon car myod par// rgyal bum che ba 'ang zhes bya gyur te// chubs ma dri khyoms kyi 'byo // rung bams sum sa sa
82a2(1): btang // gang 'artson 'grus 'bar zhes bya gyur ce// nga sngon lo ni sdong du chang bar yang // bya dka' brgyang sum pa'i 'bod par byas// nor dang dpal yang sngon cad ngas btang ngo // tshul bu gzi brjid drim byed gyur che/ 
82a3(1): nga yis rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod rten bdun// mchog tu gus pas lus la mye btang te// stobs bcu mnga' ba rnams la mchod pa byas// nga ni rgyal po zla 'od gyur pa'i tshe// myi bzad myig can khros par gyur na ni// de yis
82a4(1): nga'i mgo bo bslangs pa na// de tshe nga yis mgo bo bcad de byin// da ni bsod nams mnyam zhes bya gyur da tshe// grong dang grong khyer dag dang lam srang sgo// thams cad du yang rgya chen sman gyi rnams// de dag sems can
82a5(1): don phyir ngas bzhag go// srid pa rnams na pyod pa gang gi tshe/ nga sngon rgyal po dgel bar gyur pa na/ bud myed gzugs bzang gseradang mu tig gis// lus brgya nad stong dag ngas ni btang bar byas// 
82a6(1): gang ched sngon myi'i rgyal po ni// rin cen gtsug pud gyur da che mye to/ ka dang // spos mchog rnams dang gser gyis brgya nang pa'i// cod/ pan dpal ldan dam pa ngas btang ngo // nga sngon rgyal po mos
82a7(1): ldan gyur ba'i che// shing bal 'da' ba 'jam pas bu dang // bed ma'i mdab mnyen lta bur 'jam gzhon pa'i// lag pa rkang pa dag kyang sa bdang ngo // ded dpon seng ge 'dzi nang du gyur pa na// snying rje
82a8(1): myed cing myi bzang rab gtum pa// srin mo brgya dag shin tu char bcad nas// rgya shug gling du myi rnams bkod par gru rang // gang che myig bzangs shes byar gyu rad par// byis pa 'dod dang ldan zhing yid rmongs pa// sriri mo dag la
82a9(1): rlung 'du shes pa// tshong pa lnga brgya dag pa rad par byas// gang che bsod nams 'od gzer gyur pa na// lA'i bu mo sa bu'i gzugs ldan pa// bud myed bye ba phrag bzhi spangs nas su// rgyal ba'i ba hAn pa la mi rab tu byung / 
82a10(1): sems can don gying myod par// dri byed dag pa'i gser gyi mdog car gyi// rgyam por gangs pa'i gyu rang bar/ sor mo rlabs 'bar 'gyu ra btang // rgyal po ud dpal phyog ces bya gyur da me// pang ma thon po las
82b1(1): pa'i mangs du gyi/ bde du'ang bang nyingasasus gyu dpa/ rtsa ba'i ngon tu mas btas kyang/ spang pa'i rgyas po 'drar gyu da pa'ing/ sug dang bras mabyed pa mthong 'de// sang rtses kyang bsrim na tu
82b2(1): snying rjes yongs su la rang bar byas// sngon gyi srid par kun mthong gyu ra pas/ nad kyis btab pa'i nang pa'i phyi mtho nas// pa yis rang gi khrag kyang byin gyur da te// myi de ngas ni rang dang tham par byas// rgyams mye tog pan
82b3(1): gyurd che// bayis lus las rus pa phyung nas yi// rad kyis ri par gyur pa rkang byin te// ngas ni nam yang sems can ma btang ngo // rgyal po don grub ces byar sngon gyur da che// rang gi mdzod nams thams cad ngas btanga'i nga// phangs
82b4(1): shing yid du 'ong ba'i srog btang te// phongs par gyurd pa'i phyi ni zeran/ par byas// rgyal po phyogs kyi tog tu gyur pa'i tshe/ byang chub 'dod nas 'gro bra'i don kyi phyir// 'khor lo'i mtshar can bad ma lA bu'i// lag pa
82b5(1): phrugs kyang ma bltas rab tu byin// rgyal po thams cad mthong du/ gyurd pa'i tshe// snying rje ldan zhing 'gro don par 'dod de// skyes pa/ dbud myed dag gis rgyas pa'i// gling bzhi pa yang ngas ni btang ba byas// 
82b6(1): rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes ldan gyur da che// 'jam zhing mnyen la d+h-i myed dkar ba'i badz+ra// dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid kyis bcad nas na/ rang gi sha dang khrag kyang ngas byin no// bur myed gzugs ldan
82b7(1): zhes ni bya gyur che// bud myed bkres skom nyam zag ngas mthong nas// gser ltar ser zhing shin tu gzhon pa'i// nu ma snying du sdug pa gnyi ga tang // rgyal po dpal grags zhes byar gyurd pa na// shin tu nyams/ 
82b8(1): dga' ba'i rgyan mchog dang // rin cen du ma gos dang shing rta bzhon// gtang bar dka' ba rnam pa du ma btang // rgyal bu byas pa gzo bar gyurd pa'i tshe// rgya mtsho las ni byas pa myi gzo ba sprul// rin cen phyir ni dmis ngamyig
82b9(1): phyung // 'on kyangangal khros pa'i sems myed do// srog chags so drang sngon srid gyur da pa'i tshe// srog skur dag ni 'chi bar 'gyur dogs nas// lus kyi dam pa ma bltas btab ba byas// de che nga'i sems ni gso ba myed// 
82b10(1): khyad pa khyod che bya sreg gyurd pa na// rkan la bsnyen bkur bya bar rtag dga' te// da ni rim gro gus la rab tu dka'// nga rgyal ldan pa ma yin khengs pa myed// skyabs su 'ongs pa'i don phyir ba yis ni/ snying rje bskyed
83a1(1): pa byas nas lus 'atang ste// gdos pa'i phyi yis mda'i rnams bsnun kyang ni// le'u gyu rang ngas 'i myi de ma btang ngo // rgyal po dbang du su da che ba yis ni// glang po tham rgan dran sus bskums te// shin cusan
83a2(1): 'ong bas kyang ngas ma thos// de me srab po bdag nyid b.rang par gyu ra // bgrod dka' gangs can mis phre dbang gyur // ngams dag 'dud par du bsrungs pa'i phyi// desami gzod pas gtang byas kyang // bani dri na 'ong mo byas pabyed/ 
83a3(1): khwa ba kur 'da' 'dra ba'i glang por bu dang / byang chub mchod rten sangs rgyas yon tan tshol// dug dang bcas pa'i mda' yis bsku ra kyang ni// mche ba dam pa byin gyi khros pa myed// dum bu'i gling du rags nas byod sus na/ 
83a4(1): sreg pa'i phru gu byams la gnas gyur che// mthong ba tsam gyis n+ye dre zhi gyur nas// sna tshogs dag gis me tog rnams kyang gtor // ri dgas kyurd che gang ga'i rlabs shugs kyis// khyer ba zhig ni pa yis bsgras
83a5(1): byas pa// de yis gso da pa nga gan khrid de 'ongs// 'on kyang // de la nga ni yong ma khros// rgya mtsho'i dbus su son tshe mgon byed pa // tshong pa lnga brgya dag ni bsgral byas nas// bkres pa de dag
83a6(1): rnams kyis gsang gyur che// rus sbal skye bar gyur kyang byas/ dang ldan// pa ni byang chub phyed pa myod pan// sngon chad chun rgyu pi nyar gyur da che// sems can phan phyir pa yis lus btang / 
83a7(1): srog chags brgya stong dag gi zos par gyur pa// srog chags nges par gang che gyu rad pa na// nad brgyas gzi rad pa'i 'gro ba mthong nas su/ lus ni sman lta bur yang bsgyur byas te// sems can bde zhing dang / 
83a8(1): kyang myed par byas// ri dgas rgyal po seng ger gyu rang pa'i tshe// ma tobs ldan par gyur cing snying je ldan// mdal sis bsnund kyang khros pa'i sems myed de// de che gsod la la ma sa byams pa byas// rung dang 'a mo
83a9(1): lta bu'i rta rgyal du// nga sngon rgya mtsho'i ngogs su gyur pa'i tshe// srin mo'i nang du lon pa'i tshong ba rnams// ba yis snying brtse snying rje bskyed nas bsgral// 'gro ba'i don tu byang chub pyad pyod che// mdaba' chags kur lar na
83a10(1): 'thur da // 'dod pa'i som tamanyes pa sang spangs nas// bung myed rab rdum mongs gyu rang // shes pa rags kanas ri bong gyur pa pa'i ma// legs spyor ma long tshogs kyu ra de la baha nang // thub pa gnas la gnas
83b1(1): pa bkres phongs pa// de'i cher du ngas ni gnas kyang btang // sbol po'i mye tog 'bras rgyas ne tshe'i tshe// sdong po skams kyang ngas mi re ma btang // re me brgya byir byas gsong mabo ngas// song ze ro 'i lo 'bras rgyas par byas// nga
83b2(1): / rgyal por gyurd pa'i che/ byi'i rgyal po klu yis yul bcom ste// sna'i tshogs la gnod pa byung mthong nas// rgyal po'i 'jig sa las de dag ngas bton to// pa sngon re tshor gyu rad te pha ma'i phyir// sa lu blangs te myi yis bzung da na
83b3(1): ni// ne co ci phyir nga yis u len// lo tog sbyin 'di ma rung byar sems sam// ne tse des smras bzang po gsan du gsol// bdag ni rkubs khyod kyi 'bras kyi len// pha ma rkan rgon gnyis ni gsol ba'i phyir// de la snying / 
83b4(1): bdag gis sa lu blangs// gang che thog ma sa bon 'debs pa'i tshe// 'gro ba kun la shas shas sbyin no zhes// de skad tshig smras de ni bdag thos tre// des na bdag ni rku bar gzhar myi 'gyur// ne tso legs so sa su/ 
83b5(1): ci dgar khyer// sri zhu 'di ni myi'i nang na dkon// khyod ni myi yin pa 'dir dud 'gro yin// legs so khyod ni dul zhi yang dag/ bsdams// byang chub rdul bral dam pa tshol ba na// sngon chad spyod
83b6(1): pa de las batshogs pa rnams// pyod pa'i chen dka' ba brgya la/ yang // nga yi yid ni skyo bar gyur da pa myed// rang gi ngag gam 'on te/ phyi yang rung // nga yis dngos po ma btang gang yang myed// tshul
83b7(1): khrims bzod dang de bzhin brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan bas dang shes rab ngas spyad ngo do// sha dang rkang dpe de bzhin pags pa khrig/ de dag rang gi lus las sbyin pa byas// bas mtha' dag dang
83b8(1): phug na rgyu ba'i tshe// ngas ni de tshe lus ni skams par byas// gang la sbyar nga na rgyal bar 'gyur ba'i// sbyangs pa'i gang dag rgyal bas baha nad pa mdzad// sbyangs pa de la rtag tu rab brtson te// sngon spyod chen nga ni
83b9(1): rtag tu 'jug/ spyod pa'i chen pa yis gang bahe nad pa// brtul zhugs rgya chen de 'dra de dag dang // spyod pa 'di thos nas ni de dag rnams// tshig gcig la yang 'dun par myi 'gyur ro// 'di thos gyur nas de'i
83b10(1): na ni// baha nad pa 'di nyid la ni 'phya bar 'gyur// de dag zas dpa' khrig pa'i lhur le nad cing // rtag tu gnyid gnon khwa ltar g.yo ngan 'gyur// rtag tu 'phags pa ma yin chos la sdang // baha dang pa sun par
84a1(1): ha~M/ byed cing yon tan nyams// zhi ba'i chos 'di thos par gyur par// 'di'ini rgyal bas gsungs pa phyir zhes 'de dang // pa yi slob dpon thos pa rgya mtshor gyurang // yang du thos pa'i smra ba'i gtso bo yin// de yis 'a ni nan
84a2(1): pa ji ltar yang // sangs rgyas bka' ma yin zhes dgag pa byas// pha rol las kyang rgan par gyur nga de'i// bla ma de ni dpag myed yon tan chung // des kyang 'di ni blang ba ma byas kyis// 'di la ma 'dug 'dir dor ba yin// 5
84a3(1): la zangan song ma yim srog myed dang // rnam pa cis kyang gang zag myed paha nang ba// tshul khrims sbyor dang sdom pa'i bya ba la// gang 'bang de'i ngas 'dor skyer 'gyur// gal te theg pa chen po song na mi// ses sngo dge skye byed/ gas / 
84a4(1): deseMs cad myi dmyigs pa// de la bdag gis ngas byas don myed 'gyur// sdig pa'i blo dang mu stegs ngan mtshungs pas// rang gi blo yis rang bzo byed pa ste/ dge slong 'khor gyi nang du rgyal ba ni// tshig 'di gsung bar nam
84a5(1): yang gyi 'gyur ro// po zhes dang 'dzes dang bral ba dang / sur gyi rlom che la gong gdum zhing // phrag rog dargyal rgyags cig pa'i// dge slongab dag ni 'i mtshan la 'byung // la
84a6(1): napa pa rdos byed cing // chob gos mArnams kyi phyos / byed// choman ma thogs zhing cang dang rgyags kyisanas/ bran dang kyis ngag tu mi rnas pa d+ha// de dag sangs rgyas
84a7(1): thogs nas ni// khyim na gnas pa'i skye bo he nad pa byed/ tand pa yon tan phung po 'di spangs nas// de dag rtag tu 'phrin ma ka khyer bar byed// de dag pa lang rta dang bong bu dang // de dag
84a8(1): rtsa sa rnam sa zes// da ni 'i sbyong bas sngo yid ldan 'ang du' du 'phags pa spyod// de dag 'bags kyis ci kyang kyi sa byed/ khyam pa yi bsangag ra byed// rings
84a9(1): ma'o rten ni nga ba'i// dge 'dun gyi dang gang 'ganor de mchungs// dge' slob sani dan 'byor pa mtho bdas ni// de dag la yang kyi ba rjod byed de// rgyal khrims 'jaya sa su bzhugs das ni// rung byed
84a10(1): 'jigs byed gyi bzang rab ces rjod// rab tu byung ba dag bdas pa sang // khyim pa 'dod pas brnam pa de sa phyir// khyim pa mtshungs pa de dag rung ba dang / bu dang bu mo dag kya sod par 'gyur// gang gi kyis
84b1(1): du de dag chos gos dang // las dang longs spyod dag gis bsnyen bkur ba// de yi chung ma la ni yongs chags shing // nyon mongs dbang 'gro rtag tu 'phags pa byin// 'dod pa 'di dag pa he rang bya ma yin te// rung 'gro yi ra
84b2(1): dmyal bar ltung byed ces// de dag khyim pa rnams la rtag smra zhing // de dag bdag nyid ma dul nyer zhi myin// ji ltar de dag bdag nyid ma rul ba// de dag slob ma tshogs kyang rab ma dul// kha zas ngag dpa' khrig pa'i gtam rnams
84b3(1): las// de dag nyin dang mtshan du 'gro bar byed// bstend pa'i phyir gyi yon tan phyir myin te// de dag la ni de dag bsdu ba sbyin// 'gro la rtag 'dir mchod pa thob snyam nas// rang gi slob ma'i tshogs kyis bdag kyang bskorang // 
84b4(1): de dag skye bo rnams la smra ba ni// bdag gi snying rjes 'di dag srung skyekyeH/ slob ma'i tshogs de dag las nam yang ni// rim gro don tu gnyer ba myed ces smra// de la rad kyis ron dang mngon can yang // lus la sha bkra cam
84b5(1): gzugs kyi sdug/ rtag tu 'phags phyin myi dag kha cig kyang / 'ongs shing lpags pa rab tu 'byi nang par 'gyur// lung nod pa dang de sdom pa rnam par nyams// de dag dge slong sor tan rtag myi 'thor// 
84b6(1): de dag khyim pa ma yin dge slong byin// de dag spangs pa dur khro shing dang mtshungs// de dag so sor tha rad dang bslab pa dang // 'du/ la ba la yang gus par byed myi 'gyur// de dag rang nyams rang dbang
84b7(1): 'gro ba he// lags kyu btang ba'i glang po'i dbang po 'dra// de dag ni gas su gnas par gyur kyang ni// sems ri grong du 'gro bar 'gyur ba / nyid mongs kye yis dag tu rab gdungs la// de dag sems kyang 'am
84b8(1): bskyed par 'gyur// de dag sangs rgyas son tan thams cad dang // bslab dang srungs dang thabs kyang brjed nas ni// rgyags dang rgyas dregs pa song rgyas te// de dag kyi bzang mar byed srung bar 'gyur// de dag rgyas po'i gtu
84b9(1): ga' ding // phung po'i gta marjod pas pa ba tu dga'// nye du bsnyen sa 'ang rab tu dga' ba rtse// de dag nyid dang sa cam du sems par byed// bsam gtan dang mngon bta sa su// rtag tu gzug sa
84b10(1): 'khor// garams man pa'ing tho ga cer babyinang par byed// dengan rlob ma 'a'od kyangs rung sa// bdi gtsug la ga 'ang gi lag yin// bdag gi'i dadu 'di rings byas te// dge thong ga ngas pa'i sa 'dun pa// banas
85a1(1): yang 'di 'di ngas sa rnam pa dang // gang ga rgyal khrims ldan zhing son tan ldan// ram 'dzin pa skye ba'i ngan la mngon 'aso pa/ brtso pa// de dag rnams 'i lu sa kyi cing ngo// 
85a2(1): 'di ni pa'i gnas su bskos pa ste/ 'di ni nga'i lhan cig gnas pa'i yin// 'di ni nga'i dga' bar byed pa yin// khyod kyi gnas ni gang yang myed kyis song /  dang na dga' slong dag kyang mang bkod de// mal cha rnams kyang ma lus bgos
85a3(1): zin de la// 'di ni rnyed pa 'byung ba yod ma yin// 'dir ni ci zhig spyad kyis dge slong song // de dag la ni mal stan bgo bya ba// nam du yang srid par 'gyur ba ma yin te// de dag khyim pa lta bur sotshogs 'gyur zhing // mchog
85a4(1): chas rnams dang g.yog 'khor mang bar 'gyur// phyi ma'i dus na nga'i bu de dag/ kun tu smad par byas par gyurang nas ni// de dag nga'i tshig ni dran gyur da te// bas mtha' dag dang nags su de che gnas// kyi hud rnyed
85a5(1): pas zil gnon yon tan sdang // dge slong mang po gang tu 'byung lagyur pa// rgyal ba dam pa yi ni bas nad pa dag/ ring por myi 'o/ dgas par yang 'jig par 'gyur// phyi dus tshul khrims yon
85a6(1): tan ldan pa dag/ rtag par yongs su brnyas par 'gyur ba ste// de dag grong dang yul 'khor grong khyer rnams// spangs nas dgon pa nags su gnas par 'gyur// 'byed dang zur zer thab mo dag
85a7(1): ba dang // yon tan nyams la rtag tu si snang byed// de dag skye bo'i nad par grags 'gyur te// de dag brgyal rgyags pas tshig par 'gyur// 'dir ni nga'i ba ha nad pa yon tan gter// yon tan kun gyi 'bru/ 
85a8(1): gnas mchog dga' ba// 'dini tshul khrims nyams dang phrag dog dang // rgyags pa'i spyod rnams kyis mi 'jig par 'gyur// ci ltar rin zer 'thung gnas brus pa dang // pad ma'i ji bu songs su skams pa dang // rin cen
85a9(1): mchod sngo ba chag par gnas pa gas/ phyi ma'i dus na gta dad pa 'jig par 'gyur// phyi ma'i dus kyi man dam pa'i chos// rnam par 'jig 'gyur shin tu myi 'bad che// dge slong dul pa ma yin de 'dra ba// de dag pa'i ma
85a10(1): 'di 'dzig pa yin// gyod pa 'dis teradapar dga' ba rnams// de dag panang 'grog sa sod de ring// 'di nas 'chi 'pho ba mi dgas 'gro ba dang // dung 'gro'i 'gro dang sems can dmyal bar gnas// po btu ma su
85b1(1): bsngal mtha' yas pa// myi 'azang drag po nyams su myong bar 'gyur// ji he re yis myi'i lus rnyed kyang // rtag tu sdug bsngal mya ngar sbar bar 'gyur// sdig pa'i khyod pa 'di la rtag he na pa// long ba'am 'od nanam rnam par
85b2(1): 'gyur// sus la rtag tug bkra 'byung bar 'gyur// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mthong na 'jigs par 'gyur// gang zhig sa pa'i khyod pa le dad pa ni// de la su yang yid rton gyi 'gyur te// de'i tshigs yid ches myi 'phru
85b3(1): de ni rtag tu smra 'bab par yang 'gyur// de dag nad dang sdug bsngal brgya yis gdungs// mtshon dang shing dang bong pa rnams kyis bsdu na // bkres dang skom pa'i 'jigs pas yongs su gdungs// yang na de ni rtag par rab tu brnyas/ 
85b4(1): sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa dag thos nas ni// nges pa rnams kyis sdug pa'i myod 'or la// legs pa'i myod la rtag tu bste rad par gyis 'di nas phyin chad 'gyod par gyur da ta re// gang zhig sangs rgyas
85b5(1): dpa ni 'phags tshogs dang // bslab dang sbyangs pa'i chos la rag/ 'gyur pa// gnyen dang rnyed dang grags brjod spang byos la/ de ltar rtag tu mngon par 'thon par gyis// 'dus byas 'don
85b6(1): sgyu ma lta bu dang // 'jigs par 'gyur dang rmyi lam lta bu dang // sdug pa kun dang myi ring 'bral 'gyur zhing // 'di la rtag pa gang / yang myed rtogs la// pha rol phyi nang dang sa dang stobs rnams la/ 
85b7(1): rtag tu rab tu sbyor zhing 'bad par gyis// ci srid byang chub mchogs sa ma rgyas pa// de srir brtson 'grus rnam sa nyams ma bya// gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste dang po'o// 
85b8(1): yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag phal che la sbyor de dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ myi brtson pa dag ni myi brtson pa dag pa mchod par
85b9(1): 'gyur// g.yo' dang ldan pa dag ni g.yo dang ldan pa dag la mchod par 'gyur// myi shes pa dag ni myi shes pa dag la sti stang byed par sems pas 'gyur lu/ zang zing la dga' bar yang 'gyur zhing / chags pa mang ba dang / 
85b10(1): khyim la ser sna byed pa dang / g.yo dang ldan pa dang / bya khwa ltar mu cor smra ba dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / nye du lhur le nad par 'gyur/ phan tshun bas+yA par 'gyur/ rnyed pa yongs su btsal ba'i phyir de dag grong
86a1(1): du 'dug gi// sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir ma yin par 'gyur/ de dag myi shes bzhin du ji ltar na bdag la pha rol gyis mang du thos pa dang / dge ba'i chos dang ldan pad
86a2(1): shes par 'gyur snyam du bdas shes pa dang ldan par 'am 'che bar 'gyur/ ci skur 'dir myi bson pa de bzhin du zhes byed par 'gyur/ sdong chag pa bzhin du 'gyur/ gcig la gcig 'khrul pa chol pa dang / sbyor ba nyams pa dang / byin
86a3(1): pa dang / le lo can dang / phan tshun myi 'thun pa'i chos 'gro ba byed pas/ ye shes la myi rtog pa mang ba dang / rang dkar byed pa dang / shar gnyer ba dam pa dang / gnod sems kyis rgyas pa dang / rigs pa ma yin pa'i 'khord kyi skye bo dang / 
86a4(1): 'gro bar byed pas bstand pa 'di la spyod par 'gyur/ yongs su myi 'dri ba'i ngang tshul can dang / chos mnyan pa don tu myi gnyer bar 'gyur/ myi rigs pa spyod pas dbul ba'i khyim rnams su skye ba yongs su 'dzind par 'gyur
86a5(1): de dag dbul ba'i khyim nas rab tu byung nas rnyed pa tsam gyis bstan/ pa 'di la dga' ba skyed par 'gyur ro// de dag la nyes pa bshags/ de pa yang myed par 'gyur na/ ye shes mngon par rtogs pa lta smos
86a6(1): kyang ci dgos/ de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams bor nas she/ sa kyi khe dang rnyed pa tsam gyis bdag dge sbyong po zhes bdag nyid khasa'ache bar 'gyur te/ yul 'khor skyong pa ni gang zag de lta bu de dag
86a7(1): la rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa yang myi sman/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ste ga la zhig/ de dag la ni bde 'gro yang ring na byang chub lta smos kyang ci dgos/ su la 'khor skyong gang zag de lta bu de dag la byang chub kyi bar chad byed pa'i
86a8(1): chos brgyad yod par sma te/ brgyang gang zhe na/ ngan song gsum du skye ba dang / mtha' 'khob pa'i mye'i nang du skye ba dang / dbul po'i khyim du skye ba dang / rigs dma' bar skye ba dang / mdog pan cing rtogs pa 'and pa dang / sdig pa'i bshes gte
86a9(1): dang phrad pa dang / nad mang ba dang / ya ba ma spangs pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong chos brgyad po de dag ni byang chub kyi bar chad byed par brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong tshig gis khas
86a10(1): 'che ba lang byang chub ces kyi sla'o// tshul 'chos pa la spyod pa yongs su dag pa zhes kyi smra'o// gso byed pas byang chub kyi khyod pa zhes kyi smra'o// zang zing lhur len pa la sangs rgyas la mchod pa'o zhes kyi sla'o// mngon pa
86b1(1): / nga rgyal can la shes rab yongs su dag pa zhes myi smra'o// shes rab 'chal pa la the tsom gcod pa zhes pa myi smra'o// ser sA car ya bsam pa yongs su dag pa zhes pa myi smra'o// myi brtson pa mang ba la gzungs 'thob ces pa myi smra'o// 
86b2(1): yang dag pa'i yon tan ma yin pa yongs su tshol ba la bde 'gro 'thob ces pamyi smra'o// khyim la ser sna byed pa la lus yongs su dag pa zhes pa myi smra'o// myod lam bcos ma can la sangs rgyas dang phrad pa zhes dmyi smra'o// khyim la chad/ 
86b3(1): pa la ngag yongs su dag pa zhes nga myi smra'o// ma gus pa la sems yongs su dag pa zhes nga myi smra'o// chod myi shes pa la chos 'dod pa zhes pa myi smra'o// lus dang srog la lta ba dang bcas pa la chos yongs su tshol zhes nga myi smra'o// sul
86b4(1): 'khor skyong ji ltar skyes bu blun po de dag la smad pa ltar stond pa drug la de ltar nga myi smod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni gzhan du smra ba la gzhan du byed pa'o// lnga dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la slu ba'o// de nas
86b5(1): ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' saHla to// // yang dag ma bsdams rgod cing khengs pa can// ma gus nga rgyal// de ldan zhing chags shas che// nyon mongs zil non tha ba nyon mongs
86b6(1): de 'dra dag la byang chub mchog rab ring // chags pas zil kyis don ma me lo 'phel// le los zil kyis non na dad pa nyams/ dad pa nyams na tshul khrims rab tu nyams// tshul khrims 'a/ 
86b7(1): par gyur da na bzang 'gro nyams// dbul lor gyurd pas rab tu byung gyur da te// mchod pa rnyed nas dbul las grol bar 'gyur// de dag gis ra gyi 'ur ni bor nas su// gso ma'i khur ni len par byed dang mtshung // 
86b8(1): rnyed pa don tu gnyer bas dgon par 'gro// der song nas kyang gos dang nye du tshol// mngon shes rig dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs// bor nas de ni phyir yang nye du 'dzin // rmongs nas nga rgyal dbang gis ngan songs// 
86b9(1): kyi khom 'gro ba rnams dpa dbul po dang // dpal ba'i rigs su skye dang song ba dang // mdog nga pa dang mthu chung de dag 'dzidang // de dag tshul dang pyod pa yongs nyams dngos// zag myed rnyed ras dran pa rab tu nyams/ 
86b10(1): g.yang sa chen po mya bzad ltung bar 'gyur// de nas bskal da pa bye bar tha rad pa myed// gal te der ni thob pas byang chub na// de phyir lhas byin gyis kyang byang chub 'thob// rnam par 'thor rlung gis ni bya ltung ltar/ 
87a1(1): tsa/ chags pas kyang ri re sar gyi rigs so// bsod nams nyams shing gzhan gyi chung ma chags// tshul khrims ma ngag dge ba rnams las nyams// byang chub sems kyis ye shes gang sa thog/ de dag bstan da la phyir nos
87a2(1): rung shing bzhin/ byang chub ron gnyer sangs rgyas chos tshol pa// dper na thar pa de bzhin gyi gnas so// de'i nong gis gre'u la ram byas sar// nga rgyal zi la ror byang chub de 'dra'o// byang chub don du gnyer bas chos cig phyir/ 
87a3(1): nga yis rang gi srog ni phangs pa'ang btang // chos de btang nas brtson dang myi ldan pa// don myed gyur nas khasta na las ltung bar 'gyur// da ni sngon chad legs par bshad don phyir// g.yang sa chen po phye ste 'bar bar mchongs// re
87a4(1): thos nas ni sdug dang myi sdug pa// thams cad rnam par spangs te nan tan gnas// bas nad pa sna tshogs yon tan 'byor de thos la// de dag nam yang 'do da pa myi skye na// chos myin 'dod la byang chub ga la yod// dper na long ba
87a5(1): lam gsal myed dang mtshungs// yul 'khor skyong sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na// bskal pa grangs myed pa'i yang ches grangs myed pa/ rgya che ba/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa mtshungs pa myed pa/ dpag tu myed pa
87a6(1): tshad myed par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyend pa/ skyes bu
87a7(1): 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba/ bla na myed pa/ lnga dang myi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das roran grub blo zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // yul 'khor spyong de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po 'od gzer ldan
87a8(1): zhes bya ba zhig zung ngo // yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od gzer ldan ni/ 'dzam bu'i gling dpag tshad khri drug gong la rgyal srid byed do// yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling dem grong khyer nyi khri dang / khyim bye ba phrag song
87a9(1): yod do// yul 'khor skyong rgyal po'ang gzer ldan de rgyal po'i pho brang gang na gnas pa rgyal po 'od gzer ldan de'i grong khyer rin po che snang ba zhes bya ba shar nub du chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa/ lho byang du rgyar dpag tshad bdun
87a10(1): song pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi phyir rim pa bdun dang / phyog yangs ris su bris nas mdzes par byas pa yod ngo // de'i tshe sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag bcu thug par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong rgyal
87b1(1): po 'di gzer ldan gyi bu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa/ mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ de btsas ma thag tu rin po che sna bdun gyi gter hong byung bar thu
87b2(1): to// rgyal po la khang bzangs kyi nang du yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gter gyi bcu'i tshad tsam zung bar gyurd to// yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu gzho ru bsod nams kyi 'od gzer de btsas ma thag tu 'jam du gring pa'i sems can thams
87b3(1): yid rangs par gyur da to// sems can gang dag btson ra na 'khod pa de dag kyang btson ra nas tha dad par gyurd to// yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu gzho nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer des nyi ma bdun gyis 'jig rten pa'i sgyu ma la ji snyed pa de
87b4(1): dag thams cad rtogs par gyurd to// yul 'khor skyong de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis nam gyi gung gi dus la bab pa dang / rgyal bu gzho nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer la/ gzho nu khyod bag yod par gyis
87b5(1): shig/ myi rtag par so sor brtag pa la mkhas par gyis shig/ zho nu myi rnams kyi srog ni chen po myed pa / tshe 'pho bar 'gro ba si den gyis 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par lta bar bya zhing / las dang / 
87b6(1): bya ba dang / myi 'gal bar gyis shig ces bskul te/ de'i tshe lnga'i chu de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// gnod nu bag myed par ni gyu rad ta re// bag myed dbang du song bar gyur/ 
87b7(1): tare// bde' bar gshegs pas lan yod rab bsod cing / de gshegs rnams kyis zag myed rnams kyang spang // nges pa gang de 'di na pan yod cing // legs sdom 'ga' la ser sna byed pa dang / 
87b8(1): sems can kun la snying rje byams yid ldan// de dag ring po myi thogs myi mchog 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa gang dag 'das pa dang // 'di na da skar dag nga gang ma byon// de dag thams cad dge ba rnams kyis 'phags// 
87b9(1): bag yod lam nyid la yang shin tu gnas// bza' dang bdud dang gos dang kha zas dang // gser dang dngul dang nor bu mu tog rgyan// bskal pa bye bar de dag rnams kyis bkang // byang chub dam pa 'dir ni don du gnyer// 
87b10(1): rkang pa lag pa de bzhin rna dang sna// slong ba rnams la rab tu dgas byin na// byang chub yon tan kun gyis bsam rdzogs nas// de dag ring por myi thogs myi mchog 'gyur// rgyal srid bde dang sdug pa'i bud myed dang // 
88a1(1): ror rnams thams cad du yang rnam spangs te/ 'dus byas kar la lA dang spya ma 'phra/ 'dod pa skyed pa dgon par gnas par gyis/ srog ni brtan pa myed de cag tu gso// 'jim pa'i bum pa sa zhum 'jig
88a2(1): can// brnyan ma 'dra zhing rtag tu zer zug byin// gzho nu 'di la rtag myed dge ma yin// ngan 'gror ltung ba'i chen 'di na ni// pa dang ma yang 'dzi nad par byed pa myed// myi yis dge dang phyi dge gang byas pa// de ni rtag tu
88a3(1): phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// 'dod pa'i rgyu yis bskal mang rgya mtshor ni// don myed par yang gcig gis gcig bsad de/ khyod kyis myi phan ma byas ci yang myed// don myed nyid du ngal ba banye nad par gyur// da ltar
88a4(1): kyis 'gro phan byang chub zhi// mtshungs myed go 'phang dam pa btsal ba 'i phyir// sha dang rkang dang pags pa de bskams kyang // de lta na yang khyod ni ngal ma sems// bde bar gshegs pa 'byung ba rnyed par dka'// zhi ba'i
88a5(1): chos thos pa yang shin tu dka'// bsgom pa byas te bdud kyi phyogades bsaHla na// sangs rgyas ye shes ring por myi thogs thob/ bshes gnyen bzang la rtag tu yongs rten cig/ sdig pa'i bzhes
88a6(1): gnyen yongs su spang bar gyis// de dag rtag tu bzang lam khrid/ par byed// lam gol las kyang rtag tu zlog par byed// batsho/ na 'grus shin tu brtan pa legs byos te// lus dang srog la/ 
88a7(1): 'dod pa rnam spangs nas// rdo rje sa bu stong gi bsam brtan par/ sangs rgyas lam 'di nyid la gnas par gyis// sngon gyi gyi mchog sa pa 'od byed pa// kun kyang ko 'phang ngas pa bu myed pa/ 
88a8(1): tshol ba'i chen spyod yul dgon par dga'// khyod kyang de dag pyod pa'i lam du phyogs// dgon par gnas la rtag tu dga' bar gyis// pha dang ma dang bu dang sdug pa'i gnyen// skye bo snying du sdug pa kun spongs la/ 
88a9(1): lus dang srog la sred par ma byed pAH// bde gshegs ye shes rgya cen btsal bar gyis// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzho mu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer gyis de nas bzung ste/ lo bcu'i bar du nam yang rmugs pa dang / 
88a10(1): gnyid kyis nond par ma gyur da/ nam yang dgod par ma gyur da/ mes par ma gyur da/ dga' ba byed par ma gyur pa/ yongs su pyad par ma gyur da/ nam yang bskyed mos tshal du ma song / nam yang grogs po mthong nas ngo
88b1(1): mtsha rang du myi 'dzin / nam yang glu la dga' bar ma gyur / rgyal srid dang / nor dang / khyim dang / grong khyer rnams la 'dod pa bskyed par ma gyur te/ de ltar dngos po thams cad la myi blta bar gcig pu sems shing gnas par gyu
88b2(1): to// nang du yang dag 'jog lhur len cing / 'jig rten la snying po myed pa dang / 'jig pa dang / dbugs 'byind pa myed pa dang / mya sdug pa dang 'phrad pa dang / sdug pa dang 'bral ba dang / byas pa 'drid pa dang / 'khor ba la dga' ba
88b3(1): bro myed pa dang / rgyal srid kyi bde ba slu ba'i chos can dang / srid pa' la mngon par dga' bas chog myi shes pa dang / so so'i skye bo nyid rtag tu myi 'thun par rnam par sems shing / bdag ni byis pa'i skye bo'i myi brtson pa'i nang na gnas kyis
88b4(1): bdag gis cang myi smra bas 'da' bar bya'o snyam nas/ de phyogs gcig/ tu cang myi smra bar gyu rad te/ bag yod pa la sems shing sdug pa dang bral ba ru gcig pu gnas par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal
88b5(1): po 'od gzer ldan gyis/ gzho nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir sa phyogs/ de shig tu grong khyer dga' mchog ces bya ba byas te/ sgo dang byang gi ngo// su lam srang bdun brgya bdun brgya byas so// rin po che sna
88b6(1): bdun gyi phyir dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba bres pa/ mu tig gi dra ba dang / rin po che'i srog shing dang / bla re dang ldan pa/ rim pa bdun gyis/ kun nas bskor to// lam srang thams cad kyi sgor yang rin
