134b9(1): 'das kyis zhal zas yul pa de gsol nas/ sgyu ma yakha na bzang po'i yon yongs su sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bkal sa \u0f7flar to// gang gis sbyin dpag pal sbyin// sbyin pa ji ltar
134b10(1): myi rtog pa// sbyin pa mnyam pa de nyid ni// bzang po la ni yongs rdzogs shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan la kun dka' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'khor kyi khyams 'di rgyas
136a1(1): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa zad myi shes pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mang du thos pa'i snying po yin no// bzhi gang zhe na thos nas chos
136a2(1): bye brag tu shes pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin no// thos nas bya ba ma yin pa myi byed pa 'di'i ni 'di'i snying po yin no// thos nas gzhan la nyond par byed pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin no// thos nas don de nyid rnam par grol ba
136a3(1): 'di ste te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub la gtod par byed pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin te/ bzhi po de dag yin no// rang pochen po 'di dag yi byang chub sems dpa' chos brtond par byed pa'i phan yon yin te/ 
136a4(1): bzhi gang zhe na/ las byas nas zas la yongs su myong pa dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang han dang / nad gsos dang / sman zo rnams rnyed pa dang / gzhan gyi phyogs mthu chung bar byed pa dang / chos 'dod pa'i lha
136a5(1): rnams phyi bzhin 'brang zhing de dag gis bsrungs pas bdud kyis gra/ dgas myi rnyed pa te/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'achos stond par byed pa'i phan yon no// byang chub sems dpa'
136a6(1): chos bzhi dang ldan na/ gzhan dag la chos nyond par byed ci pa'o/ de'i tshig gi lam gzung bar 'os par yang 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog shes pa dang / ngang tshul bzang zhing
136a7(1): mnyen pa dang / bdag nyid kyi chos sgrub pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na shes le las 'byol zhing zang zing myed par chos stond pa yang yin te/ 
136a8(1): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor ba la 'jigs pa skyed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang / 'du 'dzi don tu myi gnyer ba dang / pha rol rjes su srung ba dang / 'phags pa'i rigs la gnas pa he/ bzhi po de dag yin no// @
136a9(1): po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor ba dang / byas pa la lan du phan 'dogs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhan byang chub yang dag par le nad tu 'jug pa dang / sa
136a10(1): byas pa chur myi garo nad pa dang / bdag nyid la byams pa ltar gzhan la yang byams pa dang / skyes bu dam pa'i phal don tu gnyer ba te/ bzhi po de dag yin no// byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sa
136b1(1): can rnams sa mjal bshes myi byed par 'gyur te/ bzhi ga zhe na/ bzod pa'i ngobs kyi go bgos pa dang / lan tu phan 'dogs par cung bad kyang re ba myed pa dang / snyi rje chen po myi 'dod ba dang / sog par zhugs pa rnams phyi 'o
136b2(1): he/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sems can rnams la mdza' bshes myi phyed par 'gyur ro// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas bsnyen par bya ba'i grogs po son te/ bzhi ga bzhi na/ smyon
136b3(1): ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / gang dag 'di'i byang chub nye bar rton par byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
136b4(1): dpa' rnams kyi myi dge' ba'i grogs po yin par rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ theg pa dman pa nyon pa dang / byang chub sems la 'dund pa zlog par byed pa dang / gang dag bsnyen na myi dge ba'i chos 'phel
136b5(1): bar 'gyur ba dang / dge' ba'i chos rnams las yongs su nyams/ par 'gyur ba he/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
136b6(1): 'das rnams dang phrad par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dran pa ste/ gcig pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsngag/ sa pa yang dang yang du sgrogs pa dang / tshul khrims yongs su dag
136b7(1): pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa smon lam 'debs pa ste/ bzhi po de dge yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpal phan yon bzhi po 'di dge mthong na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba spro bar 'gyur te/ 
136b8(1): bzhi gang zhe na yon gnas mchog la mchod par 'gyur ba dang / bdag mthong nas sems can gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mchod na byang chub kyi sems brtan
136b9(1): bar 'gyur ba dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa mngon sum du mthong na dge ba'i rtsa ba satshogs par 'gyur ba ste/ bzang po byang chub sems dpas phan yon bzhi po de dag mthong na/ de bzhin gshegs
136b10(1): pa la mchod pa bya bar sro bar 'gyur ro// bzang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas don gyi dbang bzhi mthong na/ bslab pa lhur le nad par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na ngan 'gro las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / bde 'gro/ 
137a1(1): / thob par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la gus pa dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po ba'i po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsrub pa'i
137a2(1): te/ bzhi gang zhe na byang chub kyi sems myi 'dor ba dang / sems can thams cad la mnyam par sbyor ba dang / pha rold tu phyind pa yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa mnyam pa la myi skrag pa ste/ bzang po bzhi ze
137a3(1): de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yongs su dag pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bya ba ma yin pa myi spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid
137a4(1): la mos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub myi spong ba dang / lta ba bag la nyal dang bcas par yang dag par 'joms pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de ra ga ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yongs su dag pa
137a5(1): yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems da/ dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzind kyi rigs yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du 'dzi myed pa dang / rab tu dben pa dang / sems kyi rnyog pa
137a6(1): myed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar rtond pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po// de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzind kyi rigs yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
137a7(1): rnams kyi tshul bzhin rab tu nyond pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na dge ba'i rtse ba skyes na byang chub kyi sems mngon tu byed pa dang / nang du yang dag 'jog la sgrib pa myed pa dang / rnam par thard pa'i sgo dag la 'dris
137a8(1): par byed pa dang / nyes pa la myi 'jug pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhin
137a9(1): ma yin pa'i sems skye ba zlog par bya ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas skrag pa dang / rnal 'byor da spyod pa dag la ma mos pa dang / dgongs pa dag la myi dga' ba dang / dge ba'i sa pa rnams
137a10(1): mngon par 'du myi byed pa / bzang po bzhi po de dag ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems bzlog par bya ba yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di reg ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyis nges par bsams
137b1(1): pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can dga' ba'i don gyi phyir yang bskal pa phyi ma'i mthar thug par 'khor ba na 'khor bar bya'o// snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par bsams la dang po yin no// bdag gis
137b2(1): can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnam par shes par bya zhing de dag gi nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pashes par bya ba'i phyir chos lastand par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges
137b3(1): par bsams pa gnyis pa yin no// bdag gis myi dge' ba'i chos thams cad spangs shing dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan par byas nas byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug te/ bdud kyi dpung pham par byas nas bla na myed pa yang
137b4(1): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par bsams pa gsum pa yin no// skyong gsum gyi hong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams skad gcig gis
137b5(1): ko bar byas te/ chos baha nad par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sems kyi des nges par bsams pa bzhi pa yin te/ bzang po bzhi po 'dir/ dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyis nges par
137b6(1): bsams pa yin no// bzang po chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang/ chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdur 'dul ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe/ na chos la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog pa dang / tshul bzhin du sbyor
137b7(1): ba dang / chos thams cad rnam par myi rtog pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad la myi gnas pa / bzang po chos bzhi po de dag ni bdud 'dul yi na no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ 
137b8(1): kyi don sems pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na gang zag myed pa'i phyir chos rnams brten nas skye ba yin gyi chos 'ga' yang rgyu myed par ni myi skye ba dang / brten nas skyes pa'i chos gang yin pa de ma skyes pa dang / dngos po myed pa dang / 
137b9(1): byang chub kyi phyir chud myi za ba ha/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don sems pa yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can rnams myi gtong ba yin te/ bzhi gang
137b10(1): zhe na/ sngon gyi smon lam myi 'dor ba dang / yongs su sko ba bzod pa dang / lus dang srog la myi lta ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos pos sdud pa he/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
138a1(1): / rnams kyi yongs su sbyin par byed pa yin te/ ba'i gang zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi sang zing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang / yongs su sbyin pa la chos ston pa yongs su gtong ba dang / dus rus su skul bas dran par byedapa
138a2(1): yongs su gtong ba dang / bdag nyid kyis bde ba spangs nas gzhan gyi dge ba'i ma ba rton pa dang / yongs su sbyin pa byed pa nye/ bza po bzhi po de dag mi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su sbyin par byed pa yin no// 
138a3(1): @bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ ma bsdus pa sdud par byed pa la myi 'jigs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dge ba'i phra ba chu phul yang mos pa dang / rtag tu rgyun gyi chang par gzhan gyi don byed par smo
138a4(1): dang / sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / nges pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur hi dang / tshigs su bcad pa thams cad la don tu ga nyer ba myed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub
138a5(1): sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan da/ sems can gyi myod pa 'jug pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mngon par shes pa thob par// ye shes thob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin chen por gyu rad pa tshad myed
138a6(1): pal 'jug pa dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan ngan stong pa nyid sgom zhing rnam par grol ba dang / ma 'dres pa ste/ ni bo de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' rog
138a7(1): bzhi dang ldan na/ thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems bskyed pa thams cad la byang chub kyi sems sngon tu 'gro te/ tha na nyon mongs pa'i sems la yang rung na dge
138a8(1): ba'i sems la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa dang / sems can thams cad chos kyi snod nyid yin par lta ba dang / ngo bo nyid myed par 'ong du chud pas chos thams cad log pa nyid du nges pa yin par lta ba dang / rnam par grol
138a9(1): bar 'dod pas snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la mngon par zhe nad pa myed pa'o 'du shes sgom par byed pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya'o// 
138a10(1): 'bang po bzhi po 'ang dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa sgom payin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis sems can thams cad bskyab par bya'o snyam du byams pa sgom pa dang / bdag gis sems can
138b1(1): cad bsgral bar bya'o// snyam du byams pa sgom pa dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad bskul par bya'o snyam du byams pa sgom pa dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam du byams pa sgom pa
138b2(1): bzang po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa sgom pa yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje can yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ngan song du skyes pa rnams bdel 'gro'i la
138b3(1): la dkod pa'i snying rje dang / sdig pa'i las dang ldan pa rnams dge' ba'i chos la sbyor ba'i snying rje dang / theg pa dman pa la mos pa rnams theg pa chen po yang dag par le nad tu 'jug pa'i snying rje dang / sems can thams cad yongs
138b4(1): su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam pa'i snying rje ni bzhi pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mngon par shes pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus dang sems yang
138b5(1): ba dang / sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du rnam par 'byed pa dang / sems can/ thams cad la gus pa dang / rim 'gro'i sems skyed pa dang / zhi gnas la me gcig tu gyur da pas rnam par g.yeng ba myed pa
138b6(1): yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang lnga/ na na/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang / zhe na don la rtond pa yin gyi/ tshig 'phrul myi rtond pa dang / 
138b7(1): chos la rtond pa yin gyi/ gang zag la myi rton pa dang / chos thos cad bdag myed pa'i nges pa'i tshig dang / yi ge myi zad par shes nas chags pa myed cing thogs pa myed par nyo nad pas nyond par byed/ 
138b8(1): pa he/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ gzungs thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mang du thos pas ngoms myi shes pa dang / mang du thos pa rnams la chos bzhin du gus
138b9(1): par bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / rtag tu gzhan dag la chos nyond par bathon pa dang / tshig dang yi ge thams cad gtan la dbab pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs te gsungs pa la 'jug pa yin no// bzang // 
138b10(1): po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mos pa dang / phyir mya ldog pa dang / tshogs dang / yongs su myi skyo ba te/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub
141a1(1): cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mchis nyid rnam ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhen/ kun draga' tsho 'di sa ma de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin nyid byer byed panyi du zugs su chud de/ de bzhin nyid byer byed
141a2(1): yin pa der kho bo yang chud cing ji ltar kho bo chud pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang chud la/ ji ltar sems can thams cad chud pa de bzhin du chos thams cad chud pa'i phyir te/ btsun pa kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i
141a3(1): chos nyid ni gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin no// btsun pa kun dga' bo gnyis su myed pa ni gang kun tu shes pa nyid dang / yongs su shes pa yongs su shes pa myed pa nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du shes yongs su shes
141a4(1): pa'i shes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yin pa'i phyir ro// de nas pa com ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsolar to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu bzang po ni lU dang bcas pa'i 'jig
141a5(1): rten mgo rmongs par bgyid pa ste/ sngon yang sgyu ma'i chos nyid kyis/ mgo rmongs par bgyis so// ra yang shes rab dang / ye shes kyis mgo rmongs par bgyid ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ni shes rab
141a6(1): dang / ye shes kyi spobs pa ni de lta bu lags pa'o slad du'o// re/ nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' saHla to// bzang po khyod lnga dang bcas pa'i 'jig
141a7(1): tin mgo mongs par byed pa la bden nam// gsosang pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar mgo rmongs par mdzad pa de bzhin du bdag kyang mgo rmo sa par bgyid lags so// re ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
141a8(1): 'di lta te/ bdag myed pa nyid kyis sems can du tha snyad btags te chos nyond pa dang / srog myed pa dang / gang zag myed pa nyid kyis gang zag tu chos nyond pa 'di ni mgo rmongs par bgyid pa/ chen po lags pa'i srad
141a9(1): du'o// de bzhin gshegs pas ni byang chub kyi snying po la zhugs nas chos 'ga' yang 'chi 'pho ba 'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ skye ba 'am gzigs mod kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang / 'gro ba dang / skye ba'i chos nyond par yang mdzad de/ bcom
141a10(1): ldan 'das de lta lags pas de bzhin gshegs pa sa bdag par gsung ba bka' sosol da pa lta snga dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi yul ka la lags// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la legs so zhes
141b1(1): bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu meg pa po legasa'o// khyod ci skang smra ba de los bzhin te 'dig ste/ bdag myed pa nyid kyis sems cas du ba spyang btags te no mgon pa pa dang / srog myed pa dang / gang zag byed pa nyid kyis gang
141b2(1): tu chos sond pa 'di ni mgo mongs pa chen po yin no// de bzhin gshegs pas ni byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs nas chos 'galas pa 'ching po la/ 'gro ba 'am/ skye ba sa ka nigs sod kyi/ 'chi 'pho ba dang / 'gro ba dang / skye / 
141b3(1): chos stond par yang mdzad de/ 'di la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba 'am/ yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir chos bahand pa'i chos ni 'ga' yang myed do// de nas rigs kyi bu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la rab tu zung dang
141b4(1): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' saHla pa/ byams pa khyod kyis rigs kyi bu bzang po rab tu phyung shig/ de nas byams pa rigs kyi bu rab tu phyung rdzogs par bsnyend par
141b5(1): byas so// rab tu phung rdzogs par bsnyen nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chubasems dpa' rnams ni kha dog dang / rtags dang / tshul gyis rab tu
141b6(1): byung ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig mtshan ma thams cad la yang chags/ pa ma mchis pa sems can yongs su smyind par bgyi ba'i slad du
141b7(1): khams gsum na yang gnas na de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rab tu byung ba lags so// yang de'i tshe bstand pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags lnga stong gis ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
141b8(1): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// dge' slong nyis brgya ni le nad pa myed par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la che dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
141b9(1): ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mying ji lags/ 'di'i mying ji skad ces gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHla pa/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po lung bstand pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ rim gyis byang chub yang dag
141b10(1): par 'byung ba zhes bya bar yA zung shag/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang de bzhin gshegs pa blta bar 'dod pa dang / sems can rnams la sangs rgas kyi mdzad pa bya bar 'dod pa des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung
142a1(1): bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ gzhan dag la yang ba rtand par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo gang gis 'di gzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / grags pa dang / gzhan dag pa yang rab tu
142a2(1): pa des ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba yin/ des ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang byas pa yin no// kun dga' bo de lta bas khyod kyis skye bo mang po la bdel ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / 'dis
142a3(1): he lnga dang mya rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde' ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/ 'chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ kun dga' bo chos gang gis byang chub yang dag par 'byung ba dang / theg
142a4(1): pa chen po 'di las pasang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag ni theg pa chen po 'di las yang dag par rab tu stond te/ des na chos kyi rnam grangs la dri byang chub yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o// kun dga' bo khyod
142a5(1): mos par bya'o// khong du chud par bya'o// gang zhig chos kyi rnagrangs 'di glegs bam du byed pa 'am/ lus la srel ba de'i lus na la de bzhin gshegs pa yod pa yin na/ gang dag gis thos nas
142a6(1): de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa lta smos kyang ji dgos/ de nas bcom/ ldan 'das la rigs kyi bu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sngon gyi dge
142a7(1): ba'i rtsa bskul pa zhes bgyi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na dge' ba'i pha ba ston pasags pa thams cad mngon sum du gyur/ 
142a8(1): pa'i slad du lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' saHlang nas/ rigs kyi bu bzang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / sA dang / myi dang / skam
142a9(1): yin dang / dri zer bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stod do// 
142a10(1): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ sgyu ma mkhan lu ba hand pa zhes bya ba me// le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs s+ho// 
142b1(1): rgya kar gyi mkhan po 'dzin gyi tra dang / prad nya bar ma dang // mo tsa pa ban re se zhes sde las sogs pas bsgyur ba cing zhus te/ gtan la pha pa// 'phan pa la dkon mchon
142b2(1): brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las// le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa ste/ cho 'phrul chen po banya nad pa// bam po dang po'o// / rgya gar skad du// a r+yA / 
142b3(1): dA sa ti dA r+ya u pa de sho na ma a hA yan su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa cho 'phrul chen po bsatand pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdol// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpal thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 
142b4(1): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnya na yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/ mgon myed zas byin kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong hong nyis brgya sna bcu'i dge' slong gi dge 'dun chen
142b5(1): po dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgyad hong dang thabs gcig tu dashugs so// de nas lnga'i bu ded dpon zhes byal 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug no// 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur
142b6(1): pa yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// re na/ sa bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu red dpon gyis 'di skad ces pa / so la to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
142b7(1): cho 'phrul du zhig gis sems rnams 'dul bar mdza lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa la pa/ lA'i bu pon cho 'phrul nam pa gsum gyis sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do// gsuM
142b8(1): gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstand pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lo// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul de gang zhe na/ thogs pa myed pa'i ye shes
142b9(1): kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus gzigs pa gang yin pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa mkhyend cing gzigs pa dang / dkon mchog gsum po dag la ma dad pa rnams dad par mdzad pa dang / las kyi rnam
142b10(1): par smind pa la 'jug pa mkhyend pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gang zag gang la da ltar byung ba na nyes pa spyad pa'i gzhis ngan song dang / ngan 'gro gang yang rung ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba de ni de kho na bzhin du 'gyur
143a1(1): / kyi gzhan sum yin no// zhes kun rjod par mdzad pa dang / gang zag de sngon gyi dge ba'i ma la yang dag par blangs pa'i chus ngan song rnams las bar nas/ lnga dang phyi rag tu skye bar 'brur zhing theg pa shang gis
143a2(1): par 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang ma nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ yang na rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ yang na theg pa chen pos nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du bde ba dang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba dang / bskam rdo
143a3(1): snyed cig gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / pyod pa ji lta bus sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig mthong bar 'gyur zhing mnyes par byed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyend to// mkhyen / 
143a4(1): nas kyang de ni de kho na bzhin du 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yin no zhes de kho na ba zhin du kun rjod par mdzad pa dang / gang zag gang dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus 'dod pa'i khams rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba dang / 
143a5(1): gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi skye mched gang yang rung ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pades rab tu mkhyend to// theg pa gang gis nges par 'byung bar
143a6(1): 'gyur ba dang / bskal pa ji snyed cig gis nges par 'byung bar 'a/ gyur pa dang / pyod pa ji lta bus sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig mthong bar 'gyur zhing mnyes par byed par 'gyur ba
143a7(1): dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyend do// mkhyend nas kyang de kho na bzhin du kun rjod cing lung stond par mdzad pa dang / dge ba 'am/ myi dge ba 'am/ dman pa 'am/ bar ma 'am/ 
143a8(1): mchog gas/ phan sems bskyed pa gcig kyang myi 'da' te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul yin no// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su baha na pa' cho 'phrul gang zhe na/ bsrab pa 'asrung
143a9(1): don kyi phyir rjes su gon par mngad pag pa yin pa ste/ 'dir bya sa mo// 'di ni bya ba ma yin pa mo// 'di ni bstend par bya ba'o// 'don bstend par byab ma yin pa'o// 'di ni sprus pa'o/ 'angan log par dru/ 
143a10(1): rob 'di ga ni sum namanyon mongs pa'i cha nga 'dun no// chos 'di dag ni rnam par byang ba'i ma dang 'thun pa zhes de ltar yon tan thams cad yang dag par tha ba rjes su tshonang pa dang / phyi ges
143b1(1): 'da' des su ldan pa dang / dge ba'i lus kyi tshogs thams cad de su sodad pa dang / las 'di ni nyan thos kyi sreg pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o/ sam 'di ni yus rgyab kyi na pa ljongs su rdzogapa pa
143b2(1): 'o// lam 'di ni theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o// zhes rjes su nyond pa kang yin pa he/ de dag ji skad patand pa bzhin du bsgrubs sa gnas gang yin pa dre rjes su 'jon par myi 'gyur ba ni gnas ma son/ 
143b3(1): skabs ma yin te/ de ni gnas myed do// las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su khrid par byed do// las 'di sang dag par blangs na ni rud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams su khrid par byed do// las
143b4(1): 'di yang dag par blangs na ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su khrid par byed do// las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni lha rnams su khrid par byed do// las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni myi rnams su khrid par
143b5(1): byed do// de la gang dag myi dge ba spangs nas/ dge ba ya / dag par blang ba'i phyir 'jug pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam du 'ju/ dag pa de dag ni lnga dang myi rnams su skyes nas rim gyis yongs su
143b6(1): mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / tshul de lta bu/ sa kha na ma tho ba dang rmongs pa myed pa/ rjes su stond par yang pa/ gang yin pa te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bstan
143b7(1): pa'i cho 'phrul yin no// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gang zhe na/ gang dag rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dul ba'i sems can nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang dregs pas bcom pa rnams la rngu
143b8(1): 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul kun tu stond par mdzad de/ 'di lta he gcig tu gyurd nas du mar 'gyur ro// du mar 'gyur nas gcig tu 'gyur ro// snang bar gyurd cing myo snang bar yang 'gyur ro// phig pa la yang thad kar
143b9(1): 'gro'o// ra ba la yang zar kar 'gro'o// ril sa pa myi thogs par zad kar 'gro'o// sa la yang nyeng du 'thung ba dang / byi'u zul byed de dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no// chu la yang myi nug par 'gro te/ dper na sa la bya ba
143b10(1): bzhin no// nam mkha' la yang 'gro ste/ dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no// lus kyi hod nas mye 'bar bar byed cing / lus kyi smad nas chu'i rgyun 'bab par byed do// lus kyi smad nas mye 'bar bar byed cing / 
150a1(1): sems dang rnam par bral ba'i chos rnams la pha rol kyi sems shes pa yod pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang bral ba'i chos rnams la sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa yod pa dang / sems dang / lus dang / smra
150a2(1): dang / brtson 'grus dang bral ba'i chos rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 'thob pa dang / gnas myed pa'i chos rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i sgom pa dang / skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa'i chos rnams la yang dag pa'i spong
150a3(1): bsgom pa dang / dbang po myed pa'i chos rnams la dbang po btand pa dang / stobs myed pa dang / nyam chung ba myed pa'i chos rnams la stobs yongs su rjod pa dang / nye bar zhi ba'i chos rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag bshad pa dang / 
150a4(1): khyad par myed pa'i chos rnams la lam smos pa dang / zhi ba'i mthar song ba'i chos rnams la zhi gnas skyed pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams la lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang / rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya
150a5(1): ngan las 'das pa'i chos rnams la mya ngan las 'das pa smos pa 'o zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang / dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rang lta bu des rgyal po dge'
150a6(1): ba'i bkod pa de dang / bu hong po de dag dang btsun mo'i tshogs de da/ ga la mo 'phrul baha nad pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de nyid la 'jam/ sa te/ de lta de ltar chos pa ha nad pa dang / srog chags brgyad
150a7(1): khri ba ni hong blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu se skyes so// rgyal po dgel ba'i bkod pa dang / de'i bu stong gis ni chos rnams la rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to// 
150a8(1): de dag gis bzod pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi spobs pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon
150a9(1): bar btod do// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dbus na ni// spun po'i rgyal po mengs pa sang// de bzhin dgel 'dun dbus na ni/ chos kyi rgyal po rnam par mdzes// ji skar nyi ma 'char ba yis// mun pa rnams ca/ 
150a10(1): sesang pa sang// de bzhin sangs rgyas mdzod su so // sangs rgyas zhi ngan mas snang bar bgyid// bai ska zla la nya ba'i// rnam yongs rdzogs lnga le ltar// sangs rgyas chos rnams rdzogs pa'o// 'jig rten / 
150b1(1): mgon yang lha de lags// ji ltar me tog pad ma ning// rab kyi nang du myi gos ltar// de bzhin 'jig rten mgon po yang // 'jig rten chos kyis myi gos lags// ji ltar seng ge ri dgas rgyal// nags na sgra skad sgrogs pastam
150b2(1): de bzhin skyes bu seng ge yang // stong pa nyid kyi sgra skad sgrogs// mchis sam yang na ma mchis dang // mchis dang ma mchis thams cad dang // mthar lta ba las rnam 'das pas// nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// skye ba 'am/ 
150b3(1): yang na 'jig pa'ang rung // de dag mtshan mar bahan ma dzad cing // myi skye 'gag pa ma mchis pa// nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// pha rol dang ni tshu rol dag/ de dag rnam par rtog par bstand// chos rnams
150b4(1): kun la myi gnas pa// nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// kun nasanyon mongs nam byang sa// de gnyis mtshan nyid ma mchis te// shin tu dri ma ma mchis chos// nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// 'dod
150b5(1): chags zhe sdang gti mug nI// yongs su rtog las byung ba te/ de rtog bral nam rtog ma mchis pa// nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes pa kyi// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// re dag lam su zhug
150b6(1): pa he// chos rnams shin tu gsog lags pa// nges pa sing ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// skye dpa 'chi dang 'khor ba ni// phyin ci log las zung ba te/ phyi rAg sdug bsngal bdag myed do// 
150b7(1): nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// sna dab dmyigs pa gnas lags // de dag gis ni 'jig rten 'dug/ chos rnams stong par rabashad pa// nges par seng ge'i sme zhes bgyi// 'jig rten mngon
150b8(1): pos cho 'phrul ni// gang dag ji snyed bahan mdzad pa// de dag thams cad bshad pa ni// nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// sems ni mnyam pa nyid slad du// rjes su 'thun dang myi 'thun pa'i// gang la'ang sems
150b9(1): ni myi 'dug pa// de ni nges 'atsun mthong ba sags// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad paso// zab cing ni la 'thun 'apyod cing // de la yod par myi bgyid du// de ni rjes 'dun brjod pa lags// phyir
150b10(1): dam gtogs par// den mi rnams sa 'dun 'gyur zhing// nges nanam par gyi rkyong pa// don rjes 'thun rjod pa sanas// stong pa'i rna sems can r+tha// de bzhin ga pa'i rna pa 'i// rnam
151a1(1): kun la ma chags pa// de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lags// sangs rgyas sgra dang nyon mongs smra// rnam mang chos kyi sgra rnams dang // gang gi smra la'ang myi rtog pa// de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lags// sbyin
151a2(1): ngang tshul khrims thos pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab dang // de bzhin kun la brtson bgyid pa// de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lags// thams cad dag la sems mnyam zhing // byang chub sems ni mya
151a3(1): spong la// byang chub lam na nyon bgyid pa// de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lags// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag la// de 'dra'i chos na bstan da mdzad de// de la som nyi ma mchis pa// de ni rjes 'thun
151a4(1): bzod pa lags// bdag kyang byang chub sangs rgyas zhing // seng ge'i sgra skad bsgrags nas ni// ji ltar 'dre nad pa bstan mdzad pa'i// cho 'phrul nges par baha nad par bgyi// zhing 'di bsam gyis mya
151a5(1): khyab he// bla myed bsod nams zhing de la// bdag gis da sa bon btab pas na// bdag ni slar ldog ma mchis lags/ dog sa thams cad rdol 'gyur zhing // rgya mtsho'ang bas par
151a6(1): 'gyur ka ra 'i// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bskrund pa'i// sa/ bon rnams kyang chab myi 'tshal// sems can rnams kyi seMm/ 'tshal cing // nam mkha' gzhal bar rngo thag gi// byang
151a7(1): chub tu ni bskrund pa'i sems// de'i bsod nams tshad ma mtshas// bdag gi bsam pa ji 'dra ba'i// dbang du lnga dang dri za dang // myi rnams gzhan dag ma mchis te// bcom ldan 'das nyid
151a8(1): bdag gi dbang // 'drenang pa bdag ni long spyod dang // gzugs rang mtho ris myi 'chas kyi// myi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen pa ni// ri 'drade sar bdag gyurd cig/ byang chub la ni dmyigs 'byes nas// 
151a9(1): bdag gis dgung lo 'bum du 'i// ma chags sdang ba ma mchis par// bdag gis bde'i gshegs bsnyen bkur bgyis// bdag gis byis pa stong rnams dang // mchis drang yongs su sbyin bgyis pa/ 
151a10(1): gang lags 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi/ byang chub slad du sro ba mdzodapa// bdag gis bde gshegs legs mthong zhing // chos 'di legs par thos pa dang // byang chub la ni rtag dka' ba// bdag gis rnyed pa
151b1(1): legs par rnyed// gang zhig byang chub dga' bgyid pa// de ni chos la 'ang rtag tu dgal// chos rnams spong ba 'ang myi bgyid pa// sems can kun la rtag dka' lags// de nas 'khor de nyid du chos smra ba'i dge slong
151b2(1): chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba zhig 'dus te 'dug par gyurd pa des/ rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul de dang 'thun par ma byas kyi myi 'dun/ 
151b3(1): bar byas pas na/ khyod ni gnas ma yin pa la gnas pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub ni chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas pa gnas las 'jug pa myed pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni tshor pa thams cad
151b4(1): myed pas shes pa myed pa'i mtshan nyid yin no// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni blangs pa myed cing bor ba myed pas bla bab myed la/ dor ba myed pa yin no// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni nam mkha' la bris pa dang / 'dra
151b5(1): bas gzugs myed pa/ kha dog myed pa/ rtags myed pa/ dbyibs myed pa yin no// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rang bzhin gyisadayongs su dag pas gnyen po myed pa yin no// rgyal po chen po// 
151b6(1): byang chub ni chos thams cad dang mnyam pas thams cad kyi rjes su/ song ba yin no// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas gso ba myed pa yin no// rgyal po chen po
151b7(1): byang chub ni rab tu zhi ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas zhi ba'o// rgyal tsha chen po byang chub ni brtag pa dang / bsal ba dang bral bas nye bar zhi // rgyal po chen po byang chub ni myi 'dun pa skyed pas lhag pa
151b8(1): g.yo ba myed pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni yongs su grub pa myed pas sems mnyam pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pas sems can dang mtshungs pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub
151b9(1): ni rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin pas skye ba myed pas rab tu phye ba'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni sems dang / sid dang / rnam par shes pa dang / bral bas rnam par rig pa skyed pa'o// rgyam po chen
151b10(1): byang chub ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das las rgyu ba myed pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad dngabral 'am gros pa byed pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni chom pa nyid kyis
152a1(1): nyid yin pas stong ba'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas mtshan ma myed pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni smon pa dang / bral bas smon pa myed pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni las kyi
152a2(1): rnam par smind pa myed pas mngon par 'du byed pa myed pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mtshan nyid gsum dang / bral bas 'dus ma byas pa ste/ rgyal po chen po gang dag byang chub kyi mtshan nyid de lta bu dang / ngo bo nyid de lta bu la sgrub pa/ 
152a3(1): byed pa dpag pa dag smon lam 'debs par byed pa dang / gang dag mngon par dga' bar byed pa dang / gang dag 'dod par byed pa de dag thams cad ni log par grol ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub ci 'dra bar byang chub
152a4(1): sems dpa'i spyod pa yang de 'dra ba yin pas na/ gang dag de ltar spyod pa de dag ni yang dag par spyor pa ma yin ba'i phyir ro// 
152a5(1): bam po gnyis pa'o// / de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas/ chos smra ba'i dge' slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan la 'ang skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod byang
152a6(1): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa nyid kyi spyod pa la spobs/ par gyi shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / chos smra ba'i dge' slong / chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis rgyal po dge' ba'i bkod pa la 'di skad
152a7(1): ces smras so// rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad la rlom sems myed pa/ mnyam pa nyid kyis bdog pa thams cad yongs su tong ba'i phyir spyod pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyir
152a8(1): yin no// num khrims kyis rlom sems su myi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul khrims dang / bsal pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams cad yang dag par le nad pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phying
152a9(1): pa yin no// bzod pas rlom sems su myi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis za ba dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / 'chab pa'i yongs su gdung bal dang / zhe sdang gi yongs su gdung ba thams cad 'byin par byed pa ni
152a10(1): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi khyod bayin no// bson 'grus kyis rlom sems pa sa byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis 'artson 'grus pa na'i ba'abar ba dang / bum pa byed pa ni byang chub sems dang rnams kyi
152b1(1): pyod pa yin no// bsam gtan gyis rlom sem su myi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bsam gtan dang / rnam par tha rad pa dang / ting nge 'dzi nang dang / snyoms par 'jug pa grub pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa 'i
152b2(1): no// shes rab kyis rlom sems su myi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyand pa'i shes rab kyi tsho gas yongs su tshol ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// gnyis dang bral ba'i btang snyoms mnyam pa nyid kyis
152b3(1): tshangs pa'i gnas bskyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// mngon par shes pas rlom sems su myi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mngon par shes pa skyes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// don/ 
152b4(1): dang chos la nges par sems pa mnyam pa nyid kyis so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// chos kyi dbyings gsol ba myed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis rton pa la mos pa/ 
152b5(1): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// yang dag/ par skyo ba myed pa'i sems kyis nges par sems pa mnyam pa nyidacad kyis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par sdud pa ni byed
152b6(1): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// don 'thun pa/ mnyam pa nyid kyis bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yang dag par 'dzind pani/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sems
152b7(1): kyis rlom sems su myi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// nam mkha' yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs
152b8(1): su dag pa dang / zhing yongs su dag pa mnyam pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos la so sor rtog pa mnyam pa nyid
152b9(1): kyis mtshan sum cu pa gnyis kyi tshogs yang dag par sdud pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// lus dang ngag rang sems mnyam pa nyid kyis lus dang ngag dang / sems brgyand pa ni byang chub ma
152b10(1): dpa' rnams kyi khyod pa yin no// sems can thams cad la bdag myed par mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad la re zhig bya snyam du khro ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi khyod pa yin no// myilam kyi
153a1(1): rang ba'i na ga bur mos pa mnyam pa nyid kyis 'khor bas yongs su myi skyo ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyor pa yin no// las dpalas kyi rnam par sbyin pa la mos pa myed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis med pa
153a2(1): par spyod pa'i las byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pyod pa yin no// chos sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog pa mnyam pa nyid kyis brtul zhugs dang dka' thub kyi go cha bgos pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa
153a3(1): yin no// sdug bsngal skye ba myed par shes pa mnyam pa nyid kyis sdug bsngal thams cad bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// mdza' bshes dang mdza' bshes ma yin pa la sems snyoms par
153a4(1): mnyam pa nyid kyis mnga' ba brtan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// lan re ba myed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis lhag pa'i bsam bu la sbyor ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// 
153a5(1): thos pa dang bsgrub pa mnyam pa nyid kyi thos pa tshol bas myi ngomasad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// zang za/ dang myed pa'i chos nyond pa mnyam pa nyid kyis chos la slob dpon
153a6(1): gyi dpe' mkhrung myed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyor/ pa yin no// chos dben pa mnyam pa nyid kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzind pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod
153a7(1): pa yin no// don dam pa'i bden pa mnyam pa nyid kyi bden pa 'i shes pa yongs su tshol ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byorayin no// sems can la shin tu 'dud pa mnyam pa nyid kyis
153a8(1): dargyal nges par bcom pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// yon tan thams cad yang dag par blangs pas rlom sems myed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis yon tan thams cad yang dag par 'gru pa yongs su
153a9(1): 'di kya mas dpa' rnams kyi khyo yin no// la po 'i god pasu byung chub sems da nusas kyis dag nyid kyi khyod pa /  / 
153a10(1): dman pa dang rgya rtson 'anams kyi chom bla 'i den slong kyis kyi rgyam can ma mngon par 'a // du ham pa dag gis kyang sa rgya
153b1(1): dag gis chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan la bkab nas/ tshig 'di skad du gang bdag cag gis skyes su dam pa 'dis yul blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dag rnyed pa ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs
153b2(1): rnying do// sems can thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de lta bu dang / spobs pa de lta bu dag thob par gyurd cig ces kyang smras so// de nas chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis rgyal po dge 'a
153b3(1): bkod pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ gos dang / rgyan tsam gyis mchod pa de ni mchod pa chen po ma yin gyi/ de las gzhan pa'i mchod pa byang ba du 'phags pa la dag kyang sod kyis de dag khyod kyis
153b4(1): sbubs shig de yang gang zhe na/ de nas de'i tshe chos smra ba'i dge' spong chos kyi rgyas mtshan gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang dag nyo chen sems can 'di dag kun// byang chub phyir ni rab tu zhugs
153b5(1): gyurd cing // ma zhum sems kyis bskal pa rdzogs par ni // bu dang chung ma'i sbyin pa byas pa bas// gang gis byang chu ba phyir na sems bskyed nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes
153b6(1): su bslab pa rang // rang byung sems kyis gom pa gcig rmor// / re ni de bas bsod nams khyad par 'phags// gang de/ ka sngan chad zung ba'i sangs rgyas dang // gang dag ma byon dru
153b7(1): dang bzhugs pa rnams// de dag skyon mngakhab ni ma spangs par/ bla myed byang chub zhi ba thob pa myed// rab byung de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// rab tu bstod cing bsngags la bkur ba
153b8(1): he// gang zhig sangs rgyas kun la mchod 'dod pa// rgyal ba'i baha nad lnga rab byung gzung bar gyis// gang zhig khyim gnas rin cen khyim brgya nad pa'i// gang 'a ba'i bye snyed sangs rgyas zhing byin dang // 
153b9(1): gapa sa rab byung nyid dang mtshan gcig tu// myi rtag sdug bsngal bdag myed sems byed na// gang zhig rab 'byung bgayod zur pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub nye ba dang // bdud kyi dkyil 'khor/ 
153b10(1): shin tu bcom byas shing // dge ba'i phyogs kyang myi 'grib 'phel ba yin// rab 'brung de ni lam ngan spangs pa dang // lam gyi rjes 'thun 'phags pa'i skye bos bstod// de ni dge 'azung ba ma yin nang / 
154a1(1): de ni yongs su 'dzind pa spangs pa yin// khyim las grol ba nyon mongs myi 'phel zhing // nyon mongs rnam grol bdud kyi 'ching ba myed// rnam grol sems ni byang chub spyad pa pyod// pyod pa dag pas byang
154a2(1): chub rnyed myi dka'// de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / longs spyod dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dag la myi lta bar gyur da cing stsol 'dod chags dang / bral ba
154a3(1): skyes par gyur da te/ rab tu 'byung ba la sems gzhol bar gnas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba
154a4(1): la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyend par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob lags am// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ra rab lta bu res bka' sa la pa/ rgyal po chen po rab tu 'byung ba ni dgag pa myed pa he/ 
154a5(1): sems can thams cad la yang bar du myi gcod cing skabs yod do// // khyim na gnas pa ni nyon mongs pa'i nang na gnas pa yin gyis/ gal te 'dod na ngas khyod la gdams shing rjes su ba nya nad kyis
154a6(1): khyod kyis kyang btams shing rjes su bstand pa bzhin du bsgrub par/ bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das des rab tu 'byung ba'i skabs/ phye ba dang / rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas bu stong po de dag la smras
154a7(1): pa/ khyed cag la rgyal srid bsgrub pa dang / sems can rnams chos yang dag par 'dzi nang tu 'jug par sprob su yod/ de dag thams cad tus smras pa/ yab bdag cag kyang dad pas khyim nas khyim ma mchis
154a8(1): par rab tu 'byung lags kyis bdag cag myi dor bar gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te khyed cag thams cad rab tu byung na gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad rab tu chud zos par 'gyur
154a9(1): kyis/ khyed cag las gang sems can rnams la brtan pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug par 'gyur ba des/ rgyal srid bsgrubs la sems can rnams chos yang dag par 'dzi nad du chug shog/ de nas rgyal bu gzho su de dag gi
154a10(1): rang nas rgyal bu gzho mu snyi rje cher sems zhes bya ba des rang ga pa de dang / rgan rabs de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// rab 'bru son tan du ma 'phags pa zhes// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsu
154b1(1): mod kyi// de lta lags kyang snying rjer gyur pas na// 'gro la phan phyir rgyal srid bdag gis bsgrub// ji srid 'tsho bar bdag ni tshangs spyod cing // gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa blang bar bgyi// me tog rnams dang dri dang
154b2(1): thug pa dang // de bzhin chang yang myang bar myi bgyi'o// lus la rgyan rnams kyi kyi thogs shing // mchil ldum myi 'tshal rin cer gtsug phud sbyin// khri rkang gser las babyis par myi nyal zhing // rgyal po'i rkyen kyi nang / 
154b3(1): kyang myi 'tshal lo// sil snyan glu dbyangs smra la myi nyand cing // rma bya dang pa'i sgra la dga' myi bgyid// skye bos mdun par rang bud myed gnas spong zhing // gcig pu mal na mchis nyal rlung myi gsal// bdag ni gling
154b4(1): dus mi kyi zhing // dge ba bcu rnams rab tu bshad par bgyi/ khyim na gnas pa'i nongs pa ba ha nad bkyi zhing // rab tu byung ba'i bsngags pa 'ang brjod par bgyi// gzugs dang longs spyod dbang phyug dregs
154b5(1): pa yis// sangs rgyas chos dang dge la 'dun bgrod myi bgyi/ byang chub sems ni bsgyud par myi bgyi zhing // rtag tu yid zung srid gsum phyad par bgyi// sbyin dang snyan smra don spyod don/ 
154b6(1): 'thun pas// sems can bsdu ba la ni brtson bkyi zhing // za myed theg ce na dam pa 'di la yang // srog chags bye ba mang po longs sbyin bkyi// chos don mnyan cing bshad par bgyi
154b7(1): ma du// nyin mo rus gsum mtshan mo dus gsum du/ ri rabra sa bu'i spyan sA ma nyer mtsho zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa ni mchod pa sangs kyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
154b8(1): gshegs pa ri reb lta bu des rgyal bu gzho nu snying rje cher sems la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa legs so// legs so// bslab pa brgyad kyi tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa'i chos kyi yon tan
154b9(1): des na khyim par gyu rad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang rab tu zung ba dang yon tan mtshungs pa yin no// khyod kyi snying rje chen po des na rab tu byung ba'i son tan bsgrub pa yang sgrub par byed pa yin no// de nas
154b10(1): rgyal po dge' ba'i bkod pa/ rgyal bu gzho nu snying rje cher sems rgyal srid la bzhag nas/ bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba dang / lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de'i bstand pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim myed
155a1(1): / par rab tu byung bar gyur to// de dag rab tu bru nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa des cho 'phrul pa hand pa 'di nyid kyis de lta de skar btams shing rjes su bstand pas de dag gis ring po ma thogs par
155a2(1): mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed par gyur to// gzungs dang / dran pa dang / chos mnyan pa'i shes pa sa pa bskyed par gyurang to// rgyal bu gzho nu snying rje cher sems kyang rgyal srid la dbang bskur nas/ zla ba nya'o chos
155a3(1): na gleng chen po bzhi po dag tu rjes su nyond par byed de/ ci nas kyang srog chags dung phrur phrag dgu dang / bye ba phrag gnyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar
155a4(1): sems can rnams la chos stond par gyur da to// de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa re rab lta bu de'i baha nad pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim myed par rab tu byung nas theg pa chen po
155a5(1): 'dis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyiramyi ldog pa sha ha ka tu gyur to// sha ra rA ti'i bu ji tsam du dge' ba'i rtsa pa bskyed pa dang / yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i
155a6(1): sems can rnams kyi rten du gyur da cing dad pa skyes par gyur/ pa'i gsung rab re la ltos// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dge' ba'i bkod pa zhes bya ba
155a7(1): thu rad pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod som nyi dang yi ga/ sa bya bar gyur nga na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de ltar myi blta' / lha'i bu ded dpon 'di nyid de'i tshe re'i dus na/ 'khor los sgyur/ 
155a8(1): ba'i rgyal po dgel ba'i bkod pa zhes bya bar thu rad to// sha ra dwa tal bu re'i tshe de'i dus na chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyas mtshan zhes bya bar gyur dra pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi dang yid gnyis
155a9(1): bu bar gyur da na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de skar phyo bas he/ 'jam dpal gzho numagru rang pa'ang nyid de'i me de'i dus na chos smra ba'i dge' slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar gyur to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i
155a10(1): de'i dus na/ rgyal po dgem pa'i bkod pa 'o'i bu chomamam par thu rang pa de dag gzhan zhig yin pasnyas du byo mom nyid pa med gnyis pa par gyur pa na/ sha ra dwa nyi'i du khyod kyis de skar gyi bas te// garnas
155b1(1): bzang po'idi nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyob po dag de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dge' bu'i bkod pa de'i bu stong bam bur gyur to// sha ra na ti'i bu de'i ci re'i dus su rgyas cu gno su snying rje cher sems zhes byab bru rang ba de
155b2(1): zhig yin pa snyam su khyod som nyi dang yid gnyis la bar gyur ngan/ sha ra ma ti'i bu khyod kyis re skar gyi blta ste/ nga nyid de'i tshe re'i rus na rgyal bu gso nu snying rje tshor sems shes bya bar gyu rang to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de sa
155b3(1): sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa rnams ni lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / shes bzhin gyi pyod pas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par zung ba yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi tshul
155b4(1): dang ldan pa'i gtam 'di bshad pa na lU dang phyi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags sum khri nyi sto bla na myed pas dag par rdzogs pa'i byachub tu sems skyes so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i du
155b5(1): 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod ni lnga'i bu red dpon 'di dang lhan cig tu yun dering po nas tshangs par spyod pa pyad pa dang / sangs rgyas mang
155b6(1): po la bsnyen bkur byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs pa/ spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyang ngon/ 
155b7(1): tshig bla dgas yin la/ las ni 'dus byas yin gyi kho bo'i 'dus ma byas su gtogs pa yin pas de'i phyi ma'o bo ni yun ring po nas ngas par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i dri rangs
155b8(1): par khyod pa zhes bya ba de ni pyod pa'i mtshan nyid yin gyi/ che wa ni spyod pa myed pa dang / rab tu gyod pa myed pa yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni sun ring po nas mangs par pyod pa ma yin no// btsun pa shwa ra dwa ti'i ru/ 
155b9(1): tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su sbyor ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni gnyis su sbyor ba ma yin la gnyis su myed par spyo pa sa ma yin te/ de'i phyi 'o 'o ni yun ring po nas tshangs par khyad pa ma yin no// 
155b10(1): btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par khyod pa zhes bya ba de ni nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po yon gyi/ kho bo ni gnyen pos rab tu phyes ma yin te/ de mi phyi ba'o bo ni sun ring po nas tshangs par phyar pa ma yin no// btsun
156a1(1): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni gzugs dang / sma dang / dri dang / ro dang / re ka bya dang / chos las 'byol ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos las
156a2(1): 'byol ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni bdud kyis ma las
156a3(1): yang dag par 'da' ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad yin gyi/ kho bo na dge ba
156a4(1): dang sdig pa la nges par sbyor bar myi byed de/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par phyung ba ma yin no// btsun la sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa khre sh+ya ba de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon myed pa thob pa yin
156a5(1): bya kho bo na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon myed pa thob pa ma/ da yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo na yun ring po nas tshangs par pyad pa ma yin/ deno// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba
156a6(1): de ni 'khor ba las 'byol ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni'akhor ba las 'a/ byol ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo na yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod
156a7(1): pa zhes bya ba de ni mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam du 'gro ba yin gyi/ 'i bo ni mya ngan la 'da' ba ron tu gnyer ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho tra ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun pa
156a8(1): sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang sa pyod 'di skad du'angaja ma dpal khyod ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no zhes zer ba ni btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la debasnyen bkur bya bar mya nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na
156a9(1): de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs myed cing bstand tu myed po yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar myi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshor ba myed cing tshor ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya
156a10(1): bar myi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'du shes myed cing 'du shes kyi mdud pa thams cad dang bral ba yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar myi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'du byed rnams myed cing 'dus
156b1(1): sa byas la brnyes pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar gyi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par shes pa myed cing yid gnas pa byed pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkun bya bar myi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
156b2(1): myig dang gzugs kyi yum ma yin nga com pa nyid kyi khyod yum yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar gyi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni na ba dang / sgra'i yul ma yin zhing mtshan su myed pa'i mu yin las/ de la 'dren/ 
156b3(1): bkur bya bar mya nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni sna dang dri'i yul ma yin zhing gnyis dang bral ba yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar myi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni lce dang ro'i yul ma yin zhing rnam par
156b4(1): rig pa myed pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mya nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni lus dang reg bya'i yul ma yin zhing thogs pa myed pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur
156b5(1): bya bar myo nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni yid dang chos da kyi yul ma yin zhing chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba yina? sa/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar myi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshe
156b6(1): pa ni de bzhin nyid la gnas pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur/ bya bar mya nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni yang dag pa'i ma za' dang 'thun par zhugs pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur
156b7(1): byab kyi rus pa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyis kyis rab tu ba yin 'dra/ de sa bsnyen bku bya bar gyi nus dang / de bzhin gshenas pa ni chen po song sa nyid la bzhugs
156b8(1): pa yin pas de sa bsnyen bkur bya bar gyi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid yin pas des bsnyen bkur bya bar gyi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni bros pa thams cad sang dag pa/ 
156b9(1): cha lasade las des 'i skyen pasus bya mar gyi chus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni dmyigs pabyed pa la 'jugs pa semachis rim 'khyen bcur bya bar gyi nub pa dang / de bzhin na gas pa ni rnam pa na
156b10(1): a skye gnas pa yin pas de laM bsnyen bkur bya bar myi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni khams gsum na gyi gnas pa yin nas/ ro la bsnyen bkur bya bar myi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni las rtse
157a1(1): pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar myi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol la myi gnas pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar myi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
157a2(1): pa ni zhi zhing rab tu yi la nye bar zhi ba yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar myi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni lus dang / ngag dang / yid dang / bral ba yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar myi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni
157a3(1): dog dang / gzugs dang / dbyibs dang bral ba yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar myi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad du ma smad cing kha na ma tho ba myed pa yin pas re la bsnyen bkur bya bar myi nus pa dang / re
157a4(1): bzhin gshegs pa ni spyod lam thams cad la yang dag par myi gnas pra yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar myi nus pa dang / btsun pa sha ra rA ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad du skur pa garab tu myed
157a5(1): cing nam mkha' la bris pa lta bu yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya/  bar mya nus pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang / khyod 'di skad du 'jam dpal khyod ni dge' ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa
157a6(1): yin no// zhes zer bas/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dge ba'i ma badz+ra/ ni 'jig tshogs pa ba ma yin pa dang / ma rig pa dang / sred pa'i sred pa sa ba ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / 
157a7(1): gti mug rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / phyin ci log bzhi rtsa ba ma yin padang / phung po lnga ma ba ma yin pa dang / skye mched drug phra ba ma yin dang / rnam par shes pa'i gnas bdun pa ba ma yin pa dang / 
157a8(1): log pa brgyad phra ba ma yin pa dang / kun nas ma nar sems kyi dngos po dgu rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / sems can phyo gnas dgu phra ba ma yin pa dang / myi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam za ba ma yon pa gang yin pa de ni
157a9(1): dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam la mngon par zhe nad pa thangs yin pa dang / rig pa dang rnam par grol ba la yongs su rtog pa za ba ma yin pa dang / lhag pa'i tshul
157a10(1): khrims kyi bslab pa dang / lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa dang / lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pas rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / bden pa bzhi po dag la yongs su rtog pa pha ba ma yini pa dang / 
157b1(1): dbang po lngam 'du shes ma pa ma yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug pa dmyigs pa ma sa ma yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdus la spro 'dogs pa 'angs yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brkyang pas rlom sems su
157b2(1): byed pa rdzab ma yin pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa dgu la lta bskyed pa sa ba ma sani pa dang / myi slob pa'i chos bcu la mngon par zhen pa ma ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i ma la yin no// 
157b3(1): phung po 'i bdud pa tha ma yin pa dang / nyon mongs po'i bdud pa tha ma yin pa dang / 'tsho ba dag gi 'dud rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / sA'i bu'i bdud pa pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i ma la yin no// smis pa cha la ma yin pa
157b4(1): tsho pa dang / kun nas ldangasas pa ma yin pa dang / 'gyod pa ma sa ma yin tra kang srin pa de ni na rnamam bayin no// bdag sus kham pa ma yin drang / sems can du la lathal ma yin pa dang / srog tu l+h+wa #
157b5(1): yin pa dang / gso' ba dang gang zag tu lta ba za ba ma yin pa kang da yini pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// 'byung bar lta ba rtsa ba ma yin/ de ba dang / 'jig par ltabs pa ma yin pa dang / chad par lta
157b6(1): ma yin pa dang / rtag par lta ba ma pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dag/ ba'i sa ba yin no// tshul bzhin ma son pa ma tha ma yin pa dang / ma rig pa pha la mo yin pa dang / 'du byed chal ma yin pa dang / 
157b7(1): narnam par shes pa'i rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / mying dang gzugs ma ma yin pa dang / skye mched drug pa pa ma yin pa dang / reg pa ma seMn bu dang / tshor lam 'am yin pa dang / sred pa sa pa ma yin
157b8(1): dang / spen pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / srid pa sa bra ma yin pa dang / skye bas pa ma yin pa dang / rga shi sa pa ma yin pa dang // nad rang sdug bsngal ba dang / sid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pam pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dgen
157b9(1): pha ma yin no// 'dod pa'i khams sa la ma yin pa dang / gzugs kyi khams la pa ma yin pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams pa mam san man pa yin pa ro ni dge ba'i ma yin no// sbyin pas rlom sems su byed pa
157b10(1): yin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi rlom sems su byed lam pa ma yin ma na nga yin pa de ni dge nas pa yin no// byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dgal
158a1(1): hA/ rang btang snyoms kyis rlom sems su byed pa sa pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i sa ba yin no// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas 'dod pa sa 'am yin pagang yin pa ra ni byang chu
158a2(1): @sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba dang / thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems myi 'dor ba'i sa pa dang / sems can yongs su sbyind par byed pa'i rtsa ba dang / dam pa'i chom
158a3(1): yongs su 'dzind pa'i rtsa ba dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i che ba dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba myed pa'i tsha ba dang / tshul khrims dang bslab pa thams cad yang dag par le nad pa'i rtsa ba dang / brgya byin dang / 
158a4(1): tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba yang myi 'dod pa'i rtsa ba dang / bzod pa dang / zhi ba dang dul ba dang nges pa'i rtsa ba dang / bdag dang gzhan la yang myi gnod pa'i rtsa ba dang / brtan pa'i 'phon 'grus chen po pham pa'i rtsa ba dang / dman
158a5(1): ba'i chos yang dag yar myi sdud pa'i rtsa ba dang / bami gtan gyi che ba dang / bsam gton bya to/ myang bar myi byed pa'i rtsa ba dang / shes rab kyi rtsa ba dang / btang snyom/ nas kyang ma yan pa'i ra ba dang / thabs kyi che ba dang / thams cad
158a6(1): kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dang/ dge ba'i mab yin no// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun myi gcod pa'i rtsa ba dang / stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa'i
158a7(1): ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i pha ba pa yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i ma ba yin no// sus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi rgyan kyi sa ba gang yin pa de ni byang
158a8(1): chub sems dpa'i dge' ba'i ma la son ro// gzungs kyi zhes pa thos pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i sal sngon no// spobs pa kyi chod pa'i ma pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa
158a9(1): bu'i ma ba yin no// mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa'i 'khob pa'i sa bu ga yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i din pa'i ma bayin no// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa la dge ba'i sems yin pa/ 
158a10(1): rini byang du sems dpa'i dgel 'a ma mayin no// byang chub kyi snying por 'grob kyi myos rlon pa'i ma bzhab yin pa dang / lan gsum du 'azlas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa cu gnyis su 'gong na
158b1(1): za ba kang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba 'i la ma yin no// 'jam dpal gzho nur gyu rang bas ron gyi gzhirnam par nges pa ba nyan pa gsum po 'di bshad pa na/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des legs ro/ 
158b2(1): zhes bya ba byin nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des/ bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur da pa la mye tog rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis mngon par gtor nas tshig 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing bang na 'jam
158b3(1): dpal gzho nur gyurd pa gnas pa der ni de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis zung ba yin par rig par bya'o// sems can kang dag 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur da pas bstand pa 'di thos na/ myi skrag myi dang bzhing dang nga bar s+ya
158b4(1): 'gyur ba de dag ni dge' ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma yin no// de dag gis ni bdud kyi las thams cad bkag pa yin no// de dag ni te kra pa chen po 'di la snang ba thos pa yin no zhes kyang smras so// re
158b5(1): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor res/ smras pa la/ rjes su thugs rang ba mdzad nas lha'i bu ded dpon la/ 'di skad ces bka' sa lar to// sA li dru ka bdag 'jas
158b6(1): dpal gzho nur gyu rad pas bshad pa 'di thos nas mos par 'gyu ba de ya pacho 'phrul chen po yin te/ re dag ni re mas gzhan 'a cho 'phrul rnams kyis smag par myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
158b7(1): sga'i bu 'di lta he rtag par 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams la sbyin ga par bshad pa dang / bde bar 'du shes pa rnams la sdug bsngal bar bshad pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa rnams la bdag myed par
158b8(1): pa dang / sdug par 'du shes pa rnams la myi sdug par bshad pa dang / dngos por 'du shes pa rnams la dngos po myed par bshad pa dang / lta bar 'du shes pa rnams la tong par bshad pa dang / mtshan mar 'du shes pa nas/ 
158b9(1): pa mtshan ma myed par bshad pa dang / khams gsum par 'du shes pa rnams la smon pa myed par bshad pa dang / ngar 'dzi nad pa dang / nga sa re 'dzind par 'du shes pa rnams la lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang / bral
158b10(1): bar bshad pa de ni 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa chen po yin te gang dag de la skrag par myi 'gyur ba de dag ni yang dag par dul ba yin pas na/ yab dag par dul ba rnams ni keng la yang skrag par myi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// 
159a1(1): de ci'i phyir zhes/ des gapa las skrag par 'gyur ba'i chos 'din te/ ngam 'dzin na pa yongs su 'dzi nad pa dang / nga'i 'dzin pa yongs su 'dzin pa de dag des yos su sum yo lu chen byed
159a2(1): rten myed pa la g.yo ba myed pa dang / g.yo ba myed pa la 'gul ba myed pa dang / 'gul ba myed pa la blang ba myed pa dang / blang ba myed pa la dor ba myed pa dang / dor ba myed pa la 'dzind pa myed pa dang / 'dzind pa myed pa la mtshan
159a3(1): tu 'dzind pa myed pa dang / mchog tu 'dzind pa myed pa la phyin ci log myed pa dang / phyin ci log myed pa la log pa nyid myed pa dang / log pa nyid dang bral ba ni yang dag par sgrub pa yin pa dang / yang dag par sgrub pa ni
159a4(1): yang dag par lta ba yin pa dang / yang dag par lta ba ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyi bar dag yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas pa la rnam par g.yeng ba myed pa dang / sems rnam par myi g.yeng ba la
159a5(1): gnas pa myed pa dang / sems myi gnas pa la gnas pa myed pa de dang / sems kyi gnas myed pa la rnam par shes pa'i gnas myed pa dang / rnam par rig pa myed pa la brtag cing gsal ba myed pa dang / 
159a6(1): brtag cing gsal ba dang bral bas dmyigs pa spangs pa dang / dmyigs pa myed par gnas pa la sgrib pa myed pa dang / sgrib pa myed par gnas pa la rlom sems myed pa dang / gang gi tshe rlom
159a7(1): sems myed pa de'i tshe lhag par rlom pa myed pa dang / gang go che ga par rlom pa myed pa de'i tshe bdag dang gzhan du mthong ba myed pa dang skyed pa la yongs su gdung ba myed pa dang / yongs su gdung ba
159a8(1): byed pa la spyod lug pa myed pa dang / sgyid lug pa myed pas/ nyon mongs pa'i rgyu myed pa dang / nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i sems la gsal la snang ba dang / gsal ba thob pas ye shes mthong ba dang / ye shes mthong
159a9(1): gnas pa'i sems kyi gos pa rkya re ba dang / sems kyi shes pa rgya chen po la gnas pa sa bdud kyis grags kyi rnyed pa dang / bdud dang phyir rgos pa nges par bcom pa la sgrib pa myed pa mngon su 'gyur ba dang / sgrim pa byed/ 
159a10(1): pa la gnas pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon tu 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// sA'i bu kang byas pa myed cing skye ba myed pa'i chos rnams la chos kyi go rims kyi mtshams sbyar ba de ltar nyond pa de yang tsho 'phru chen
159b1(1): bya ba myed par po sor rtog pa shes pa dang / dad pa'i dbang po dang / stobs shes pa dang / chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba shes pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / stobs shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams
159b2(1): cad kyis myi tshugs pa shes pa dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / stobs shes pa dang / chos thams cad myi brjed pa shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi dbang po dang / stobs shes pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / 
159b3(1): shes rab kyi dbang po dang / stobs shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pashes pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag shes pa dang / rang byung gi ye shes rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / lam shes
159b4(1): pa dang / lam ngan pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba shes parung / snying rje chen po la ldag par dmyigs pa shes pa dang / zad pa shes pra dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad myi zad pa shes pa dang / skye ba myed
159b5(1): ba shes pa dang / myo skye ba'i chos la bzod pa shes pa dang / sangs dergyas rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su lagrub pa shes pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / chos
159b6(1): kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba shes pa dang / dge' 'dun rjes su/ dran pa shes pa dang / phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ra/ gel 'dun yang dag par 'du ba shes pa dang / gtong ba rjes su/ 
159b7(1): dran pa shes pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su myi gartenab shes pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / smon pa ma thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba shes pa dang / 9
159b8(1): su dran pa shes pa dang / sdig pa thams cad myi bya bar shes pa dang / sems can gyi dab pa po shes pa dang / rim pa rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / thos pa'i tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba shes pa dang / tshogs
159b9(1): cad kyis mya ngoms pa shes pa dang / sman thams cad shes pa dang / rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du sbyor ba shes pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang / gnas ma yin par myi bya bar shes pa dang / stobs bcu
159b10(1): shes pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa dang / rjes su 'thun pa shes pa dang / mye 'jigs pa shes pa dang / bar du gcod pa shes pa dang / bar du gcod pa ma yin pa'i chos rjes su
161a1(1): rtogs pa shes pa dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma thogs pa'i shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa myi gnas par shes pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma thogs pa'i shes pa dang / chos thams cad las yang dag par
161a2(1): myi 'da' bar shes pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma thogs pa'i shes pa dang / gnas pa myed pa dang / rab tu gnas pa myed pa shes pa dang / lus sngon tu 'gro ba shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus la 'jug pa
161a3(1): shes pa dang / ngag sngon tu 'gro ba shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra rab tu dbye ba shes pa dang / yid sngon tu 'gro ba shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnam par g.yo ba rjes su rtogs pa'i
161a4(1): shes pa dang / 'khrul pa myed pa'i shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'khrul pa rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / yod pa nye bar
161a5(1): zhi bar bya ba shes pa dang / myi brjed pa'i shes pa dang / sems rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems can dran pa la 'jog pa shes pa dang // dgongs pa rab tu 'dzind pa shes pa dang / sems can le
161a6(1): can yongs su gzung ba shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dre/ sa pa shes pa dang / 'dul ba'i sems can 'dul ba rjes su rton/ sa pa'i shes pa dang / thabs shes pa dang / shes rab shes pa
161a7(1): 'i bu rjen gying chub sems pa'i rnam pa yin to// shes pa na pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyis shes sadapa 'thong 'o// 'i sa sa pa/ 'jam da
