314b5(1): 'phags pa dkon mchog 'artsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam
314b6(1): grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las// bu mo zla gros hA/ zang mos zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ sum bcu pa rdzogs spro// 
314b7(1): rgya kar gyi mkhan po 'dzin myi tra dang / su red dra bo de dang / chen gyi lo tsa ba ba ra de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la pa pa/ 
314b8(1): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las// le'u sum bcu gcig pa ste/ gang ga'i mchog gis zhus pa// 
314b9(1): rgya gar skad du// A r+ya gang god ta ra na ma su tra// bod skad du/ 'phags pa gang ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
319a1(1): 'phags pa dgor mchog legs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u song phrag brgya pa las/ se'u sum cu ma gnyis pa te// mya ngan byed kyis byi pas zhus pa/ bam po gcig so/ 
319a2(1): rgya gar skad du/ a r+ya a sho ka dang ta byA ka ra na ra mA ma dA ya ra su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mya ngan myed kyis byir gsung bsta rang pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
319a3(1): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di snyed bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i re li dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang
319a4(1): chub sems dpa' brgyad tong thams cad kyang gsungs yob pa/ spongs pa logs pa skyed pa/ mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/ chos zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa/ stong pa nyid la gnas pa/ mtshan
319a5(1): myed pa la gnas pa/ smo dad pa myed pa la gnas pa/ myi dan+ya klas pa'i chos la gnas pa// myi gnas par chos stond pa/ s+ya/ skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang ldan pag tag la 'di lta he/ 
319a6(1): byang chub sems dpa' srun po dang / byang chub sems dpa' skur/ chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' se shes lhur po dang / byang / chub sems dpa' rin cen seng ge dang / byang chub sems pa
319a7(1): seng ke blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu laka brkyang dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag bsgreng dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu 'tshon dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu 'dzum zhing ra
319a8(1): tu dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang po las 'das pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu gdung dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin cen sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin cen dang / byang chub sems
319a9(1): ci thogs dang / byang chub sems dpa' dzi can bka' ldan dang / byang chub sems dpa' la lo sbyang dang / byang chub sems dpa' ma mo sgyu chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bden du ga' ba
319a10(1): byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jas rapas gzho nur gyu ra pa dang / skyes bu dam pa brgyad la 'di sa te/ byang chub sems dpa' babang skyong dang / byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog
319b1(1): gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' phug sbas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang po'in dang / byang chub sems dpa' su pa'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo sa yangs pa dang / byang dru sems dpa' dro grob kyang tha
319b2(1): dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros 'phel dang / de las sotshogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad hong dang phabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gdas
319b3(1): shing bzhugs pa la/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang / rgyal po'i bka' la gtogs pa dang / blon po dang / sna chen po la gtogs pa dang / zhang lon gyi bu che dang / zhabs dru na 'khod pa dang / pho brang 'khor kyi myo dang / bram
319b4(1): ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis ha hang du byas/ bla mar byas// ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ de na bcom ldan 'dra su 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing bdun kyis ba
319b5(1): nas chos sto nad pa 'di lta te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar/ dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po// tshig/ 'bru bzang po// ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs
319b6(1): su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba rab tu hond to// de nas dang ldan pa sha ra dra ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dag la byi bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od
319b7(1): srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da dang / tshe dang ldan pabyams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang / tshe dang ldan panye bar 'khor dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra ba can zin dang / tshe dang
319b8(1): ldan pa rnam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / de dag dang gzhan yang nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po rnams snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ chos gos dang sham thabs bgos nas srung
319b9(1): bzed thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so// de nas nyan pos chen po de dag rgyal po'i khab kyi klong khyer chen por mngar 'gas su ba me snyoms kyi phyi chu zheng mapar kyi
319b10(1): rgyal po ma skyes dgra' pho brang ga la ba der dong te lhags nas/ phyogs kacig tu cang myi smra bar 'khod do// yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra' pho brang na bu mo mya ngan myed kyis byin pa zhes bya ba btsas nas lo bcu gnyi
320a1(1): lor ba 'dral ba/ gzugs pazang ba/ mdzes pa/ bstan sug pa/ kha dog babang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ sdod kyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i ma ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas brgya tong mang po
320a2(1): bad 'gyur byas pa/ thar byed pa'i byeng bachub sa phyir gyi ga pa de rang gi pa'i khang 'a'angs ra khri ga ser gyi rkang pa can pa pas 'dug par gyur to// drengs su so mya ngar byed kyis byi pas nyan pos chen po da
320a3(1): mthong / wa~M de las ma yangs te// bsrur yang myi 'gro/ phyag kyang myi byed/ gtam yang spyi ber/ har yang kyi 'ding / bsod snyoms kyang phyi 'bul bar kha rog te 'dug go// de nas rgyal po yi skyes dgras nyan pos rjen/ 
320a4(1): po de dag rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs shes thos nas/ rang gi khang bzangs kyi snga gang ga la sa der song ste phyi nad nas/ nyan thos chen po de dag la mchog/ tu sdug par 'dzind pas mngon par dga' zhing han yang btang
320a5(1): po// rgyal po ma skyes dgras bu mo mya ngan myed kyis byin panyan thos chen po de dag mthong bzhin du kha rog ste 'dug pa mthong / nas bu mo mya ngan myed kyis byini pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 
320a6(1): nu mo 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra cos pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gas kya thub pa de'i nyan thos cher po nyi/  sa nyid kyi sor tan gyi chos dpa 'ang/ 
320a7(1): / zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/  nga dag pa'i shes pas sems shi nad tu rnam par grol ba/ bsod
320a8(1): nams kyi zhing du gyur pa snying brtse ba can yin te/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu bar khyod kyis myi shes sam/ ci na khyod kyis de dag mthong la mthong bzhin du khri yis kyang myi ldang / bsu bar yang myi byed
320a9(1): phyag kyang myi 'tshal/ gtam yang myi zer/ han dang bsod snyoms la yang spyan myi 'dren/ dad pa dang gus pa yang myi bskyed par ci'i phyir ma gus par tond cing kha rog ste 'dug/ khyod kyis don kyi dab pa ci zhig mthong // de
320a10(1): skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo mya ngan myed kyis byin pas rong gi pha rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so// ab 'di ci snyam du dgongs/ ci 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rgyal phran la ldang ba 'am/ bsur mchi ba rnam
320b1(1): gas rang ta ma/ gzigs sam/ rgyal los smras pa/ bu mo de ni me yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab tsi lga'i dbang po brgya byin sna gzhan dag la ldang ngam/ bsur mchi 'am// rgyal pos spras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin ro// 
320b2(1): bu mos smras pa/ yab tsa mye mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa lha gzhan dag la ldang ngam/ bsur mchi 'am// rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni me yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab ci rgya mtsho chen po mtsho dang mtshe'u dang / chu myig
320b3(1): dang / mtsho bran dang / lteng ka dang / khron pa la phyag 'tshal bags nad tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni me yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab ci re'i rgyal po ri rab ra neg po gzhan dag la 'dud pa 'am/ phyag
320b4(1): 'tshal pags dang ta ma/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos spras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab ci nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar ma'o tshogs sri bu kye khyer kyi 'od 'dod pa gas nad ta ya/ gzigs sam/ 
320b5(1): rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo re ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab tsi ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge 'al sdang ba 'am/ bsur mchi sadags nad tam/ gzigs sam// rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo
320b6(1): de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab de bzhin du su zhin/ bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa
320b7(1): dman pa la mos pa'i nyan thos 'a lta bur gyur da pa/ byams pa chen dang / snying rje chen po dang bral ba dag la dga' zhing ldang ba 'am/ bsur mapa 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ bkur hi bgyid/ yab ci chos kyi rgya
320b8(1): po su zhig chos kyi 'khor lo bla na myed pa bskorang tam/ bskor bar bgyid pa na nyan thos dman pa/ zhand pa/ zhus pa/ nyi rtse ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa rnams la dga' bas phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ 'dud par bgyid la sna / po lha'i
320b9(1): lta bu su zhig rnam par dag pa'i lha'i bdag po don tu gnyer ba na/ dge ba chung ba'i lha lta bu'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ ldang ba 'am/ bsur mchi bar bgyid/ yab kyi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la du/ 
320b10(1): su zhig 'jig rten na tshangs pa'i snga gang bla na myed pa don tu gnyer ba na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba'i tshangs pa lta bu'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa 'am// ldang ba 'am/ ur mchi ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/ yab su zhig ye shes
321a1(1): rgya mtsho dpag tu myed pa myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos rtogs pa tshol ba na/ ba lang gi mig rjes kyi chu lta bu'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su song ba'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa 'am/ ldang ba 'am/ bsum 'chi ba 'am/ d+ya
321a2(1): 'tshal ba bgyid// yab su zhig ri rab lta bu'i khams gtan dang / rnam par brlad pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku dor du gnyer bar/ sungs 'brug bu'i ting nge 'dzind kyi stobs dang ldan pa'i nyan thos das/ 
321a3(1): la ldang ba 'am// sur mchi ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ 'dod pa 'am/ 'dod pa skyed par 'gyid/ yab su zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba nyid shes rab dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes dang / yon tan nyi
321a4(1): dang zla ba'i snang ba dpag tu myed pa lta bu thos nas/ srin bu me khyer gyi 'od lta bu rang gi rgyud la snang ba la gnas pa/ gzhan gyi sgra'i rjes su song ba'i nyan thos dag gi rnam par grol ba 'dod pa skyed par bgyid/ bdag
321a5(1): ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang / nyan thos rnams la phyag kyi 'tshal na/ bzhugs bzhin du sa dzi / nas// de ci'i sreng du zhe na/ su zhig zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil
321a6(1): 'khor btang nye srin bu rtse khyer la phyag 'chal par bgyid/ kha kang nyan thos la te dad pa ni nyan thos kyi sems dang gnas para'agyur ro// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang chen
321a7(1): ra/ thams cad ma khye rang ba'i rin po che'i sems bskyed pa dang gnas pa 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras bu mo mya ngan myed kyis byin sa 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar khyod nyan thos 'di dag mthon
321a8(1): bzhi ru rtsi ldang zhing sur myi 'gro la/ phyag phyi 'chas zhing bsnyed bkur myi byed de/ 'di dag han dang bsod snyoms la s+yad myi 'dren pa ni bu mo khyod lhag pa'i nga rgyal can zhig go// de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo s+ya bad myed kyis
321a9(1): byin pas rang gi pha rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so// yab bdag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yab khyod grong khyer gyi dbul po rnams la myi bzhengs/ bsur myi bzhud/ han myi'i
321a10(1): gding ba las na/ khyod nyid lhag pa'i nga rgyal can lags pa snyam bgyid do// rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de dag ni nga dang mtshungs pa ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dang po sems bskyed
321b1(1): pa ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang mtshungs pa ma lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ bu yo byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni nga rgyal dang dregs pa spangs te/ sems can thams cad la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar gyi
321b2(1): byed dam// bu mos smras pa/ sab byang chub sems dpa' ni kho nad tu 'dzind pa dang / za ba dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / nyes pa spang ba dang / dge ba'i che ba yongs su sbyind par bgyid po'i slad du sems can thams/ 
321b3(1): cad la 'dud cing phyag 'tshas lo// sa ga nyan thos chen po 'di dag la ri khor du 'dzi rad pa dang / za ba dang / khro ba dang / garod sems dang / nyes pa bsal bar bkyi la yang ma mtshas ma/ spang bar bgyi ba dang / dge ba 'a
321b4(1): par 'gyi ba sa sa mchis te/ yab nyan thos thams cad pa nisargyas 'bus kyis nyan thos kyi yul khrims ci snyed pa dang / ting nge 'dzi ci zhed pa dang / shes rab ci meng bam chos bstan phru lags kyang / 
321b5(1): ba de dag pa ni tshus khrims kyang rnams bcil/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gsas pa 'i/ shes rab kyang g.yas mchi/ rnam par grol/ sa yang ga las mchil/ rnas par gros pam la zhes mthong / 
321b6(1): gas kyang / de dag pa bya dzi dang 'gyu dang / jir 'dzin dang / ses nas dang / dam
321b7(1): thob 'i migs 'byung drarnas pa 'akyi 'gyur ro// 'dris te de ldabyo na kyang thams cad dang / kyi gyud byam sa cad badzin ci
322a1(1): 'od de'i phyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ma skyes dka'i bu mor gyur pa ni/ mya ngan byed byin yon tan ka'i 'arjid brgya dang / nya ba
322a2(1): brgya dag ni lcags kyur kyang // de la phyag bya'i phyir nr-i de ma yangs/ ma skyes dgra' 'is de la smras pa ni// bu mo don 'di las mnyand par gyiste// khyod kyis nyan thos yA brgya mthong bzhin du
322a3(1): phyag bya'i phyir na tso byor ldang myi byed/ bu mo mya ngan myed kyis byin na re// nyan thos 'di dag bdag gis mthong ba na// tsa phyor phyag 'tshal bsam pa myi skye ba// bdag mchis pa cig chog rigs nad par/ 
322a4(1): gsol// dper na gyi zhig rgya mtshor mchos nas kyang // rin cen 'thung khung nas ni mchi bu zangs// de bzhin bdag ni nyen thos thams cad kyang // ye shes dbyings nas nyan thos grangs snyam
322a5(1): bgyid// dper na rgyal po nor gyi dbang phyug po// sa dag 'khor los sgyur ba mnyes bgyis nas// ka ra ga pa ni/ gcig tsam gsol na ni// de yi sa rgyal po banye nad pa'o/ 
322a6(1): ma mchis// gang gis 'khor lo sbyar ba mnyes bgyis / bye ba phrag stong gsol ba bgyis nas ni// de ni dbul yang nor dang ldar par bgyid// des ni rgyal po legs par ba
322a7(1): pa lags// ka na pa ni spong ba'i skyo bo nyid du// ga 'i ga sangs rgyas yon tan mthalams rnams// thos nas theg pa dmas la 'dod skyed pa// nyan pos kun la bdag ni de mAm
322a8(1): bgying // nor rnams bsgrub bgyid myini mis pa/ byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de 'dra ste/ rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po mnyes bgyis shing / byang chub reg nas sems can 'dul bar bgyid// dpes
322a9(1): ra radu la rang brgyas gzir rnams smad pa yis// grol bgyid de bzhi gzhan gyi snga phyir 'brang ba yi// nyan thos nyon mongs rnams kyis ga'i rad pa thams cad kyang // byang chub sems dpa' ldan pa la
322a10(1): bus grol bar bgyid// sems can mang po grol bgyid sman pa btang nas ni// sos gyur sems can la ni su zhig 'dud par bgyid// de bzhin rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman par gnyer ba na// 
322b1(1): sos kyu rang nyam thos la ni su zhig 'dud par bgyid// ci ltar nad pa sos par gyur pa thams cad la/ sman pa dag gis gso bar nus par myi 'gyur la// de bzhi mnyan thos thams cad bos par gyur
322b2(1): pa la// sangs rgyas sman pa dag gis gso bar myi spyod do// 'di na sman pa gang zhig bdag gis bdag nyid la// gso' bar sems kyi sems can gzhan la ma lags te// de 'dra'i bdag nyid
322b3(1): 'gengs par bgyid pa'i rang rgyal gyi// / sman pa de dag la ni 'dod pa'i sems myi skyed// sman pa gang zhig snying rje bskyed nas bdag nyid ci lta bar// de bzhin pha rol rnams kyang nad pas gros bgyid pa// 
322b4(1): de ni mchod par 'os shing bsngags par bgyi ba dang // 'jigarten kun kyis gdud par bgyi ba'i gnas kyang lags// gang zhi ga ye shes rig pa gco' 'i rtogs gyur nas// bdag
322b5(1): nyid grol bar bgyid kyi sems can gzhan ma lags// de ni sman pa bdag nyid grol bar bgyid pa ltar// mkhas pa dag gis mchod pa bgyi ba'i gnas ma lags// gang zhi
322b6(1): ye shes rig pa gtso bi rtogs gyur nas// sems can grangs myed sdug bsngal dag las krol bapyod pa// de dgabyang chub mchog la 'dun pa skyed pa // de ni 'jig rten
322b7(1): kun gyis bsngags par bgyi ga lags// e ran da'i shi sdong mdzes pa ma lags la// de dag rnams kyi grib ma 'ang yangapa ma lags te// e ran de'i gong 'dral nyan thos khams
322b8(1): cad kyi// rnam par grol ba'i grib ma nye bar banyen ma lags// can dan mchog gi sdong cen dag ni tsha ba'is// gdungs pa'i skye bo rnams kyi nye bar banye nad pa lags// de bzhin bdag ni byang chub
322b9(1): sems dpa' rnams la yang // lha dang bcas po'i 'jig rten dag gi don bgyid snyam// ba la m-ig rjes chu ni yangs ma lags// tsha bas gdungs pa'i bar myi bgying la// gang ga'i klung ni sems
322b10(1): cad bye ba hong // mim bar bgyis nas rgya mtsho chen por ma chi// ba lang mig rjes su 'dra'i nyan pos kun// sems can kun gyi ma bzhi gyi bgyid// gang ka'i klung 'dral byang chub sems dpa' rnams
323a1(1): sems can yab 'a yas chos kyis tshim par bgyid// ci ster min cer char ni 'bab pa ra/ dbus po dag ni 'akror bu se nang par bgyid// gang zhig ror yang de dag grangs dani// sems cad
323a2(1): dbul po nor dang ldan par bgyid// de ltar sangs rgyas rin cen chos char 'bebs// nyan thos rnams ni ram chos rin cen las// chu du 'jig rten byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sems can dor srang
323a3(1): du le nad par 'gyid // ji ltar sems can dag ni ro rab kyi// drung du mchis na gsor kye mdog tu 'gyur// ri bo gzhan la sems can rnams mchis na// gser gyi kha dog can du song myi 'gyur// byang / 
323a4(1): chub sems dpa' rnams ni ro rab bzhin// gang dag mthus na lhar bcas skye dgu rnams// rnam grol mdog tu kha dog gcig tu 'gyur// nyan thos rnams kyi ye shes 'dod myi bgyid// 
323a5(1): sab cig ci ltar m+ba bran che mo yi// zile pa'i thogs pasalo tog rgyas myi bgyid// rab tu khebs pa'i srin gyis sa he 'di// tshim par bgyid cing lo thog 'phel bar bgyid// 
323a6(1): nyam thos thams cad zil pa'i thogs pa bzhin// byang chub/ sems dpa' rab khebs srin dang 'dral// snying rje mdzon/ byas gang dag brten na ni// hong gsum dam chos chu'is
323a7(1): tshim par bgyid// ka ra byi ra'i me tog dri mchog myin//  sa ni skyes pa bud myed dka' myi 'gyur// tsam pa'i ka' me tog rdzi sa dgal// ud pa la bar shi ka yang de bzhin no// nyan
323a8(1): bos ka ra bi ri'i dri bzhin te// de dag zhes pas skye dgul dka' myi 'gyur// kun mkhyen dri car byang chub sems dpa' la// skra dang myi rnams rab tu dka' bar 'gyur// gcig su mchi ba de la mtshar
323a9(1): mchis// gang zhig sems can mapa' yas 'ad pa mang // nyan thob kyi ring gcig su ma mi ba bzhir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ded dpor 'dral// makror zhig gzhar kyis sa pa 'a pa/ 
323a10(1): dang // skye bo kun la sotsal bgyid kun mgron bzhin// sgra 'brang nyan thos kun ni 'gron dang 'dral// byang chub sems dpa' kun las mgron bgyid bzhin// gzings las brtend pas chu bo chen po
323b1(1): las/ gzhan dag bsngal bar nus par myi 'gyur gyi// brtar bgyis klu'i nang du zhugs na ni// sems par bye ba yang po sgrol bar bgying / nyar thos gzings la rted pa sa bu / sems cad karang
323b2(1): dag ci ltar sgrol bar nus// rdzogs pa'i byang chub grur zhugs byang chub sems// sug bsngal mo tsho las sems can sgrol par bgyid// ci ltar g.yul ngor bong bu 'on ni// dpral sa sa rgyal bar nus par
323b3(1): myi 'gyur gyi// glang cen rta dang shing rta zhon na ni// g.yul du lhags pa'i dgra' rnams choms par nus// nyan thos rnams ni bong bu zhon pa bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' glang cen zhor 'dra' te/ 
323b4(1): sems can kun la phan dang bde skad du// de dag shing dbang drung du bdud kyang 'joms// ci ltar bar snang skar mas rgyas gyur kyang // de dag gis ni mtshan mo mdzes myi 'gyur// zla
323b5(1): ba rab tu rgyas pa sha rad pas ni// mtshan mo mkha' la thig/ le bzhin du mdzes// yab cig nyan thos 'di dag skar ma 'dral// rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bzhin// 
323b6(1): gang dag sems can kun la sman slad du// ye shes sha rad/ pas skye bo snang bar bgyid// yab cig srin bu mye khyer tshogs/ 'od kyis// las rnams la ni 'jug par myi nus kyi// 
323b7(1): 'dzam gling 'di na nyi ma'i 'od rnams kyis// bya ba sna tshogs brgya dag bgyid par 'gyur// nyar pos 'di dag srid bu mye khyer 'dral// de dag shes 'od yang dag mthong myi 'gyur/ 
323b8(1): sangs rgyas rnam grol nyi ma lta bu'i// shes rab ye shes kyis ni sems can 'grel da// yab cig 'a brgya dag gis skad phyung yang // ri dgas tshogs rnams 'drog par myi 'gyur gyi// seng ge'i skad kyis glang
323b9(1): cen ri dgas dang // byar bcas rnams kyang phyogs su 'byer bar 'gyur// yab cig de ltar nyan thos tha 'drar gzigs// de dag skad kyis bdud rnams skrag myi 'gyur// rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i khyod
323b10(1): myad pas// bdud dang de bzhin bdud ris skrag par 'gyur// yab cig rgyu 'di bdag gis mthong bas na// theg pa dben pa dag la 'dod kyi skyed// su zhig zla myed byang chub spangs nas ni// theg pa la
324a1(1): dam ma la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid/ gang zhig byang chub dam pa yongs spangs das// theg pa dmar la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid// de dag 'tsho ra rnyed pa thob ma gyu dang // de dag kyir skyes pa nyi
324a2(1): par mchis// gang dag lhar bcas 'jig rten sman slad du// byang chub mchog la 'dun pa skyed par bgyid// de dag legs 'tshe rnyed pa legs par rnyed// de dag myi lus thob pa legs par mchis// 
324a3(1): gang ngag sus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang // 'jig rten spar slad las bgyid yid kyang rton// gang dag rtag tu sems can span slad bzor// de dag u dum bA ra'i me tog bzhin// de nas rgyal po ma skyes
324a4(1): dgra' bu mo mya ngan myed kyis byin pas tshigs su bcad pa baha nad pa 'di dag thos nas cang myi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pasha ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma bu mo 'di spongs pa sogs
324a5(1): pabamyed pa zhig na/ ci bzod pa thob bam// ma thob pa bdag gis brtag par byar nges so snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan bag ri'i bus bu mo mya ngan myed kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces
324a6(1): smras so// ci bu mo khyod nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par/ zhugs sam/ smras pa// ma sa ni no// rang sangs rgyas kyi/ reg pa la yang dag par zhugs sam/ smras pa/ ma yin
324a7(1): no// bu mo khyod ci zhig don tu gnyer na/ de ltar seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par byed/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu ka la te bdag chos 'ga' zhig don tu gnyer na ni/ bdag seng ge'i sgra
324a8(1): ci yang myi sgrog pa zhig na/ btsun pa sha ri'i bye 'di ltar bdag ni chos gang yang don tu myi gnyer te// de'i phyir bdag seng ge'i sgra sgrogs so// btsun pa sha ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad du/ ci bu mo khyod theg pa la yang dag par la
324a9(1): zhugs sa pa zhes zer ba ni/ btsun pa sha ri'i bus chos gang mngon tu byas pa'i chos de la ni ci nyan pos shes bya ba 'am/ rang sangs rgyas shes bya ba 'am// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i leg pa nas par
324a10(1): gzhag pa song dang// gnas brtan sha ri'i num snyam la/ nu mo de la ni theg pa rnam par gzhag pa myed de// chos de ni 'di skar mtshan nyid myed par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// bu mos smras pa/ btsun lag ri'i
324b1(1): mtshas nyid myed pa'i chos la don tu gnyer bgyi zhin song / sha ri'i bus smras pa/ bu mo chos de la ni dros tu gnyer bcis myed do// gnas btu na ro'i bus bu po bya bar skyed kyis byi bas sarnams 'di dang
324b2(1): ces smras so// bu mo sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la bye brag ni tse sod/ pa rang du dbye ba ni tsa yod// bu mos spras pa/ btsun lan ri'i bu stong pa nyid dang / dber ba nyid
324b3(1): brag ni ci yod/ tha dad du dbye ba ni ci yod/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ bye brag myed cing tha dad du dbye ba ci yang myed do// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu stong pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid ma'i bar bye brag byed
324b4(1): cing tha dad du dbye ba ci yang myed pa de bzhin du/ btsun pa sha r-i du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la yang bye brag myed cing tha dang du dbye ba myed do// btsun pa sha ri'i du
324b5(1): 'di lta dper na/ nam mkha' dang bla gab myed pa la yang brag myed cing ba rang du dbye ba ci yang myed do// btsun pan ro'i bu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / so so'i skye
324b6(1): bo'i chos rnams la yang bye brag myed cing tha dad du dbye ba ci yang / myed do// gnas brtan sha ri'i bu cang myi smra bar gyur da rton/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bu mo mya
324b7(1): par myed kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// / bu mo khyod de skad zer ba las ya/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni na ring tu ches lhag pa zhig tu mtho ba la/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams nan
324b8(1): tu dmar par mthong ngam/ cin khyod nyan thos chen po rnams mtho bar ldang bar yang myi byed/ phyag kyang myi 'tshal// sur yang myi 'gro/ gtam yang myi zer/ had dang bsod snyoms la yang spyan 'dren par myi byed/ 
324b9(1): de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo mya ngan myed kyis byin pas/ gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces spras so// btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po tong gsum gyi hong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
324b10(1): na skar ma'i gzugs su gtogs pa ci snyed cig sod pa de shes sam/ mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ bu mo snyoms par zhugs na ni kho bos grangs shes kyi/ snyoms par ma zhugs na ni myi shes so// 
325a1(1): bu mos rdzas pa/ btsun pa so tshungabs kyi bu chen po de 'a'idi gshegs pa pa ni le cishe ma cas 'a ba'ams nyid kyis spyo klas kyi stong khyer po'i dri ke kyi kru ga phre kyi
325a2(1): sems can 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi sems kyi khyod pa yang rab tu mkhyer na/ stong gsum kyi stong cher po'i 'jig rten kyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems cad rnams kyi sa thor / 
325a3(1): btsur ba mo'u dgal kyi bu cher po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang nyan thos rnams kyi khyad par yin te/ 'di ro ze dang du dbye ba ser ro// btsung pa mo'u dgas kyi bu chen po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khamapa
325a4(1): rgyas kyi zhing 'jig pa ni ci snyed cig yod/ 'chags pa ni ci snyed cig yod shes pas/ mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni myi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi
325a5(1): bu chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa ni tsa snyed kyika sod/ ma byon pa ni ci snyed cig yod/ da dang 'azhugs pa ni ci skad cig yod shes sam// mo'u dgal kyi bus smras pa/ 
325a6(1): bu mo de ni myo gas so// bu mos smras pa/ btsur pa ma 'u dgal kyi bu chen po sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa na tsi skyed cig sod/ zhe sdang la myod pani ci snyed cig yod// 
325a7(1): mug sa spyod pa ni ci snyed cig yod / cha mnyam pas spyod pa snyed cig yod shes sum/ mo'u dgal kyi bus smras pa/ me de ni myigs so// / bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mon
325a8(1): / dgal gyi bu chen po nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i sems can ni ci snyed cig sod/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa ni ci snyed cig yod/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa ni ci snyed cig yod shes sam/ mo'u dag sa
325a9(1): kyi bus smras pa// bu po de myigs so// / bu mos smras pa/ bcur ba mo'u dgal kyi bu chen po nyan thos kyis 'dus ba'i sems cad ri ci snyed cig yod/ rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba ni me zhed cig yod/ 
325a10(1): sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems cad ni ci snyed cig yod gas sa pa// / mo'u dgas kyi bus spras pa/ bu mo de'i myogs so// / bu mos spras pa/ btsun pa so'u dgal gyi bu chen po yang dag pa nyid du nges
325b1(1): ba'i sems can ni ci snyed cig yod/ log pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can ni ci snyed cig yod/ ma nges pa'i sems can ni ci snyed cig yod shes sam/ mo'u dgal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mya shes so// 
325b2(1): bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po de bzhin gshegs pas ni de dag dang gzhan yang de'i shing du ga nga nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin pa dag kyang rab tu mkhyen na/ sems can
325b3(1): gzhan dag gi ste ci smos te/ btsun pa mo'u dgal kyi bu chen po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla ma'i khyad par yin no// btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas khyod rdzu 'phrul chen po'i
325b4(1): rnams kyi mchog tu baha nad kyis/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos rab
325b5(1): tu 'gyed pa'i 'od gzer da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing ka zhes pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyang so rad pa'i sangasargyas kyi zhing de na/ shing ljon pa thams cad las can dang
325b6(1): sbrul kyi snying po'i spos gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de khyab ra 'gyur ba'i spos kyi ngad sdang ba yod pa der song shig/ gnas brtan mo'u dgas kyi bu chen pos spras pa/ bu mo sang
325b7(1): rgyas kyi zhing de'i mying yang kho bos da gdod thos na/ sangs rgyas la lta ba dang / chos mnyand pa'i phyir ci ltar 'gro bar bya// de nas bu mo mya ngan myed kyis byin pas khri de las ma langs bzhin du
325b8(1): tshig 'di skad ces smras te/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems bskyed ma thag tu nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad zild kyis gnond pa sta na/ bden
325b9(1): pa dang bden pa'i chog ras de bzhin gshegs pa 'os rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od gzer nges bdag nyid rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyan thos chen po 'di dag la ho dang par gyur da cig/ cad dad kyi rje de dag kyang nyan thos chen po
325b10(1): dag gis tshor bar gyur da cig ces byas so// de nas zhu lo mya ngan myed kyis byin pas tshig de skad smras ma thag tu/ bded po'i byi da kyi brlabs des/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa smos rab tu 'gyeng
326a1(1): ba'i 'od gzer gyis de nyid kyi tshe / 'od gser gang gis nyar thos chen po de dag gis 'jig rten kyi khams spos kyi 'od de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgral bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
326a2(1): sangs rgyas 'os rab tu 'byed ba'i 'od gcer de mam tor dacing bzhugs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od skul sa pabya'o// chos banya du pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'jig rted kyi khams 'dir thos
326a3(1): can dang sbrul gyi snying po'i dri la ngas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed 'di khyab par gyur to// / de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od gzer des kyang gsung gi yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa'i tshig gis
326a4(1): 'din ces bka' mas to// / bu mo mya ngan myed kyis bying pas ci skad du smras pa bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen pos sems bskyed la lag tu nyan thos dang / 
326a5(1): sa rgyas thams cad payid kyis gdod do// del/ nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pA hA/ rgod kyi phung po'i ye gnas sa/ car dang sgras kyi
326a6(1): po'i rna tsho ram/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gam/ dato// bcom ldan 'das can dan smras kyi snying po'i / rig las thungs gas// de skad ces na mi me pa dang / 
326a7(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' barbald to// byams pa bu mo mya ngan myed kyis byin pa 'dis nyan pos chen po rnams kyi mdun du seng ge'i sgra
326a8(1): bsgrags te/ des nyan thos chen po de dag la bden pa'i byin kyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od gzer byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
326a9(1): chen po rnams la chos nyond cing bzhugs pa yang bstan/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od de'i tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par byas so// de nas bu mo mya ngan
326a10(1): myed kyis byin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i mkhas pa su zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gi tshe
326b1(1): 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa 'di rmad du byung ba 'di lta bu dag mthong ngam/ 'os ma/ nyan thos dmar ba/ zha rang pa// zhum la/ nyi rtse pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa rnams ma spang la'am
326b2(1): bsur 'gro' ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal bar byed/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od de ci tsam du thag ring bshes sam/ mo'u dag lo kyai bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni myi/ 
326b3(1): shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gal te khyod 'dra' ba'i rdzu 'phrul can sha hag gis stong gsum gyi tong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dper na/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam
326b4(1): 'od ma'i tshal lam 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'bras sa lu'i zhing bzhin du mtshams myed par gang bar gyur da nas/ de dag thams cad kyis bskal par 'chis kyang / 'jig
326b5(1): rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba de sangs rgyas kyi zhing // ci snyed cig 'das pa'i pha rol na 'dug pa'i bgrang ba'i thabs kyis rtogs par myi nus so// de nas bcom ldan
326b6(1): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer gyis 'od de dag kyi sdang bar mdzad de/ sangs rgyas kyi/ zhing de yang myi snang bar mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan
326b7(1): ga 'od srung chen pos bu mo mya ngan myed kyis byin pa la 'di snyed ces smras so// bu mo khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
326b8(1): rgyas shaka kya thub pa de sngon mthong bam// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar nus sam/ de bzhir gshegs pas/ gang dag pa sa gzugs su mthong / 
326b9(1): gang dag pa la sgra rigs pa// log pas spong bar zhugs pa haM// skye bo de dag pa myi mthong // sangs rgyas rnams ni chos nyid lta// 'dren pa rnams ni chos kyi sku// chos nyid shes par bya
326b10(1): bas// de ni rnam par shes kyi nus// shes pa gsungs sam/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po gzhan yang bu mo khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgral bcom pa' yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 'a
327a1(1): pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thul pa sngon mthong ngam/ zhes de skad zer ba ni/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong mod kyi/ sha'i myig gis ma yin te/ gzugs su ma yin
327a2(1): no// lnga'i myig gis ma yin te/ tshor bar ma yin no// shes rab kyi myig gis ma yin te/ 'du shes su ma yin no// chos kyi byig gis ma yin te 'du byed du ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi myig gis ma yin te rnam par shes
327a3(1): par ma yin no// btsun pa 'od srung chen po gzhan yang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong / dper na gnas brtan gyis ma rig pa dang srid pa la sred pa mthong ba bzhin no// btsun pa 'od srung chen po gzhan
327a4(1): yang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/ dper na gnas brtan gyis ngar 'dzind pa dang / nga yir 'dzind pa mthong ba bzhin no// gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo 'di ltar ma rig
327a5(1): pa dang / srid pa la sred pa dang / ngar 'dzind pa dang / pa sa re 'dzind pa'i chos 'di gnyis ni myed pa yin no// chos gang myed pa de ni blta bar myi nus so// bu mo mya ngan myed kyis
327a6(1): byin pas smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po de de bzhin no// chos thams cad ni myed pa yin te/ de dag ni blta bar myi nus so// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo ci sangs rgyas kyi
327a7(1): chos kyang myed dam/ bu mos smras pa/ gnas brtan sangs rgyas kye chos rnams sam/ so so'i skye bo 'chos rnams kyang rung ste/ chos 'ga' zhig yongs su grub par 'dod dam/ 'od srung chen pos
327a8(1): smras pa/ bu mo kho bo ni se so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la yang yongs su grub par myi 'dod na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams lta la ci smos/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po chos gang dag yongs su grub
327a9(1): pa myed pa'i chos de dag ci song pas ni nam/ 'on te myed pa yin/ 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo byed pa de dag ni byed pa son no// bu mos spras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po de bas na/ 
327a10(1): thams cad ni myed pa nyid do// myed pa gang yin pa de dag la ni lte ba rnam par sbyang bar bya ba myed do// btsun pa 'od srung chen po rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas la lta ba rnam par sbyang bar 'dod
327b1(1): pas ni bdag la lta ba rnam par sbyang bar bya'o// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo bdag la lta ba ji ltar rnam par dag par 'gyur// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang gi tshe bdag 'ang bzhin myed
327b2(1): pa'i phyir chos thams cad rang bzhin myed pa nyid du mos na/ de tsam gyis na bdag la lta ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo bdag gi rang bzhin ci yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun/ 
327b3(1): ba 'od srung chen po bdag gi rang bzhin ni stong pa nyid do// bdag gi rang bzhin myed pa'i phyir bdag dben pa yang yin no// rang bzhin myed pa des bdag dben no// rang bzhin myed pa des chos thams cad dben no// 
327b4(1): 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis su las chos thob na 'di ltar khyod kyis yang dag pa'i lta ba skyes par gyurang / bu mo yang drag pa'i lte ba skye ba la ni rgyu gnyis dang / rkyen gnyis yod de/ 
327b5(1): gzhan gyi sgra dang bdag nyid kyi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa las/ 'byung ngo zhes de skad gsungs so// bu mos smras pa/ @tsun pa 'od srung chen po gang dag gzhan gyi drong 'jog pa'i
327b6(1): shes rab can de dag ni gzhan gyi spyad pa/ tshul bzhin du mo// sor rtog pa las lta ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro / ra ba 'od srung chen po gang dag gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog pa'i
327b7(1): shes rab can dag ni gzhan gyi sgra myi tshol lo// btsun 'od srung chen po ji ltar na dge slong tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin/ 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo gang gi tshe dge slob pa skad
327b8(1): thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don la nye bar rtog par byed pa de ltar na dge slong tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs pa
327b9(1): yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od sru chen po gang gi cha byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad dang ldan cig ka nas kyang sems can du 'du shes bskyed par myi byed pa de ltar na/ byang chub sems
327b10(1): tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no// btsun pa 'od srung chen po zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad ni sngon gyi mtha'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no// chos thams cad ni phyi ma'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan ro// 
328a1(1): chos thams cad ni da ltar thub ba'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no zhes btsun pa 'od srung chen po byang chub sems dpal sbyor ba de sna bus sbyor bar myi byed na/ de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dan
328a2(1): tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo chos de dag la ji ltar sbyar bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po ji ltar de bzhin nyid la sbyor ba yang myed/ myi sbyorab
328a3(1): yang myed par mthong ba de bzhin du chos thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo da ltar mthong na chos thams cad mthong ba yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po chos thams
328a4(1): cad la gnyis su myed par mthong la myi byed cing / 'jig par myi byed na/ de ltar na chos thams cad mthong ba yin no// tsun pa 'od srung chen po mthong ngo zhes bya ba de ni mthong ba myed
328a5(1): pa'i tshig bla dgas so// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ du/ mo bdag ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa'o// da srung chen pos ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o// 
328a6(1): 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo kho bos ni bdag dang 'dun gi ma mthong ngo // bu mos smras pa/ bzur ba 'od srung chen po de skar 'dag byed cing bdag gi skyeng bya de bzhin du
328a7(1): chos thams cad blta bar bya'o// gtam de skad 'arjod pa'i skabs su gnas brtan rab 'byor da kyis bu mo mya ngan myed kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod kyi spongs/ 
328a8(1): pa 'di 'dra ba ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// bu mo mya ngan myed kyis byin pas smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de rnyed pa las ni spobs par myi 'gyur gyi/ gang gis ci yang ma rnyed pa de spobs pa
328a9(1): dang ldan zhing / gang kas nang ngam phyi rol ci yang myi dmyigs pa de spobs pa dang ldan pa yin no// rab 'byor da kyis smras pa/ bu mo gang ma rnyed na spobs pa dang ldan pa yin/ bu mos smras pa gang gis bdag
328a10(1): ma rnyed cing gzhan ma yin/ dge ba ma yin/ myi dge ba ma yin/ 'an yo dang ma pas mni/ nam mo byed pa ma yin/ zag pa dang bcas pams ni/ zag pa myed pa ma yin/ 'dus byas ma yin/ 'dus ma byas ma yin/ 
328b1(1): 'jig rten pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par bya bab ma yin te/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa ma rnyed na/ so so'i skye bo'i chos myi dmyigs shing 'phags pa'i
328b2(1): chos kyang myi dmyigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos myi dmyigs na/ btsun pa rab 'byor de de ltar na gang gis ji yang ma rnyed pa spongs pa dang ldan pa yin no// rab 'byor da kyis smras pa/ ji ltar spongs par 'gyur/ 
328b3(1): bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor da kyis ji ltar chos thams cad ma rnyed pa de bzhin du de spobs par 'gyur ro// chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang gis gnas brtan nyon mongs pa myed pa rnams kyi mchog tu baha nang
328b4(1): pa'i chos kyi de bzhin nyid ji brjod cing smar rung ngam/ nyon mosu pa myed pa de dang / chos kyi de bzhin nyid de la ci spobs pa ci yang snod dam/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ nyon mongs pa myed pa
328b5(1): dang / de bzhin nyid ni baha nad pa 'am/ brjod par myi nus so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor da mo// des thams cad ni brjod du myed pa yin na/ khyod kyis bu mo
328b6(1): khyod spobs pa 'di lta bu dang ldan pa ni khyod kyis rnyed pa la/ gas par rnyed do zhes bya ba de ji lta bu yin/ rab 'byor da kyi sa smras pa/ bu mo khyod ni 'di ltar myed pa'i yobs pas
328b7(1): ho nad to// bu mos smras pa/ gnas brtan rab 'byor da chos thams cad la brag cha lta bur mos sam/ rab 'byor da kyi sa smras pa bu mo mos so// bu mos smras pa/ gnas
328b8(1): brtan rab 'byor da ji brag cha la spobs pa je yang yod dam/ rab 'byor da kyis smras pa/ bu mo de ni myed de/ bu mo rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa las sgra 'byung bar zad do// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor
328b9(1): brten nas sgra 'byung ba gang yin pa de la ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa ci yang myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ga pa brten nas byung ba de la ni skye ba ci yang myed pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor da kyis
328b10(1): smras pa/ bu mo chos thams cad ni brten nas 'byung ba'o// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor da de bas na chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'o// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ bu so
329a1(1): gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa yin ma/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang 'i klung ni kyis snyed ni 'das te gshegs so// de bzhin gshegs pa gang zhin
329a2(1): klung gi bye ma snyed ni ma 'ong lan 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni da ltar bzhugs so zhes ci'i phyir bahan da/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor da myi skye ba ni
329a3(1): bar myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa rab 'byor de chos kyi dbyings la ni skye ba 'am/ nus par 'gyur ba myi 'dod pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod ni 'di ltar skye ba myedapa
329a4(1): don dam pa'i tshig nyo nad to// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byord ba ha nang pa thams cad ni ba ha nang tu myed pa'o// de ci'i phyir bsanud pa thams cad baha nang du myed ce na/ de ni bas nad kyang rung
329a5(1): bahand kyang rung dngos po ma yin te/ dngos po myed pa dang / brjod du myed pa'i mtha' myi spong ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor/ da kyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod khyim na gnas bzhin du 'di sa
329a6(1): bu'i chos la gnas shing 'di lta bu'i rnam pa dag nyond pa 'di ni ngo mtsha rang to// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ni khyim pa
329a7(1): 'am/ rab tu byung ba zhes gzung bar myi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni bsam pas phye ba yin/ shes rab kyis phye ba yin/ ye shes kyis phye ba yin pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa rab 'byor/ 
329a8(1): byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa khyod kyis shes sam/ rab 'byor da kyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis shod cig dang / kho bos mnyan to// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' ses
329a9(1): dpa' chen po chos brkyang dang ldan na/ khyim pa 'am/ rab tu zung ba zhes myi bya te/ spyod lam gang dang gang gis gnas kyang kha na ma tho ba myed par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na 'di ga te/ btsun pa rab
329a10(1): 'byor da 'dis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin te/ lhag pa'i bsam pa de yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir ro// sems
329b1(1): can thams cad yongs su myi gtong bar gnas pa'i phyir byams pa la gnas pa yang yin no// 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba dang / spyod pa dang bral ba'i phyir snying rje chen po la gnas pas pa yin no// lus dang srog pa
329b2(1): mya lta ba'i phyir btang snyoms la gnas pa yang yin no// yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa shi nad du rdzogs pa'i phyir thabs la mkhas pa yang yin no// lta ba thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
329b3(1): phyind pa las nges par byung ba yang yin no// dge ba'i cha ba tshol ba la brtson pas chog myi shes pa'i phyir 'artson 'grus brtsams pa yang yin no// bzod pa shin tu thob pa'i phyir ma baha nad par shes pa
329b4(1): yin te/ btsun pa rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na khyim pa 'am rab tu byung ba zhes mya bya ste/ spyod lam gang dang gang gis gnas kyang thams cad
329b5(1): du kha na ma tho ba myed par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa smug ka can zin gyis bu mo mya ngan myed kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// du mo khyod mal khri ga ser gyi
329b6(1): rkang pa can la 'dug cing ha na shin tu mtho ba la 'dug nas nya/ na thos chen po dag dang / gtam zer ba de ni rung ba ma yi na paraganas pa yin no// bu mo mya na bar stan mthon po la
329b7(1): 'dug pa la nyan dma' ba la 'dug pas chos bshad par skye bya'o zhes bya ba ci khyod kyis ma thos sam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo mya ngan myed kyis byin pas la tshe dang ldan pa spa ka can
329b8(1): zin la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa spa sa can zin 'jig rten na gang dag ni rung ba yin/ 'jig rten nA gang dag ni rung la ma yin khyod kyis shes samra/ s+tha ka can zin gyis smras pa/ bu mo
329b9(1): thos shes te/ gang dag ji ltar bcas pa'i bslab pa la slob cib bslab pa de las 'gal bar myi byed pa de dag ni rung ba zhes bya'o// gang dag bslab pa de las 'gal bar byed pa de dag ni rung ba ma
329b10(1): yin pa zhes bya'o// bu mo mya ngan myed kyis byin pas smras pa/ btsun pa skra ka can zin zong de skad ma zer cig/ btsun pa sgra ka can zin gang dag ji ltar bcas pa'i bslab pa la slob pa de dag
330a1(1): ni rung ba ma yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni rtog cing rnam par rtog pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa sgra gcan zin gang dag myi rtog cing rnam par myi rtog pa de dag ni rung
330a2(1): zhes bya'o// btsun pa sgrag can zin rung ba zhes bya ba ni dge slong dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa rnams kyi tshig zla dgas smin te/ de dag ni bslab pa las 'gal ba myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
330a3(1): ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams ni bslas pa las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir te/ de dag ni phyir yang bslab pa 'dod pa ma yin pas de dag ni rung ba ma yin no// de dag ni khams gsum bu phyir myi 'o
330a4(1): yin/ de dag ni bslab pa las yang dag par 'das pa yin te/ myi slob pa zhes bya'o// de ltar na de dag gi bslab pa ni dmyigs te/ khams gsum pa brtag pa tsam du shes so// 
330a5(1): de'i phyir de dag ni rung ba zhes bya'o// sgra ga can zin gyi sa smras pa/ bu mo rung ba dang / rung ba ma yin pa la tha dad / dbye ba ji zhig yod/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun da sgra gcan
330a6(1): zin 'di lta he dper na/ gser dul ya N+yan tu byas pa dang / rgyan tu ma byas pa la tha dad du dbye ba ji zhig yod/ sgra gaHna zan kyis smras pa/ bu mo tha dad du dbye ba ci yang myed do// 
330a7(1): bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin de bzhin du rung ba dang / rung ba ma yin pa la yang yi ge'i tha snyad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir tha rang du dbye ba ci yang myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos
330a8(1): thams cad ni ci deng yang bral ba'i phyir te/ rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin no// btsun pa sgra gcan zin yang 'di skad du stan shin tu mtho ba la 'dug te/ chos nyand tam zhes zer ba
330a9(1): la byang chub sems dpa' ni rtswa bting ba la 'dug kyang shin tu mtho ba la 'dug pa yin no// sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ rnam grangs gang gis khyod de skad sma/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun bsgra gcan zir
330a10(1): 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpas gang la 'dug te/ byang chub thob par gyur da/ sgra ka can zin gyis smras pa/ sgra bting ba la bzhugs nas byang chub thob bo// bu mos smras pa/ btsun
330b1(1): bsgra ga can zin ci byang chub sems dpal sba bting ba la 'dug pa la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ tshangs pa dang / brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten spyong ngam/ de las gzhan pa 'og myin
330b2(1): man cad kyi lha gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis sus btud de thal mo sbyar nga nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'bas la gtugs par byed dam/ sgra ga can zin gyis smras pa/ bu mo re de bzhin te/ khyod kyis
330b3(1): ji skad smras pa bzhin no// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sgra ga can zin de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang dper na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phra btang ba la 'dug kyab han shi na du mtho
330b4(1): ba la 'dug pa yin gyi/ nyan thos tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na 'dug pa ni de lta ma yin par rig par bya'o// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras bu mo mya ngan myed kyis byin pa la
330b5(1): 'di skad ces smrab mo// bu mo bathun pa smra zin ni bcom ldan 'das shug kya thub pa de nyid kyisras don te/ bslob pa 'dod la 'dod pa rnams kyi mchog srim
330b6(1): me khyod kyis myi ga sa lam/ sa mya ngan myed kyis byin/ khas smras pa/ ya zong shig 'jo shig/ 'di ltar 'thun/ bsgra ga can rim bcom ldan 'das gas kyi thub pa ro
330b7(1): sras a ne zhes ma gsung shig/ ri dgas kyi rgyal lo se ge ral pa can cod ldan btags pa lta bu 'askyed par 'gyur ba nam yang gas nad tAm/ gzigs sum/ rgyal pos smras pa/ 
330b8(1): bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ sa pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i phal lta bus gshegs pa dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo sbyar ba'i zham 'bring pa ni nyan thos mdzes pa ma las
330b9(1): so// sa de bzhin gagags pa'i sras gang yin zhes sa bdag pa'i smra ngas kar smran/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid yin no zhes de dag yang dag pa'i smra bas smra'o// yang de lta bas na/ 
330b10(1): bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su 'am len par 'tshal las ni bla na myed pa sa bdag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// gtam 'di 'arjod pa'i skabs su rgyal po ma skyes dam
331a1(1): btsun mo 'khor nas btsun mo nyi shus bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// sA'i bu brgya tham pas kyang bu mo de'i seng ge'i sgra 'di 'os nas/ zlar byed pa
331a2(1): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ tshig 'di skad du bdag cag 'di rnams 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sras su khas len to zhes kyang
331a3(1): smras so// lha'i bu de dag gis 'di ltar bu mo mya ngan myed kyis byin pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad lnga'i me tog gis mngon par gtor to// de nas bu mo mya ngan
331a4(1): myed kyis byin pa khri gser gyi rkang pa can las babs te/ nyanathos chen po dag gi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / bldag pa dang / bzhid pa dang / 
331a5(1): byang bar bya ba gsod pa mang po dag gis bkur hir byas te/ dad pa dang gus pas rang gi laka nas nyan thos chen po de dag tshim par byas nas 'di skad du btsun pa dag rang dkar
331a6(1): slad dro bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan du bzhud cig/ btsun 2dag bdag kyang mchi bar 'tshal lo zhes kyang smras so// de nas bu mo mya ngan myed kyis byin pa pha ma las sochags pa
331a7(1): 'khor mang po dang / skye bo phal po ches yongs su bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song te phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu
331a8(1): 'dug go// rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas gnang te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// nyan thos chen po de dag kyang bcom
331a9(1): ldan 'das kyi thang du dong he/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'bas la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khor do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rje dang ldan pa sha ri'i dus 'di skad ces gsold to// 
331a10(1): bcom ldan 'das bu mo mya ngan myed kyis byin pa'i spobs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal saHsad pa/ sha ri'i bu bu mo 'dis ni thog ma nyid du byang chub don tu gnyer ba na/ mangs
331b1(1): rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis la dge ba'i ma ba dag bskyed do// sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i srar du bu mo 'di bud myed kyi lus ma bskur ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
331b2(1): saHla pa/ sha ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ bu mo mya ngan myed kyis byin pa la bud myed do snyam du sems na de ltar myi blta'o// byang chub sems dpa' dag ni sems can yongs su sbyind par bya ba'i phyir
331b3(1): smon lam gyis bdag nyid bud myed kyi gzugs su nyond to// de nas de'i che bu mo mya ngan myed kyis byin pas bden pa'i byin kyi rlabs byas te/ bden pa'i byin kyi rlabs gang gis chos thams cad skyes pa yang ma
331b4(1): yin/ bud myed kyang ma yin pa stan bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des bdag skyes pa'i lus su gyur cig/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i khor 'dis kyang mthong bar gru rang cig/ tshig re skad ces smras pa/ 
331b5(1): thag tu bud myed kyi mtshan ma myi snang bar gyu ra te/ skyes pa'i mtshan ma zung bar gyu ra nas/ heng gi bar snang la ta la bdun sra/ da tsam du 'phags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
331b6(1): che dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la bka' saHlar pa/ sha ri'i bu byangachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan myed kyis byin/ ba steng gi bar snang la 'phags pa khyod kyis mthong ngam
331b7(1): sha ri'i bus gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlang pa/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan myed kyis byin pa
331b8(1): 'di ni bskal pa grangs myed pa 'dun gyis 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma myed pa'i 'od ces bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan myed ces bya bar gyur te/ ro
331b9(1): tshe'i tshang ni bskal dra ba brgyar 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos mi bskal dra pa bcur gnas par 'gyur ro// de'i dge 'dun ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ala' shig tu wA ra to// phyir gyi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa
331b10(1): sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams de yang bai dUr+ya las grub pa rin po che sna bdun gyis bkra bar byas shing / myig mangs ris su bres la rin po che'i pad mas
332a1(1): pa dang / ngan song thams cad rnam par spangs par 'gyur ro// lha dang phyi rnams kyi longs khyod dag kyang khyad par byed de/ sha ri'i bu dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nye bar spyad pa dang / yongs
332a2(1): spyod ji lta ba bzhin du myi rnams kyi yang der de bzhin du 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan myed kyis byin pa'i ma/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo dam pa zla ba can zhes bya ba des thal mo sbyar pa
332a3(1): bdud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis skyes bu dam pa 'di dgung sa dgur rum na bzung ba ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed lags so// bcom ldan
332a4(1): 'das bdag gis kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya chub tu sems bskyed par bgyis te/ dge ba'i mkha 'dis bdag 'dzi ga rten gyi khams dri ma myed pa'i 'od de nyid du 'di'i 'og tu bla na
332a5(1): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyurd cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dkyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la bka' sa la da pa/ sha ri'i bu/ 
332a6(1): sring mo zla ba can 'di khyod kyis mthong ngam/ sha ri'i bus ka/ sol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// brtse/ ma ldan 'das kyis bka' saHla pa/ sha ri'i bu rgyal po la
332a7(1): btsun mo zla ba can 'di ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas sum bcu gsum pa'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur zhing la li'u rin cen mchog ces bya bar 'gyur te/ gang gi cha byang chub
332a8(1): sems dpa' byams pas byang chub thob par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ rgyal po dung zhes bya ba'i bu rgyal po gzho nu mthong na dgal ba zhes bya bar gyu ra nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa la mchod pa byas te/ rab tu
332a9(1): 'thung bar 'gyur ro// res de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i dam pa'i chos thog ma dang / bar dang / tha ma'i bar mu 'dzind par 'gyur te/ bskal du pa bzang po 'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang ngas
332a10(1): 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang mnyes par byed cing mchod par 'gyur ro// de mthar kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan myed pas byang chub thob pa na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mu lung 'dzin ces
